**Ninefold Numinous Petition: Altar Ritual Protocol**

This altar protocol follows the principle of three tiers.
The innermost tier may be inscribed with the Central Yellow Inner Talisman.
The second tier is inscribed with the Eight Trigrams.
The third tier arranges the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Dark Warrior at the four directions.

When approaching the altar for sacrifice, further place the Dipper-Pacing Wind Talisman beneath it. Envision Heaven and Earth’s creative transformation converging within, and prostrate above—none shall fail to respond.

**Talisman for Commanding the Dipper Wind and Sword Mudra of the Celestial Gate’s Qi**
With this talisman, envision the attending officials, divine warriors, and celestial immortals—an army of ten thousand—ascending through the Dipper Wind.
Inscribe this talisman in vermilion and spread it beneath the altar for prostration.

**Talisman for Dividing the Spirit, Assuming Office, and Transforming into the True Qi to Purify Defilement**
*Northern Qi* Child Script

**Incantation:**
Defiled qi of Heaven and Earth, corpse qi repels the yin.
Mysterious Water washes away defilement, fragrant broth exhales essence.
Mysterious radiance scours and purges, Jia-Geng refines the form.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes!

Recite this talisman with the *Purification of Heaven and Earth* incantation, envisioning the three characters of numinous mist and golden light circulating within the water. Then, a nine-headed Fire Phoenix appears before you, while the Jade Maiden of the Great Mystery pours water to descend and purify.

**Talisman for Audience with the Thearch and Spirit Transformation**
Jade Clarity Mudra, Ancestral Qi. Inscribe in vermilion, dissolve in pure water and consume, or burn it.

**Incantation:**
I am a child of the Primordial Thearch, a grandchild of the Most High.
Mysteriously penetrating the Supreme, subtly attaining the Three Clarities.
The Spirit Lords of the Five Viscera, the hundred spirits and myriad numina.
The qi of the Nine Numinous, the essence of the Three Heavens.
Mysteriously true, supremely responsive—all phenomena are perfected.
The Talisman of the Great Mystery ascends in clarity to the Upper Capital.
The Falling Ring and Flowing Bell, obscure and serene.
Coming and going through the Golden Gates, entering and exiting the Mushroom Terrace.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes!

**Five Spirit Treasure Talismans**
Jade Clarity Mudra, Five Spirit Qi.
With this talisman, recite the invocation of the True Within the Spirit, until the myriad qi unite as immortals, aligning with the Radiant Thearch of Heaven. Pray thus, forming the Lesser Nine, and consume with jujube broth.

**Talisman for Exiting the Spirit**
Jade Thearch Mudra, Ancestral Qi.

**Incantation:**
The Supreme Divine Elixir, radiant across the Three Fields.
It makes winter hot and summer cold at will.
My body’s contemplation transforms naturally.
Entering and exiting the Five Viscera, no evil dares approach.
Upon completing the incantation, concentrate the spirit to clearly perceive the hundred spirits of the Five Viscera, then send them down with jujube broth.

**Prayer Incantation:**
The spirit dwelling in the Flowery Canopy, Golden Lord of the Po;
The Liver’s Original Spirit Lord, Azure Thearch;
The Heart’s Sovereign, Vermilion Thearch of the South;
The Splendid True One of the Yellow Court within the Spleen;
The Fierce Lady of the Kidneys, Splendid Lady;
The three thousand soldiers and officials of the Jade Mansion divide,
Demons and evil spirits slain, fleeing like thunderclouds.
The Five Qi converge upon the Origin—Heaven, Earth, and Humanity;
Atop the head, the Mud-Pellet Spring of the Azure Lad.
Left and right, the Youths guard my body.
I serve the Heavenly Thearch and attain peace for my spirit.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Fire Radiance commands and seizes!

**Jade Tablet for Audience with the True**
Engrave the text upon a jade tablet, Jade Thearch Mudra. Envision the Primordial Beginning’s singular qi forming the talisman in golden light.

**Incantation:**
Primordial Ancestral Qi, True Numen descend.
Ascend through the Dipper Wind, severing and expelling demonic trials.
Execute the decree, do not violate my command.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Primordial Thearch’s statutes!

**Talisman for Ascending the True Within the Crown**
Dipper Mudra, Celestial Gate Qi. Place the talisman within the crown atop the head.

**Incantation:**
The Three Heavens grant assent, establishing the Mysterious Crown upon the summit.
The Nine Mysteries and Seven Ancestors protect and deliver, bringing joy to the countenance.
Name proclaimed in the Jade Capital, spirit accompanied by golden light.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes!

**Talisman for Communicating the True on the Left Shoulder**
**Talisman for Communicating the True on the Right Shoulder**

**Incantation for the Two Talismans:**
Douqi yizhi hulu hulu zhizhi youhou yemo nasengqie lieshe shehe luoye beiba xuliu baba xu she. Xuxi xishe.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Most High Lord Lao’s statutes!

**Dipper-Circling Talisman**
Yin days: *Zhen* script, Eastern Qi.

**Box-Threshing Talisman**
Yang days: *Zhen* script, Eastern Qi.

**Incantation for the Four Talismans:**
The Six Dings support my feet, spirit and soul flourish in integrity.
The Rigorous Wind is unobstructed, the Yellow Path ascends in concealment.
Riding the void, pacing the emptiness, I present myself before the Thearch Lord.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes!

**Four Talismans of the Three Heavens’ Jade Contract**
Numinous Treasure Ancestral Qi, Jade Clarity Mudra.
For these four talismans, each recites the wondrous names of the Three Heavens, envisioning golden light entering the talisman. Burn them at the four directions—left, right, above, and below—when approaching the altar.

**Next, recite the Upper Clarity Heavenly Treasure Incantation:**
The luminous essence of the Chief Spirit, the Upper Scenery’s Purple Surge.
The vast Brahman of Xiao Luo, the primordial vastness of Kui Lou.
Yang radiance flows like fire, illuminating the sun and penetrating yang.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Purple Tenuity’s statutes!

**Talisman for Rolling the Memorial**

chunks.original_text: 太极未分，阳炁混沦。 上极无上，大罗玉清。 元始祖劫，三景开明。 始阳九炁，停华育魂。 勑开八门，洞朗启扃。 玉符告命，金马驿程。 火铃前掷，雷激电奔。 急告上景，俓上紫清。 奔飞日月，合景三辰。 玄光焕发，冲罡驿程。 三灵九炁，混合我身。 天灵节荣，性返归真。 灵宝心咒祝之 和元阳炁，降集三灵。 拘魂制魄，内外洞明。 玄景真苗，道贯始青。 三部八景，炁周杳冥。 心宁南北，坎离自清。 真罗郁绝，上开八门。 飞度三界，合制乾坤。 通天符版 师取本命日，用枣木，长五寸，阔二寸半。 刊符於上。 作一穴，穿五色线，带肘后。 阴日右，阳日左，以绛纱袋之，露星月二十一日。 遇本命用香花茶果十二分，请北斗九晨并通天符，使降炁于符。 佩符咒 天辅无私，乾象通微。 无幽无冥，无感不知。 佩带符图，神兵任呼。 我佐上王，身登仙都。 急急如天君紫微上道律令勑。 三天合同契券 念灵书中篇，掐玉诀，取五方炁入符。 师临登坛时，以黄纱袋之，佩事之。 升入天门，则万神侍卫，五帝司迎，庶宝章上达也。 章袱四角符 袱中符玉文，祖炁 书符咒 梵炁弥罗，出阴入阳。 倏忽万程，风马云奔。 去来无碍，直造天门。 捧赍玉章，与道合并。 章关前符 右仰日直功曹符使，火急准太上勑命，疾速进呈，取伺报应，火急奉行。 法师押字。 书符咒 上台一黄，中台二白，下台三青，并降真灵。 北帝勑，玉帝勑，太阴皇君，太阳帝君。 角至轸掐二十八宿，南斗煞童，随吾后行，阴阳决吏，疾速奉行。 魁至魒炁诀。 一转太乙尊，勑除鬼贼。 二转起星光，千妖尽伏藏。 三转三天勅，除灾降吉祥。 四转四天降，何鬼辄敢当。 五转五帝真，疾病永无侵。 六转六神定，天神斩妖佞。 七转收邪鬼，助国救生命。 急急如太上律令。 祭章召将符 存诸将，如本法，掐玉文，祖炁。 结界四维 高功仗剑，执水盂，诣天门、地户、人门、鬼路各方，噀水作用，表白宣咒，侍职焚符，表白至天门宣咒。 咒曰 天门开张，鬼道消亡。 今日安坛，臣欲奏章。 西北之维，戌亥中央。 万神於此，执戮不祥。 高功噀水，掷剑，次至地户，表白至地户宣 咒曰 生炁流通，不与真同。 今日奏章，乃立坛场。 东南之维，辰巳中央。 地户於此，收戮凶殃。 高功至地户，作用毕。 次至人门，表白至人门。 咒曰 出阴入阳，五内开张。 天神闻之，皆整严装。 太上使我，今日奏章。 西南之维，未申中央。 收戮百鬼，何有敢当。 高功至人门作用，次至鬼路，表白至鬼路，宣 咒曰 阳炁流晶，百邪不生。 今日奏章，先立坛场。 东北之维，丑寅中央。 鬼门考鬼，剪灭邪精。 急急如律令。 右咒临坛焚后四符，次第宣咒。 天门结界符 地户结界符

Before the Supreme Ultimate divided, yang qi swirled in primordial chaos.
Above the highest, beyond the highest—Great Luo’s Jade Clarity.
The Primordial Beginning of kalpas, the Three Sceneries dawn in radiance.
First yang, nine qi, suspended efflorescence nurturing the soul.
Decree opens the Eight Gates, illuminating and unsealing the portals.
Jade talisman proclaims the mandate, golden steeds speed the courier’s path.
Fire bells cast forth, thunder spurs lightning’s flight.
Swiftly report to the Upper Scenery, ascend directly to Purple Clarity.
Racing through sun and moon, merging with the Three Luminaries’ light.
Mysterious radiance blazes forth, piercing the meteoric courier’s route.
Three Numinous, nine qi, blend and merge with my body.
Heavenly numen flourishes, nature returns to the true.
Recite the *Lingbao* Heart Incantation:
Harmonize primordial yang qi, descend and gather the Three Numinous.
Bind the hun and restrain the po, inner and outer resplendently clear.
Mysterious Scenery’s true sprout, Dao courses through the Primordial Azure.
Three Sections, Eight Sceneries, qi pervades the profound darkness.
Heart at peace in north and south, Kan and Li self-purify.
True Luo’s dense luxuriance, above opens the Eight Gates.
Traverse the Three Realms, unite and govern Heaven and Earth.

**Talisman of Communion with Heaven**
On the master’s life-day, take jujube wood, five inches long and two and a half inches wide.
Engrave the talisman upon it. Bore a hole, thread with five-colored silk, and wear it behind the elbow.
On yin days, the right; on yang days, the left. Encase it in a crimson silk bag and expose it to the stars and moon for twenty-one days.
On the life-day, present twelve portions of incense, flowers, tea, and fruit. Invoke the Nine Mornings of the Northern Dipper and the Talisman of Communion with Heaven, causing qi to descend upon the talisman.

**Incantation for Wearing the Talisman**
Heaven aids without partiality, the celestial image penetrates the subtle.
No darkness, no obscurity—nothing sensed remains unknown.
Wearing the talisman’s design, divine soldiers obey my call.
I assist the Supreme King, ascending to the immortal capital.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Heavenly Lord Ziwei’s celestial decree commands.

**Contract of Triple Heaven’s Union**
Recite the central chapter of the *Numinous Writ*, form the Jade Mudra, and draw the five directional qi into the talisman.
When the master ascends the altar, encase it in a yellow silk bag and wear it for the ritual.
Ascending through Heaven’s Gate, myriad spirits attend in guard, the Five Emperors officiate the welcome, and the precious writs ascend above.

**Four-Cornered Talisman for the Wrapping Cloth**
Talisman within the cloth: Jade Script, Ancestral Qi.

**Incantation for Writing the Talisman**
Brahmā’s qi pervades the cosmos, emerging from yin and entering yang.
In an instant, ten thousand leagues—wind horses and cloud steeds gallop.
Coming and going without hindrance, directly reaching Heaven’s Gate.
Bearing the jade writ, merging with the Dao.

**Talisman Before the Writ’s Passage**
Right: Facing the sun, the Direct Merit Officer’s talisman messenger—urgently by the Most High’s decree, swiftly proceed to present, await the response, and act with haste.
The Dharma Master’s seal.

**Incantation for Writing the Talisman**
Upper Terrace: one yellow; Middle Terrace: two white; Lower Terrace: three azure—all descend with true numina.
Northern Emperor’s decree, Jade Emperor’s decree, Supreme Yin Sovereign, Supreme Yang Emperor.
From Horn to Wing, form the Twenty-Eight Constellations. Southern Dipper’s slaying youths follow behind me; yin-yang decision officers act with speed.
Meteoric Qi Mudra from *Kui* to *Piao*.
First revolution: Supreme Unity’s honor, decree to expel demonic thieves.
Second revolution: Star’s light rises, a thousand demons all submit and hide.
Third revolution: Triple Heaven’s decree, dispelling calamity and descending fortune.
Fourth revolution: Four Heavens descend—what demon dares resist?
Fifth revolution: Five Emperors’ truth—illness forever barred.
Sixth revolution: Six Spirits settle, heavenly gods slay the treacherous.
Seventh revolution: Gather the demonic ghosts, aid the nation and save lives.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Most High’s statutes command.

**Talisman for Summoning Generals at the Writ’s Offering**
Visualize the generals as per the original method, form the Jade Script, and ancestral qi.

**Establishing Boundaries at the Four Directions**
The High Master wields the sword, holds the water vessel, and proceeds to the Heavenly Gate, Earthly Door, Human Gate, and Ghost Road in each direction. Sprinkle water, perform the rite, make the declaration, and recite the incantation. The attendants burn the talisman, and the declaration is made at the Heavenly Gate while reciting the incantation.

**Incantation:**
Heaven’s Gate opens wide, the ghostly path vanishes.
Today the altar is established; your servant wishes to present the writ.
Northwest’s corner, center of Xu and Hai.
Myriad spirits here execute and slay the inauspicious.

The High Master sprinkles water, casts the sword, then proceeds to the Earthly Door. The declaration is made at the Earthly Door while reciting the incantation.

**Incantation:**
Vital qi flows and circulates, not mingling with the true.
Today the writ is presented; thus the altar is established.
Southeast’s corner, center of Chen and Si.
Earthly Door here gathers and slays the baleful.

The High Master completes the rite at the Earthly Door, then proceeds to the Human Gate. The declaration is made at the Human Gate.

**Incantation:**
Emerging from yin and entering yang, the five viscera open wide.
Heavenly gods hear this and all prepare in solemn array.
The Most High sends me to present the writ today.
Southwest’s corner, center of Wei and Shen.
Gathering and slaying a hundred ghosts—who dares resist?

The High Master completes the rite at the Human Gate, then proceeds to the Ghost Road. The declaration is made at the Ghost Road while reciting the incantation.

**Incantation:**
Yang qi flows crystalline, a hundred evils do not arise.
Today the writ is presented; first the altar is established.
Northeast’s corner, center of Chou and Yin.
Ghost Gate examines ghosts, severing and extinguishing demonic essences.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

Right: After reciting the incantations at the altar, burn the four talismans in sequence and recite the incantations.

**Heavenly Gate Boundary Talisman**
**Earthly Door Boundary Talisman**

chunks.original_text: 人门结界符 鬼路结界符 飞章结界符 右符左手执章，右手执符，想心火从顶门出，内有金甲绯衣大将军，掷火铃，直冲罡风至天门。 咒曰 炎神炎神，火铃金精。 通天开道，速达帝庭。 六天九丑，无敢辄干。 上帝有勅，风火不停。 急急如律令。 灵宝玉鉴卷之十九竟 灵宝玉鉴卷之二十 飞神谒帝门 九灵飞步登坛品目次序 师於建斋一月之前，依法修炼。 临事之际，於靖内佩服诸符。 次焚香，合备刀笔朱墨，色钱黄蜡，镇信印章等物，同斋官眼同，点校章书。 庶临事得免仓皇，有忤神色。 光庭曰：人间进表章上闻帝王，尤在肃整礼容，望方设拜，稍有亏常典，即谓不恭，况太上崇严，天衢辽敻，苟非志诚，不能达御。 必在精专诚念，恪谨礼仪，悉按科条，毋或违怠。 即可助国济人，宣弘道化，上遵天旨，永懋善阶。 次道具威仪，法师登坛行事，斋官道众，云集思真堂。 知磬举香林说法天尊，次举按人各恭敬，举修斋请师。 表白设礼，代斋官致词请师。 高功陛座祝香，演说策空步虚驰神御景之道。 知磬举玉清荡秽天尊，次举荡秽咒。 清道法师洒浄，知磬举金真演教天尊，知炉引班诣坛所。 次举唱道。 高功结界，旋绕烧香。 侍职焚入户符。 入户符巳文亥炁： 甲午入户咒曰： 四明功曹，通真使者。 传言玉童，侍靖玉女。 道室正神，为臣通达。 上元生炁，入臣身中。 静夜入户咒曰： 四明功曹，龙虎使者。 侍靖玉女，开明童子。 上元少女，夜有启请。 愿得上闻，正一生炁，入臣身中。 想金童玉女，乘五炁云，自左右耳出，立侍于前。 侍职次焚招真召灵二符。 招真灵符玉文，天门炁 降灵真符玉文，天门炁 二符总祝咒： 玉华散景，九炁凝烟。 香云密罗，径冲九天。 侍香金童，传言玉女。 为臣通奏，上闻帝前。 今臣所奏，咸赐如言。

Fire bell and golden essence.

**The Jade Mirror of the Numinous Treasure, Scroll Twenty**

**Flying to the Divine Gate to Audience the Emperor**
**The Nine Numinous Steps Ascending the Altar: Order of Rites**

The master, one month prior to establishing the retreat, refines and cultivates according to the method.

At the time of the rite, within the oratory, wear and bear all talismans. Then burn incense and prepare the knife, brush, cinnabar, ink, colored paper, yellow wax, ritual seals, and other offerings. Together with the retreat officers, inspect and verify the writ.

Thus, when the time comes, one avoids haste and displeasing the spirits.

The Radiant Court states: When mortals present memorials to the Emperor, they must compose themselves with solemn dignity, facing the proper direction to bow. Even the slightest deviation from protocol is deemed irreverent. How much more so for the august and revered Most High, where the celestial thoroughfares stretch vast and distant? Without utmost sincerity, one cannot reach the throne. One must focus the mind with unwavering devotion, observe rites with meticulous care, and follow all regulations without negligence. Only then can one assist the state and deliver the people, propagate and magnify the Dao, uphold the Heavenly Mandate, and perpetuate the ladder of goodness.

Next, the ritual implements are arrayed with dignity. The Dharma Master ascends the altar to perform the rites, while the retreat officers and Daoist assembly gather in the Hall of Contemplating the Real.

The Bell Master strikes the chime, and the Incense Grove expounds the Dharma of the Heavenly Worthy. Then, the assembly is called to order, and each pays reverence. The retreat officers are summoned to invite the master. The Master of Ceremonies conducts the rites and, on behalf of the retreat officers, delivers the invitation.

The High Master ascends the dais, offers incense, and expounds the Dao of traversing the void, racing the spirit, and riding the light.

The Bell Master invokes the Heavenly Worthy of Jade Clarity Who Sweeps Away Defilement, then recites the Sweeping Defilement Incantation. The Purification Master sprinkles and purifies. The Bell Master invokes the Heavenly Worthy of Golden Reality Who Proclaims the Teachings. The Censer Attendant leads the assembly to the altar.

Next, the chanting of the Dao begins.

The High Master establishes the boundary and circumambulates while burning incense. The attendant officers burn the Entering the Household Talisman.

**Entering the Household Talisman (巳文亥炁):**
**Entering the Household Incantation for Jia-Wu (甲午):**
Fourfold Luminous Merit Officers, Messengers Who Communicate with the Real,
Jade Lads Who Transmit Words, Jade Maidens Who Attend the Oratory,
Oratory’s Rightful Spirits, convey my words.
The qi of the Upper Prime enters my body.

**Entering the Household Incantation for the Quiet Night:**
Fourfold Luminous Merit Officers, Dragon-Tiger Messengers,
Jade Maidens Who Attend the Oratory, Illuminating Lads,
Maidens of the Upper Prime, tonight I make my request.
May it be heard above. May the qi of the Orthodox Unity enter my body.

Visualize the Golden Lad and Jade Maiden riding clouds of the Five Qi, emerging from the left and right ears to stand in attendance before you.

Next, the attendant officers burn the two talismans: the **Summoning the Real Talisman** (玉文) and the **Descending the Numinous Talisman** (玉文), both charged with the qi of the Heavenly Gate.

**Joint Incantation for the Two Talismans:**
Jade radiance scatters light, the Nine Qi congeal as mist.
Fragrant clouds weave densely, piercing straight to the Nine Heavens.
The Golden Lad Who Attends Incense, the Jade Maiden Who Transmits Words,
Convey my memorial, may it be heard before the Emperor.
All that I now memorialize, may it be granted as spoken.

chunks.original_text: 高功入坛三拜，执手炉，默咒，平身。 捧章于手，存五藏炁出为五色云，灵官玉女，森列左右，日月合明，五星北斗，混为金光，洞焕内外。 自北恭身，存天师。 次面西，存道德宗师。 面南，存三师。 次面东，存诸君丈人。 又面南，专三将军。 次面北，存太上老君。 众真混同，於青黄白三色云中。 次放章于案上，礼师，存念如法。 高功宣卫灵咒，侍职焚符。 密咒曰： 虚无真圣，高空谌然。 倾诚所告，秘心奉传。 并时上达，感应幽玄。 天朗气清，三光洞明。 金房玉室，五芝莹生。 玄灵紫盖，映照我身。 玉童玉女，为我致灵。 五帝齐景，三神同軿。 得乘飞盖，升入紫庭。 卫灵符取方炁诀 五方卫灵符见朝醮门。 召五帝大魔符 东方卯文东炁 祝咒： 九天焕明，天地同灵。 通幽达明，万神云臻。 斩馘六夭，收捕魔精。 乘气捕非，扫荡妖精。 南方午文南炁 祝咒： 朱阙巍峨，离明应辉。 负天担石，横身饮风。 火铃掷节，镇守三宫。 玉帝勅命，飞升太空。 急急如律令。 西方酉文西炁 祝咒： 皓灵太空，七炁素天。 六目反山，赫然飞仙。 金门皇老，变化自然。 白元守房，乘炁玄元。 北方子文北炁 祝咒： 徘徊五炁，玄灵散飙。 巨天后矢，按辔神翘。 断绝死户，启生幽寥。 捧符执节，飞步太霄。 急急如律令。 中央中文黄炁 祝咒： 一炁分元，黄中太微。 龙篆虎符，检精却非。 斩馘六锋，神化流辉。 天帝有命，万神咸知。 召通章校章呈章从事符辰文天门炁 召监章按章赍章从事符 玄都正一，太妙华精。 真官上灵，监按章文。 赍执上奏，万神招真。 北酆鬼律，不得稽停。 召呈章上章判章从事符 咒曰： 灵宝符命，下召诸灵。 帝君奉受，天帝齐并。 呈帝上达，判别分明。 感格玄造，飞升紫庭。 急急如律令。 召天丁力士符 咒曰： 玉清神府，中有天丁。 力士捧侍，禀命咸遵。 帝君有勅，使者须听。 护送章文，俓趋玉庭。 召天绉甲卒吏符 咒曰： 天帝之神，龙符虎文。 飞行八极，驰节玉京。 吾召速至，奉命云奔。 乘我玄告，俓诣太清。 急急如律令。 召建节监功大将军符 咒曰： 玉帝之臣，建节监功。 飞云羽盖，上入玄宫。 赤帝三五，受命元宗。 奉承正道，飞步太空。 召罡风骑置吏符 咒曰： 掷火万里，流铃八冲。 都官仆射，前诛御凶。 罡风骑置，飞骑六龙。 拱护章文，俓达玄宫。 急急如律令。 召四部监功谒者察奸勾骑符 咒曰： 察奸勾骑，四部神兵。 统制队仗，扫荡妖氛。 监页使者，翼从云奔。 通达上愿，感应帝灵。 召左右官使者阴阳决吏符 咒曰： 天地二炁，阴阳肇分。 日月水火，中有大神。 前导后从，齐登云天。 左右吏兵，速诣帝前。 急急如律令。 通真达灵符 自玉清诀，次掐丑文，顺至戌亥，仍归玉文。 咒曰： 勑吾身中，胎光幽精。 爽灵万化，飞行上清。 驱神摄鬼，洞彻杳冥。 吉凶祸福，如影随形。 急急如律令。 都讲举各称法位，高功宣拜章科。 都讲举，众官各长跪，出官如法。 高功想五体真官等，从玉堂宫领万神，并严装一冠带，腾三素之云，出列于左右前后。 咒曰： 内有所明，外有所临。

The High Priest enters the altar and bows three times, holding the incense burner. Silently reciting the incantation, he rises. Holding the memorial in hand, he visualizes the qi of the Five Viscera transforming into clouds of five colors, with the Divine Officers and Jade Maidens arrayed in solemn ranks to his left and right. The sun and moon merge their radiance, the Five Stars and Northern Dipper blend into golden light, illuminating all within and without.

Facing north, he bows in reverence, visualizing the Heavenly Master. Then turning west, he visualizes the Patriarch of the Dao and Virtue. Facing south, he visualizes the Three Masters. Next turning east, he visualizes the Lords and Elders. Again facing south, he focuses on the Three Generals. Finally turning north, he visualizes the Most High Lord Lao. All the perfected beings merge together amidst clouds of blue, yellow, and white.

He then places the memorial upon the altar table, pays homage to the master, and visualizes as prescribed. The High Priest recites the **Guardian Spirit Incantation**, while the attendant officers burn the talismans.

**Secret Incantation:**
Vacuous and true sagely ones, serene in the lofty void,
With utmost sincerity I declare, secretly transmitting with devoted heart.
May all be simultaneously conveyed above, evoking responses in the mysterious and profound.
The heavens clear and bright, the Three Luminaries shining brilliantly.
Within the golden chamber and jade hall, the Five Mushrooms gleam with radiance.
The dark numinous purple canopy illuminates my body.
Jade Lads and Jade Maidens bring forth their efficacy for me.
The Five Thearchs align in splendor, the Three Spirits share the same chariot.
May I ascend on a flying canopy into the Purple Court.

**Talisman of the Five Directions’ Guardian Spirits** (See the *Morning and Evening Offering Rites* for the Five Directions’ Guardian Spirit Talismans.)

**Talisman for Summoning the Five Thearchs and Great Demons**

**Eastern Talisman (Mao Script, Eastern Qi)**
**Incantation:**
The Nine Heavens blaze with brilliance, heaven and earth share their numinosity.
Penetrating the obscure and reaching the luminous, myriad spirits gather like clouds.
Severing the roots of the six calamities, capturing and subduing demonic essences.
Riding the qi to seize the false, sweeping away and expelling malevolent spirits.

**Southern Talisman (Wu Script, Southern Qi)**
**Incantation:**
The vermilion watchtower stands majestic, the radiance of Li responds with splendor.
Bearing the heavens and shouldering the mountains, traversing the body to drink the wind.
Brandishing fire bells and wielding tablets, guarding the Three Palaces.
By the edict of the Jade Thearch, soaring into the Great Void.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Western Talisman (You Script, Western Qi)**
**Incantation:**
The vast numinous Great Void, the Seven Qi of the White Heavens.
Six eyes reverse the mountains, resplendent in flight as immortals.
The Golden Gate’s August Elder, transforming naturally.
The White Prime guards the chamber, riding the qi of the Mysterious Origin.

**Northern Talisman (Zi Script, Northern Qi)**
**Incantation:**
Wandering amidst the Five Qi, the dark numinous scatters like a whirlwind.
The Great Empress of the Rear holds her arrows, guiding the divine carriage’s finials.
Severing the gates of death, opening the obscure and desolate to life.
Holding talismans and wielding tablets, stepping swiftly into the Great Empyrean.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Central Talisman (Central Script, Yellow Qi)**
**Incantation:**
The One Qi divides the origin, the Yellow Center of the Grand Tenuity.
Dragon scripts and tiger talismans inspect and restrain the false.
Severing the roots of the six blades, divine transformations flow with radiance.
By the command of the Heavenly Thearch, all spirits know.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Talisman for Summoning the Document-Reviewing Officers** (Chen Script, Heavenly Gate Qi)

**Talisman for Summoning the Document-Inspecting and Document-Bearing Officers**
From the Mysterious Capital of the Orthodox Unity, the wondrous essence of the Great Flower.
True officials and superior spirits inspect and review the memorials.
Bearing and executing the memorials, summoning the myriad spirits and perfected beings.
The demonic laws of the Northern Feng shall not delay or linger.

**Talisman for Summoning the Document-Presenting, Document-Judging, and Document-Executing Officers**
**Incantation:**
By the numinous treasure’s talismanic command, summon all spirits below.
The Thearchs receive and uphold, aligning with the Heavenly Thearch.
Presenting to the Thearch and conveying above, judging and distinguishing clearly.
Resonating with the mysterious creation, ascending into the Purple Court.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Talisman for Summoning the Heavenly Ding Spirit Soldiers**
**Incantation:**
Within the Jade Clarity’s divine precincts, there are Heavenly Ding.
Spirit soldiers attend and uphold, obeying commands in unison.
By the Thearch’s edict, the messengers must heed.
Escorting the memorial, swiftly proceeding to the Jade Court.

**Talisman for Summoning the Heavenly Wrinkled-Armor Soldiers and Clerks**
**Incantation:**
Spirits of the Heavenly Thearch, dragon talismans and tiger scripts.
Soaring across the eight extremities, galloping to the Jade Capital.
I summon you to swiftly arrive, obeying the command to hasten like clouds.
Bearing my dark proclamation, swiftly proceeding to the Great Clarity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Talisman for Summoning the Banner-Bearing, Merit-Overseeing Great General**
**Incantation:**
Minister of the Jade Thearch, bearing banners and overseeing merit.
Flying clouds and feathered canopies ascend into the Mysterious Palace.
The Red Thearch of the Three and Five receives the command of the Primordial Ancestor.
Upholding the Orthodox Dao, stepping swiftly into the Great Void.

**Talisman for Summoning the Vigorous Wind Riders and Placement Officers**
**Incantation:**
Hurling fire for ten thousand miles, streaming bells through the eight thoroughfares.
The Capital’s Chief and Archery Master execute and ward off the inauspicious.
Vigorous wind riders and placement officers, flying steeds and six dragons.
Escorting and protecting the memorial, swiftly reaching the Mysterious Palace.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Talisman for Summoning the Four Divisions’ Merit-Overseeing Heralds and Deceit-Detecting Cavalry**
**Incantation:**
Deceit-detecting cavalry, the four divisions’ divine soldiers.
Commanding the ranks and formations, sweeping away malevolent vapors.
Inspecting heralds and attending riders hasten like clouds.
Conveying the supreme wishes, evoking responses from the Thearch’s numen.

**Talisman for Summoning the Left and Right Official Messengers and Yin-Yang Decision Clerks**
**Incantation:**
The two qi of heaven and earth, yin and yang initially divided.
Within the sun, moon, water, and fire, there are great spirits.
Preceding and following, ascending together into the cloudy heavens.
Left and right clerks and soldiers swiftly proceed before the Thearch.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Talisman for Communicating with the Perfected and Reaching the Numinous**
First make the Jade Clarity mudra, then press the Chou script, proceeding sequentially to Xu and Hai, returning to the Jade script.
**Incantation:**
By edict, within my body, the fetal radiance and obscure essence.
The luminous spirit transforms myriad forms, soaring into the Upper Clarity.
Driving spirits and seizing ghosts, penetrating the distant and obscure.
Fortune and misfortune, calamity and blessing follow like shadows.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

**Incantation:**
Within, there is that which is illuminated; without, there is that which is attended.

chunks.original_text: 开之朗然，了无影象。 高功依科出官，侍职焚出官符。 总咒： 中理五炁，混合百神。 运出官曹，侍卫径升。 上彻帝前，与道契灵。 形神俱妙，守一洞明。 玄朗太虚，朝谒玉清。 出官诀 五体真官功曹吏卯。 上仙上灵二官直使酉。 正一功曹子。 左右官使者午。 阴阳神决吏丑寅。 科车赤符使辰巳。 罡风骑置吏未中。 驿马上章吏戌。 飞龙骑吏等官亥。 狼吏虎贲坎。 察奸钩骑艮。 天驱甲卒艮。 天丁力士巽离坤兑。 监察考召甲子诸官君子轮至亥弹。 夫三箓斋发炉，并用洞元朝仪史兵。 若高功别受经箓，即当随所受法职，於发炉时关出吏兵矣。 出官符七道 天帝命灵，合景杳冥。 大梵流布，三光合明。 洞达万化，超神澄澄。 景曜会英，平虚华明。 开辟元始，神光洞真。 一炁御形，自然化生。 开图始青，御景太灵。 玄度万化，洞达杳冥。 生炁流布，合虚乘轻。 自然至真，理应帝灵。 云乘三素，上升玉庭。 洞朗无际，感悟玄明。 飞空素灵，出幽入冥。 神游太漠，玄覆黄宁。 通达至诚，内外俱荣。 深玄紫精，真中之神。 敷荣神室，宴御华英。 保固生炁，洞朗太溟。 万炁之宗，真中会灵。 保制大劫，固恃玄精。 四象发华，诸福毕臻。 出官总符天皇诀北斗炁 默咒曰： 体虚集，何出何入，此为之仪，呼出呼入。 宣章符 出官毕，表白三礼，高功前跪受章，副宣章，叩齿二十四通，存飞天神王，五色祥云，金甲朱衣，天丁力士，佩带宝剑，手执玉函，自天门至坛前所。 宣章密咒： 无上玄元，洞玄洞先。 太一佐使，御炁飞烟。 雍雍侃侃，褒服飞仙。 一瞬十极，总统万天。 阿滥那易，婆步昙延。 达落那顾，厥沦索连。 乘命玉辰，传令侍坛。 为宣化度，如律如编。 右咒默念七遍，望天门长引鼻炁七遍，即见神王，恭听斋意。 开函小吏符 咒曰：
chunks.translated_text:
The opening shines brightly, utterly devoid of shadow or form.
The High Priest, following the ritual protocol, exits his official position, while the attendant officers burn the talismans for summoning the officials.

**General Incantation:**
Within, the five qi are harmonized, uniting the hundred spirits.
They command the departure of the official bureaus, escorting and guarding the ascent.
Rising to the presence of the Emperor, they align with the Dao and commune with the numinous.
Form and spirit both attain perfection, abiding in unity and penetrating illumination.
Darkly radiant, vast as the void, they ascend to pay homage in the Jade Clarity.

**Summoning Gesture for Exiting Officials:**
The true officials of the Five Bodies and the lictors: *mao*.
The Upper Immortals and Upper Numinous Ones, the two direct envoys: *you*.
The Orthodox Unity lictors: *zi*.
The left and right official messengers: *wu*.
The yin-yang spirit-decision lictors: *chou* and *yin*.
The ritual chariot and vermilion talisman envoys: *chen* and *si*.
The wind-riding and post-station lictors: *wei* and *zhong*.
The memorial-riding couriers: *xu*.
The flying dragon-riding officials and others: *hai*.
The wolf lictors and tiger guards: *kan*.
The inspectors of deceit and hook-riding officers: *gen*.
The heavenly-driven armored soldiers: *gen*.
The Heavenly Ding warriors: *xun*, *li*, *kun*, and *dui*.
The supervisory and summoning officials of *jiazi* and others, rotating from *zi* to *hai*.

When the Three Registers ritual begins the incense burner, the *Dongyuan* protocol officers and soldiers are employed. If the High Priest has received additional scriptures and registers, he shall summon the corresponding ritual officers and soldiers at the time of lighting the incense, according to the methods he has received.

**Seven Talismans for Exiting Officials:**
The Celestial Emperor commands the numinous, merging with the distant and obscure.
The Great Brahma flows forth, the Three Luminaries unite in brilliance.
Penetrating the myriad transformations, transcending spirits in clarity.
Radiant splendor gathers in luminous assembly, the void blooms in resplendence.
Opening the primordial beginning, divine light illumines the true.
One qi governs form, spontaneously giving rise to transformation.
Unfolding the primordial chart in azure, riding the radiance of the Great Numinous.
Mysteriously traversing the myriad transformations, penetrating the distant and obscure.
Vital qi flows forth, merging with the void and ascending lightly.
Naturally attaining the utmost truth, resonating with the imperial numinous.
Riding the threefold-pure clouds, ascending to the Jade Court.
Luminously boundless, awakening to the mysterious and bright.
Soaring through the void, emerging from darkness into obscurity.
Spirits roam the Great Desert, the mysterious veils the Yellow Tranquility.
Communicating utmost sincerity, within and without both flourish.
Profound and purple essence, the spirit within the true.
Adorning the divine chamber, feasting upon the radiant blossoms.
Preserving and securing the vital qi, luminously vast as the primordial abyss.
The origin of the myriad qi, the assembly of the true within.
Guarding against the great kalpa, firmly relying on the mysterious essence.
The four symbols blossom forth, all blessings fully attained.

**General Talisman for Exiting Officials:**
The Celestial Sovereign’s Gesture and the qi of the Northern Dipper.

**Silent Incantation:**
The body gathers in emptiness—what departs, what enters?
This is the rite: summoning forth, calling inward.

**Proclaiming the Memorial Talisman:**
After the officials have been summoned, the Master of Ceremonies performs the Three Bows. The High Priest kneels to receive the memorial, while the assistant proclaims it. He knocks his teeth twenty-four times, visualizing the flying heavenly divine kings, five-colored auspicious clouds, golden-armored and vermilion-robed Heavenly Ding warriors, bearing jeweled swords and holding jade caskets, descending from the celestial gate to the altar.

**Secret Incantation for Proclaiming the Memorial:**
Supreme Mystery and Primordial, penetrating the mysterious and preceding all.
Great Unity’s assisting envoys, riding qi and soaring smoke.
Harmonious and reverent, clad in the robes of flying immortals.
In a single instant, the ten poles; governing the myriad heavens.
*Ālànnàyì*, *póbùtányán*.
*Dáluònàgù*, *juélúnsuǒlián*.
Riding the jade celestial moment, transmitting commands to attend the altar.
For proclaiming transformation and salvation, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

This incantation is silently recited seven times. Gazing toward the celestial gate, he draws in the celestial qi through his nose seven times, whereupon he beholds the divine kings, who reverently attend to the intent of the ritual.

**Talisman for the Minor Lictors Opening the Casket:**
**Incantation:**

chunks.original_text: 玉章琼文，上达三清。 飞迹升进，神诣谒真。 开函小吏，四司真君。 玉律元帅，监进将军。 急急如律令。 高功存金光道炁，自天门而降，捧章跪念。 开函咒： 四明功曹，开函小吏。 手执书刀，开发函轨。 奏章上闻，通达玄理。 臣得长生，事获终始。 取章咒： 臣章灵灵，敷以上清。 仙童玉女，开发龙函。 臣今闻奏，俓达帝庭。 取刀笔咒： 臣笔灵灵，改死注生。 朱为百药，笔为利刀。 邪神断绝，魔魅消亡。 五行正炁，何鬼敢当。 高功留章於案，拜伏。 念 霐不计数。 至宣章了，再捧章。 念 封章咒： 太上科禁，青素朱章。 随吾心意，俓造玄关。 真炁封闭，玉女捧函。 呈章从事，驱灭秽奸。 真元混结，直透天关。 去来无碍，出幽入间。 日月齐辉，天地循环。 高功存六金字在章，次取章在手，剔阴阳二斗二十八宿诀。 次掐开天门亥，塞鬼路寅，留人门申，破地户已。 次一转六神藏丑，二转个月明寅，三转四煞没卯，四转动魁呈辰，五转雷火腾巳，六转霹雳发午，七转山鬼死未，八转收摄一切邪魔，付五雷之下，入地万丈，无动无作。 急急如雷祖大帝律令。 自未顺至子，结雷局运章。 五转毕，留案上。 道众迎至祭章所，祭科中召出官将。 一法，先祭章，次第入坛。 高功就遣官。 遣官符 咒曰：
chunks.translated_text:
Jade missives of resplendent script, ascending to the Three Clarities.
Flying traces advance, spirits journey to pay homage to the Perfected.
Minor Lictors Opening the Casket, True Lords of the Four Offices.
Marshal of the Jade Statutes, Inspecting General of Advancement.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with statute and ordinance.*

The High Priest visualizes the golden light of Dao-qi descending from the celestial gate, cradles the missive, and kneels to recite:

**Incantation for Opening the Casket:**
Functionaries of the Four Luminaries, Minor Lictors Opening the Casket.
Wielding the script-knife, they unseal the casket’s mechanism.
Memorials ascend to be heard, conveying the profound principle.
May your servant attain longevity, and affairs reach their proper conclusion.

**Incantation for Retrieving the Missive:**
Your servant’s missive, numinous and radiant, unfurls to the Supreme Clarity.
Immortal youths and jade maidens unseal the dragon casket.
Your servant’s memorial now heard, swiftly reaches the imperial court.

**Incantation for Taking the Brush and Knife:**
Your servant’s brush, numinous and radiant, transforms death into life.
Cinnabar becomes the hundred medicines, the brush a sharpened blade.
Malevolent spirits severed, demonic apparitions annihilated.
The upright qi of the Five Agents—what ghost dare withstand it?

The High Priest places the missive upon the altar and prostrates. He recites the *hōng-lóng-hōng* incantation innumerable times. Upon concluding the proclamation of the missive, he again cradles it.

**Incantation for Sealing the Missive:**
The Most High’s statutes and prohibitions, azure and vermilion missives.
Following my heart’s intent, swiftly forging the mysterious barrier.
True qi seals it shut, jade maidens bear the casket.
Presenting the missive for action, expelling and annihilating defilement and treachery.
The primordial origin coalesces, piercing straight through the celestial barrier.
Coming and going without hindrance, emerging from darkness into the world of men.
Sun and moon shine in unison, heaven and earth cycle in harmony.

The High Priest visualizes six golden characters upon the missive, then takes it in hand, tracing the yin-yang Dipper and the twenty-eight constellations. Next, he presses the *kāi tiānmén* (Open Celestial Gate) at *hài*, blocks the demonic path at *yín*, preserves the human gate at *shēn*, and breaks the earthly portal at *sì*. Then, in sequence:

First revolution: the Six Spirits conceal at *chǒu*.
Second revolution: the Moon Brightens at *yín*.
Third revolution: the Four Malevolences vanish at *mǎo*.
Fourth revolution: the Celestial Pivot stirs at *chén*.
Fifth revolution: thunderfire soars at *sì*.
Sixth revolution: thunderclaps erupt at *wǔ*.
Seventh revolution: mountain demons perish at *wèi*.
Eighth revolution: all malevolent spirits and demons are gathered and consigned beneath the Five Thunders, plunging ten thousand fathoms into the earth, never to move or act again.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Thunder Ancestor Great Emperor.*

From *wèi*, he proceeds in sequence to *zǐ*, structuring the thunder formation to convey the missive. After five revolutions, he leaves it upon the altar. The Daoist assembly escorts it to the missive-offering site, where, according to the ritual protocol, the summoned officials and generals are called forth. In one method, the missive is first offered, then the assembly enters the altar in order. The High Priest proceeds to dispatch the officials.

**Day and Hour Formula for the Qi of the Chen Direction**

chunks.original_text: 飞神谒帝门 罡法 甲日罡步，自子位起。 青龙即本日，活天门方。 甲日合，呼天门地户神玉女姓名。 天门神，天可。 地户神，公孙齐。 丁玉女，顺炁。 庚玉女，拜精。 神将袁，威令。 功曹杜，文华。 童子杨，精。 香官桂，清吏。 右八位，前四位於步罡咒内呼之，其余并写於关牒内。 己日罡步，自戌上起。 青龙即本日，活天门方。 己日合，呼天门地户神玉女姓名。 天门神徐，义。 地户神徐，可。 丁主女，足日之。 庚玉女，绛宫。 神将萧，子元。 功曹子，惠机。 童子，阴精。 香官从，长卿。 右八位，前四位於步罡咒内呼之，其余并写於关牒内。 乙庚日，罡步自申位起，青龙即日，活天门方。 乙庚日合，呼天门地户神玉女姓名。 天门神司马，光。 地户神石，战。 丁玉女曹，漂之。 庚玉女，青腰。 乙日将季，仲文。 功曹唐，元化。 童子，震精。 香官留，伯牙。 庚日将侯，道静。 功曹邓，康宁。 童子金，精。 香官辛，飞呜。 右前四位，步罡召之，后将入关牒。 丙辛日，罡步自午起，青龙即本日，活天门方。 丙辛日合，呼天门地户神玉女姓名。 天门神石，众。 地户神于，可。 丁玉女，得善。 庚玉女，太玄。 丙日将苏，恭明。 功曹炎，在精。 童子，赤精。 香官虚，日应。 辛日将金，汤侯。 功曹安，伯虎。 童子，光精。 香官雷，述景。 右前四位，丙辛二日同，后将各直本日。 丁壬日，罡步自辰位起，青龙即本日天门方。 丁壬日天门地户神玉女姓名。 天门神公孙，错。 地户神马，胜。 丁玉女，寄房。 庚玉女，黄素。 丁日将潜，岳灵。 功曹丘，庭西。 童子，流精。 香官鲁，子愚。 壬日将季，永福。 功曹刘，斗峰。 童子，水精。 香官揆，子华。 右前四位将，丁壬二日同，后将各直本日。 戊癸日，罡步自寅位起，青龙即本日，活天门方。 戊癸日合，呼天门地户神玉女姓名。 天门神公孙，光。 地户神司马，强。 丁玉女，问心之。 庚玉女，太素。 戊日将全，混成。 功曹闾，多性。 童子，土精。 香官风，东化。 癸日将洮，朱文。 功曹星，汉光。 童子，乾精。 香官深，开通。 右前四位，戊癸二日同，后将各直本日。 外坛咒神霄炁诀 神霄玉清，兴卫中朝。 今日勑下，降自九霄。 命神召神，摄掌功曹。 玉文敷告，立应天条。 吾行真箓，适我参调。 通天咒 天辅无私，乾象通微。 无幽无冥，无感不知。 佩带符图，神兵任呼。 我位上王，位登天都。 左手紫微印，右同秉圭，步入坛。 飞步接本日青龙位，自甲上起步，咒至丁止。 三天朝元符 咒曰 北帝玄黄，天地宁，日月明。 登紫府，谒天庭。 披三台，蹑七星。 入天蓬，召子京。 向天冲，紫炁停。 呼北斗，振火铃。 踏璇玑，履玉衡。 睹真人，拜皇星。 受玉箓，万神惊。 知生死，洞杳冥。 预知吉凶，近知人情，五行侍从，六甲相迎。 北斗天师，与我同行。 人道兴，鬼道灭。 下鬼妖魔，北斗然骨。 闻吾咒勑，头破脑裂。 急急如律令。 步至丁上，并足立，呼玉女名，想至。 召真玉符 咒曰 玉女玉女，天神至矣。 丁上玉女，来护我身。 无令百鬼，中持伤我。 莫使人见我，见我者以为束薪，不见我者以为非人。 独开我门，以闭他人。 急急如律令。 左足三蹴於天门，呼本日神名。 通神宝符 咒曰

**Ascending in Spirit to the Emperor’s Gate: The Dipper-Stepping Method**

**On Jia Days:**
Step the Dipper beginning at the *zi* position. The Azure Dragon aligns with the day’s active Heavenly Gate direction.
For Jia days, invoke the names of the Heavenly Gate, Earthly Door deities, and Jade Maidens:
- Heavenly Gate Deity: Tian Ke
- Earthly Door Deity: Gongsun Qi
- Ding Jade Maiden: Shun Qi
- Geng Jade Maiden: Bai Jing
- Divine Marshal: Yuan, "Mighty Command"
- Merit Officer: Du, "Cultured Splendor"
- Youth: Yang, "Essence"
- Incense Official: Gui, "Pure Clerk"

Of these eight, the first four are called within the Dipper-stepping incantation; the remainder are inscribed in the memorial document.

**On Ji Days:**
Step the Dipper beginning at the *xu* position. The Azure Dragon aligns with the day’s active Heavenly Gate direction.
For Ji days, invoke the names of the Heavenly Gate, Earthly Door deities, and Jade Maidens:
- Heavenly Gate Deity: Xu, "Righteousness"
- Earthly Door Deity: Xu, "Permitted"
- Ding Jade Maiden: Zu Ri Zhi
- Geng Jade Maiden: Jiang Gong
- Divine Marshal: Xiao, "Ziyuan"
- Merit Officer: Zi, "Hui Ji"
- Youth: Yin Jing
- Incense Official: Cong, "Changqing"

Of these eight, the first four are called within the Dipper-stepping incantation; the remainder are inscribed in the memorial document.

**On Yi and Geng Days:**
Step the Dipper beginning at the *shen* position. The Azure Dragon aligns with the day.
For Yi and Geng days, invoke the names of the Heavenly Gate, Earthly Door deities, and Jade Maidens:
- Heavenly Gate Deity: Sima, "Radiance"
- Earthly Door Deity: Shi, "War"
- Ding Jade Maiden: Cao, "Piao Zhi"
- Geng Jade Maiden: Qing Yao
On Yi days:
- Marshal: Ji, "Zhongwen"
- Merit Officer: Tang, "Yuanhua"
- Youth: Zhen Jing
- Incense Official: Liu, "Boya"
On Geng days:
- Marshal: Hou, "Daojing"
- Merit Officer: Deng, "Kangning"
- Youth: Jin Jing
- Incense Official: Xin, "Feiming"

The first four are summoned during Dipper-stepping; the latter marshals are entered into the memorial document.

**On Bing and Xin Days:**
Step the Dipper beginning at the *wu* position. The Azure Dragon aligns with the day’s active Heavenly Gate direction.
For Bing and Xin days, invoke the names of the Heavenly Gate, Earthly Door deities, and Jade Maidens:
- Heavenly Gate Deity: Shi, "Multitude"
- Earthly Door Deity: Yu, "Permitted"
- Ding Jade Maiden: De Shan
- Geng Jade Maiden: Tai Xuan
On Bing days:
- Marshal: Su, "Gongming"
- Merit Officer: Yan, "Zaijing"
- Youth: Chi Jing
- Incense Official: Xu, "Riying"
On Xin days:
- Marshal: Jin, "Tanghou"
- Merit Officer: An, "Bohu"
- Youth: Guang Jing
- Incense Official: Lei, "Shujing"

The first four are the same for both Bing and Xin days; the latter marshals serve their respective days.

**On Ding and Ren Days:**
Step the Dipper beginning at the *chen* position. The Azure Dragon aligns with the day’s Heavenly Gate direction.
For Ding and Ren days, invoke the names of the Heavenly Gate, Earthly Door deities, and Jade Maidens:
- Heavenly Gate Deity: Gongsun, "Cuo"
- Earthly Door Deity: Ma, "Victory"
- Ding Jade Maiden: Ji Fang
- Geng Jade Maiden: Huang Su
On Ding days:
- Marshal: Qian, "Yueling"
- Merit Officer: Qiu, "Tingxi"
- Youth: Liu Jing
- Incense Official: Lu, "Ziyu"
On Ren days:
- Marshal: Ji, "Yongfu"
- Merit Officer: Liu, "Doufeng"
- Youth: Shui Jing
- Incense Official: Kui, "Zihua"

The first four marshals are the same for both Ding and Ren days; the latter serve their respective days.

**On Wu and Gui Days:**
Step the Dipper beginning at the *yin* position. The Azure Dragon aligns with the day’s active Heavenly Gate direction.
For Wu and Gui days, invoke the names of the Heavenly Gate, Earthly Door deities, and Jade Maidens:
- Heavenly Gate Deity: Gongsun, "Radiance"
- Earthly Door Deity: Sima, "Strength"
- Ding Jade Maiden: Wen Xin Zhi
- Geng Jade Maiden: Tai Su
On Wu days:
- Marshal: Quan, "Hun Cheng"
- Merit Officer: Lü, "Duoxing"
- Youth: Tu Jing
- Incense Official: Feng, "Donghua"
On Gui days:
- Marshal: Tao, "Zhuwen"
- Merit Officer: Xing, "Hangguang"
- Youth: Qian Jing
- Incense Official: Shen, "Kaitong"

The first four are the same for both Wu and Gui days; the latter marshals serve their respective days.

**Outer Altar Incantation: Divine Empyrean Qi Formula**
*Divine Empyrean, Jade Clarity,*
*Rise to guard the Central Court.*
*Today’s decree descends*
*From the Nine Empyreans.*
*Command the gods to summon gods,*
*Seize and hold the Merit Officers.*
*The Jade Script is proclaimed,*
*Instantly fulfilling Heaven’s statutes.*
*I enact the true register,*
*Attuning myself to the Three Harmonies.*

**Heaven-Penetrating Incantation**
*Heaven aids without partiality,*
*The Qian image penetrates the subtle.*
*No darkness, no obscurity—*
*Nothing is unfelt, nothing unknown.*
*Bearing talismanic charts,*
*Divine soldiers answer my call.*
*I stand as the Upper King,*
*My rank ascends to Heaven’s Capital.*
*Left hand: Purple Tenuity Seal;*
*Right hand: holding the jade tablet,*
*Step into the altar.*
*Ascend to the day’s Azure Dragon position,*
*Begin stepping at Jia, recite until Ding.*

**Three Heavens Audience-Attaining Talisman**
*Incantation:*
*Northern Emperor, Mysterious Yellow,*
*Heaven and Earth at peace, Sun and Moon bright.*
*Ascend the Purple Palace, attend the Heavenly Court.*
*Unveil the Three Terraces, tread the Seven Stars.*
*Enter the Heavenly Vanguard, summon Zijing.*
*Face the Heavenly Surge, Purple Qi abides.*
*Call the Northern Dipper, shake the Fire Bell.*
*Tread the Jade Armillary, stride the Jade Balance.*
*Behold the Perfected, bow to the August Star.*
*Receive the Jade Register—ten thousand gods tremble.*
*Know life and death, fathom the profound.*
*Foretell fortune and misfortune,*
*Discern human sentiments.*
*Five Phases attend, Six Jia welcome.*
*The Northern Dipper Celestial Master walks with me.*
*The human Dao flourishes, the ghostly Dao perishes.*
*Lesser ghosts and demonic specters—*
*The Northern Dipper burns their bones.*
*At my incantation’s decree,*
*Their heads shatter, their brains split.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

Step to Ding, stand with feet together, call the Jade Maiden’s name, and visualize her arrival.

**Summoning the Perfected Jade Talisman**
*Incantation:*
*Jade Maiden, Jade Maiden,*
*The celestial gods have arrived.*
*Jade Maiden of Ding,*
*Come and guard my body.*
*Let no hundred ghosts*
*Dare to harm me.*
*Let none see me—*
*Those who see me take me for bundled firewood,*
*Those who do not see me take me for a non-human.*
*Open only my gate,*
*Seal all others’.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

Strike the Heavenly Gate thrice with the left foot, call the day’s deity’s name.

**Spirit-Penetrating Treasure Talisman**
*Incantation:*

chunks.original_text: 天门天门，今日为良。 玉女侍我，左右游傍。 往来出入，不逢祸殃。 天神一见，喜悦非常。 欲求如意，万事吉昌。 急急如律令。 次入步右足，三蹴於地户，呼本日神名。 开灵玉符 咒曰 诺诺译译，行不择日。 返不择时，随斗所指。 与神俱移，天地覆载。 心有所欲，皆得如意。 急急如律令。 次步至天藏位，符焚於地户上。 遁景玉符 吾是天目，与道相逐，睛如雷电，光耀八极。 彻视表里，无物不伏。 急急如律令。 次回步天庭位，召庚玉女名。 变化玉符 咒曰 玉女玉女，天神至矣。 庚上玉女，来护我身。 毋令百鬼，中持伤我。 莫使人见我，见我者以为束薪，不见我者以为非人。 独我开门，而闭他人。 急急如律令。 次步入内天门立，焚符。 通天玉符 次自斗柄，步至魁星，七步。 咒曰： 元始太真，五灵高尊。 太帝皓映，洞朗八门。 五老诰命，无幽不闻。 上御九天，中制酆山。 下镇江海，十二泉源。 八威神咒，灵册玉文。 召龙负水，收炁聚云。 束魔送鬼，扫荡妖群。 万精摧落，所诛无蠲。 日月五星，北斗七元。 合明天帝、勅下太玄。 诸天诸地，诸水诸山。 玉真所部，溟冷大神。 天王游宴，五帝仗旛。 天丁前驱，金虎后奔。 镢天猛兽，罗闭四门。 所呼立至，所召趋前。 赤书豁落，风火无间。 有所摄言，金龙驿传。 入圣景玉符 咒曰 北斗天关正八方，摄炁召神除万殃。 日月回环星辰光，四景明度转天常。 七天行道尊帝王，轮会明达激灾殃。 九灵制命升玉堂。 次出斗，步三台，望文昌，心礼三拜，回身入斗口，实礼天皇，三拜转步。 次存横列五星，焕明如日。 天一，太一，天门，天枢，天机。 次飞步三台。 上台一黄，保我千龄。 中台六淳，卫我魂神。 下台曲生，上谒三清。 次飞步九灵。 每步念灵： 游光灵，天路灵，玉堂灵，虚梵灵，元皇灵，紫光灵，荣神灵，天幽灵，神全灵。 高功三拜就伏。 焚章符火铃诀天罡炁 念合明天帝日咒。 开天符玉文祖炁 书符咒 三清降勑，日月合明户太上治命，统制万灵。 天洞天真，速降威灵。 上通天阙，开道玄穹。 三部使者，玉女灵童。 阴阳决吏，持火当凶。 冲除浩炁，大破罡风。 又咒 灵宝玉符，金房秀英。 刚风洞焕，通真达灵。 万神侍送，五帝伺迎。 朝谒三境，与道合并。 勑咒 玉皇有命，勑下刚风。 万仞摧毁，九天潜通。 承符奉令，黄道无穷。 又咒 天门四开，黄道正平。 承符奉令，敢有稽停。 符中将吏，速逞威灵。 罡风浩炁，金马驿程。 保章上达符上天炁开天诀 升真度火符 勑咒

**Heavenly Gate Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Heavenly Gate, Heavenly Gate,
This day is auspicious.
The Jade Maiden attends me,
Flanking me left and right.
In all my comings and goings,
May no misfortune befall.
Should the celestial gods behold me,
Their joy shall be boundless.
Whatever I seek shall be granted,
All affairs prosperous and bright.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

Step forward with the right foot, strike the Earthly Door thrice, and call the day’s deity’s name.

**Opening Numinous Jade Talisman**
*Incantation:*
*Nuò nuò yì yì,*
I walk without choosing the day,
I return without choosing the hour,
Following the Dipper’s guidance.
Moving with the gods,
Heaven and earth bear me forth.
Whatever my heart desires,
All shall be as I wish.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

Step to the Heavenly Treasury position and burn the talisman over the Earthly Door.

**Vanishing Light Jade Talisman**
I am the Heavenly Eye,
Pursuing the Dao,
My gaze like thunder and lightning,
Radiant to the eight directions.
Piercing all within and without,
No being dares defy me.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

Return to the Heavenly Court position and summon the Jade Maiden of Geng.

**Transformation Jade Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Jade Maiden, Jade Maiden,
The celestial gods have arrived.
Jade Maiden of Geng,
Come and guard my body.
Let no hundred ghosts
Dare to harm me.
Let none see me—
Those who see me take me for bundled firewood,
Those who do not see me take me for a non-human.
Open only my gate,
Seal all others’.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

Step into the Inner Heavenly Gate and stand, then burn the talisman.

**Heaven-Penetrating Jade Talisman**

From the Dipper’s handle, step to the Star of Literary Brilliance, seven steps.

*Incantation:*
Primal Origin, Supreme Perfected,
Five Numinous Ones, exalted and revered.
The Radiant Emperor shines resplendent,
Illuminating the eight gates.
The Five Elders’ decrees,
No hidden thing escapes their hearing.
Above, they govern the Nine Heavens,
In the center, they restrain Mount Feng.
Below, they pacify rivers and seas,
The twelve springs’ sources.
The Eight Might Talismans,
Numinous scriptures of jade.
Summon dragons to bear water,
Gather qi and amass clouds.
Bind demons, dispatch ghosts,
Sweep away hordes of malevolence.
Ten thousand spirits shattered,
None spared from execution.
Sun, moon, and five planets,
The Northern Dipper’s seven origins.
Conjoined with the Bright Celestial Emperor,
Command issued to the Supreme Mystery.
All heavens, all earths,
All waters, all mountains.
The jade perfected ones’ hosts,
The vast and frigid great gods.
Celestial kings at their revels,
Five Emperors bearing banners.
Heavenly soldiers lead the way,
Golden tigers rush behind.
Mighty beasts of Heaven’s Gate,
Enclose and seal the four directions.
Those called arrive at once,
Those summoned hasten forward.
Crimson writs of deliverance,
Wind and fire unceasing.
Whatever is commanded,
Golden dragons swiftly transmit.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.*

**Entering the Sacred Radiance Jade Talisman**
*Incantation:*
The Northern Dipper’s Celestial Pass aligns the eight directions,
Drawing qi to summon gods and dispel ten thousand ills.
Sun and moon revolve, stars shine,
The four seasons’ brightness turns Heaven’s constant.
The Seven Heavens’ path honors the emperor,
Wheel and assembly dispel calamity.
The Nine Numinous Ones decree ascent to the Jade Hall.

Exit the Dipper, step the Three Terraces, face the Star of Literary Brilliance, and bow thrice in reverence. Turn and enter the Dipper’s mouth, then bow sincerely to the Celestial August One thrice before stepping aside.

Next, visualize the five stars arrayed horizontally, blazing bright as the sun:
Heavenly One, Supreme One, Heavenly Gate, Heavenly Pivot, Heavenly Mechanism.

Next, fly-step the Three Terraces:
The Upper Terrace’s yellow essence preserves my thousand years,
The Middle Terrace’s sixfold purity guards my hun and spirit,
The Lower Terrace’s Curved Life ascends to pay homage to the Three Clarities.

Next, fly-step the Nine Numinous Ones.
With each step, intone a numen:
Wandering Light Numen,
Heavenly Path Numen,
Jade Hall Numen,
Void Brahma Numen,
Primal August Numen,
Purple Light Numen,
Flourishing Spirit Numen,
Heavenly Secluded Numen,
Spirit-Completing Numen.

The High Master bows thrice and prostrates.

Burn the petition talisman, ring the fire bell, and perform the Heavenly Stem qi mudra.

Recite the Conjoined Brightness Celestial Emperor’s solar incantation.

**Opening Heaven Talisman**
*Jade Writ of the Ancestral Qi*
*Talisman Inscription Incantation:*
The Three Clarities issue their decree,
Sun and moon conjoin in brightness.
The Supreme Lord commands the household,
Governing and restraining the ten thousand spirits.
Heavenly Cavern, Heavenly Perfected,
Swiftly descend with your numinous might.
Above, communicate with Heaven’s gates,
Open the mysterious vault.
Envoys of the Three Bureaus,
Jade maidens and numinous youths,
Yin-yang adjudicators,
Wielding fire against misfortune.
Piercing and dispelling the vast qi,
Shattering the mighty stem winds.

*Further Incantation:*
Numinous Treasure Jade Talisman,
Golden chamber’s elegant bloom.
The rigid wind shines resplendent,
Communicating with the perfected, reaching the numinous.
Ten thousand gods attend and escort,
Five Emperors await and welcome.
Paying homage to the Three Realms,
Merging with the Dao.

*Decree Incantation:*
The Jade Emperor commands,
Issuing his decree to the rigid wind.
Ten thousand fathoms shattered,
The Nine Heavens secretly opened.
Bearing the talisman, obeying the decree,
The Yellow Path knows no end.

*Further Incantation:*
The four Heavenly Gates open wide,
The Yellow Path lies level and true.
Bearing the talisman, obeying the decree,
Dare none delay or linger.
The talisman’s generals and officers,
Swiftly display your numinous might.
Stem winds and vast qi,
Golden horses’ courier route.
The Petition Preserver ascends, the talisman reaches Heaven,
The qi opens Heaven’s decree.

**Ascending Perfected Fire-Passing Talisman**
*Decree Incantation*

chunks.original_text: 一符 二符 三符 咒曰 太上帝君，仙都大人。 今日告曰，八门开张。 欲求上法，度世长生。 敢告灵源。 右符朱书，法师服之三道。 候审覆焚於室中，外斗，待报应。 已上并用玉清诀。 先默朝，次以大经，请降元始宝光，布於符上，焚於坛中，即达三天妙境矣。 复炉符中文玉诀 咒曰 我身面奉玉宸真，奉敕回生起死身。 三魂同下虚无路，上帝颁符召北辰。 左右卫灵还玉户，随吾呼吸达灵真。 魔凶敢犯吾旌节，束缚游魂付大神。 审章咒 天地洞开，我道奉行。 神随炁有，应金玉京。 速召玉女，斩绝三彭。 静宁血炁，使我聪明。 天心灵官，符宝仙卿。 速降速现，知死知生。 急急如律令。 审章咒毕，如有报应，称以闻，告诸符。 伏章法 师定息，舌柱上腭，存坛下有紫灵车将吏兵马，各从十方而来，兆登车而上。 存天上地下，四方空寂无有。 诀曰：紫云车，乃转地轴，令白炁自下丹田，上升泥丸。 须臾见金门而入，惟见金光万道，照映兆身，内外莹彻，忽见宝珠悬於空中，乃心礼默奏所事。 毕，须臾珠有万道金玉之光，遍照十方世界，一时明了。 见一真人，就兆手接章而上，人奏太上。 少顷一玉童传言密报。 次以闻，兆三礼而退却。 存自天门而下，至坛，觉真炁盈溢，以意纳下丹田，默念审章咒，而兴三礼纳官。 师次复官，复炉，引道众下坛。 出户符上帝诀天门炁 早午出户咒 出阴入场，万神开张。 开启车毕，请闭黄房。 侍靖玉女，明备神宫。 急急如律令。 晚出户咒 玄上太阴，八窗开明。 向有所启，少女通灵。 事毕复位，万神潜宁。 急急如律令。 出堂，向来，回向，四结愿叙谢。 护章法 存玉女童君，笼官将吏，罗列於天门方上左右。 咒曰：某事拜某章一通，请汝等火急。 为吾赍诣三天门下，急急奉行。 咒曰掐玉清诀 唵毗呢咤摩呢尼意萨诃。 咒毕，燔杨柴，取天罡炁，吹天中，散妖秽之炁。 次掐五雷印，闪目为电，耳发雷，鼻出风。 存灵官玉女功曹史兵，擎捧章函，拥卫上升霄汉。 口中噀水授章，以烈火焚之。 存章去时，慎勿慢易。 伏地平坐，舌柱上腭，则自己真人，於玉女手中接章，入绛宫，见太乙司命君乃三一也，如莲实大。 陈词竟，闭炁，自腭登金房玉室，入见於洞房，谒太清奏。 毕，入太清。 次入上清。 次入玉清帝阙。 一一奏毕，即存九宫出三色炁，混合一室，结化三尊，为一自己真人，具法服如常仪，出泥丸。 依九灵经旨，行飞步九灵，登三天门云章存历奏，恭俟玄应。 太清可，上清依，玉清允，玉帝下。 毕，却存自己依旧回入丹宫卧息，太一前对三尊。 到此忘形，听於克应，方兴身以闻。 进章诀 凡为国家生灵大事，须谒三天门下，省内朝毕。 存五方大灵洞阳五色，在五方结为五方光晕。 三天太一紫云，悬荫一身。 其光下入泥丸，左九转，心中右九转，混合帝宅，上下三次。 即存心出赤炁，上升于天，如长虹之状。 自己如常法存仪，入赤炁，运转上行数百里，见日月黄道横截，乃星界。 次过西北行，又千里，遥见紫云隐隐，乃三天门。 先诣青龙宫，启太一元生帝君。 次南诣凤凰阙阁下，白道德众尊。 次西过少昊金楼阙下，启正一天师三师君。 次回还中宫，便俓诣玄冥宫中北极太真门下，上白太一大帝君。

**First Talisman, Second Talisman, Third Talisman**

**Incantation:**
Supreme Thearch Lord, Immortal Capital’s Great One,
On this day we proclaim: the Eight Gates unfold.
Seeking the supreme method, transcending the world to attain long life,
We dare to invoke the Spirit Source.

The talismans above are to be inscribed in cinnabar. The Dharma Master consumes three of them. Awaiting review, they are burned within the chamber, outside the Dipper, until a response manifests. All the above employs the Yuqing mudra.

First silently pay homage, then with the Great Scripture, invoke the descent of the Primordial Treasure Radiance, spreading it upon the talismans. Burn them upon the altar, and they shall reach the wondrous realms of the Three Heavens.

**Mudra for the Talisman’s Text within the Censer**

**Incantation:**
My body faces the Jade Celestial Perfected,
Receiving the decree to revive the dead and raise the lifeless.
The Three Hun descend together upon the path of emptiness,
The Thearch bestows the talisman to summon the Northern Asterism.
Left and right, the guardian spirits return to the Jade Portal,
Following my breath to reach the numinous perfected.
Should demonic forces dare violate my banner,
Bind their wandering souls and deliver them to the Great Spirit.

**Petition-Reviewing Incantation:**
Heaven and Earth open thoroughly; my Dao follows its course.
Spirits accompany qi’s presence, responding to the Golden Jade Capital.
Swiftly summon the Jade Maidens to sever the Three Peng.
Pacify the blood and qi, rendering me keen and bright.
Heavenly Heart Numinous Officials, Talisman Treasure Immortal Ministers,
Descend swiftly, manifest swiftly, discerning life and death.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in statutes and ordinances!*

Upon completing the Petition-Reviewing Incantation, if a response manifests, announce it upon hearing, and declare it to the talismans.

**Petition-Submitting Method:**
The Master regulates breath, the tongue presses the upper palate, and visualizes beneath the altar: a Purple Numinous Chariot with generals, officers, soldiers, and cavalry arriving from the ten directions. The adept boards the chariot and ascends.

Visualize the heavens above and the earth below, the four directions empty and silent.

**Mudra:**
Purple Cloud Chariot, revolving the earth’s axis,
Direct the white qi from the lower Cinnabar Field to ascend to the Mud Pill.
Presently, behold the Golden Gate and enter; only myriad golden rays illuminate the adept’s body, inside and out, crystalline and clear. Suddenly, a treasure pearl hangs in the void—here, the adept silently presents the matter at heart.

Upon completion, the pearl emits myriad rays of golden and jade light, illuminating all worlds in an instant. A perfected one approaches, takes the petition from the adept’s hand, and ascends to present it to the Supreme. After a moment, a Jade Youth delivers a secret report.

Then, announce what is heard. The adept performs three bows and withdraws, visualizing descent from the Heavenly Gate to the altar. Sensing true qi overflowing, with intention gather it into the lower Cinnabar Field. Silently recite the Petition-Reviewing Incantation, rise to perform three bows, and conclude the audience.

The Master then resumes the audience, restores the censer, and leads the Dao assembly down from the altar.

**Exiting the Chamber Talisman: Supreme Thearch Mudra of the Heavenly Gate’s Qi**

**Morning Exit Incantation:**
Emerging from yin, entering the arena, the myriad spirits unfold.
Upon opening the chariot’s completion, request the closure of the Yellow Chamber.
Serene Jade Maidens stand ready, luminously prepared within the divine palace.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in statutes and ordinances!*

**Evening Exit Incantation:**
Mystic Supreme Yin, the Eight Windows gleam bright.
Should there be a matter to present, the Maiden communicates the numinous.
Upon completion, all return to their stations; the myriad spirits withdraw in tranquility.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in statutes and ordinances!*

Upon exiting the hall, face the origin, perform the *hui xiang*, and conclude with the Fourfold Vows, expressing gratitude.

**Petition-Protecting Method:**
Visualize the Jade Maiden and Youthful Lord, encircling officials, generals, and officers, arrayed to the left and right above the Heavenly Gate’s direction.

**Incantation:**
For such-and-such matter, I present such-and-such petition once.
I beseech you all to act with utmost urgency,
Bearing it swiftly to the Three Heavenly Gates below.
*Swiftly, swiftly, carry it out!*

**Incantation (while forming the Yuqing mudra):**
*Oṃ vaṇi cakṣumaṇi ye svāhā.*

Upon completing the incantation, burn willow wood, gather the Celestial Stem’s qi, and blow it toward the heavens to disperse the qi of demonic defilement. Next, form the Five Thunder Seal: flash the eyes as lightning, let the ears emit thunder, and the nose exhale wind.

Visualize the Numinous Officials, Jade Maidens, Merit Officers, Scribes, and soldiers bearing and escorting the petition case, ascending to the clouds and heavens. Rinse the mouth with water, spray it upon the petition, and burn it with fierce fire. As the petition departs, take care not to treat it lightly.

Prostrate and sit evenly, the tongue pressing the upper palate. Then, visualize your own perfected self receiving the petition from the Jade Maiden’s hands, entering the Crimson Palace to meet the Great One of the Controller of Destinies—this is the Three Ones, like a lotus seed in size. Upon concluding the address, hold the breath, ascend from the palate to the Golden Chamber and Jade Chamber, entering the Grotto Chamber to present it to the Supreme Clarity. Upon completion, enter the Supreme Clarity, then the Highest Clarity, and finally the Jade Clarity’s Imperial Palace. Present each in turn.

Then, visualize the Nine Palaces emitting three-colored qi, blending within a single chamber to coalesce into the Three Honored Ones. From this, your own perfected self emerges, clad in ritual vestments as usual, exiting the Mud Pill. Follow the *Nine Numinous Scripture*’s instructions, perform the Flying Steps of the Nine Numinous, ascend the Three Heavenly Gates, and visualize the cloud petition’s sequential presentation, reverently awaiting the mysterious response.

If the Supreme Clarity approves, the Highest Clarity follows; if the Jade Clarity consents, the Jade Thearch descends.

Upon completion, visualize your own self returning as before to recline within the Cinnabar Palace, facing the Three Honored Ones before the Great One. At this point, forget form and await the fulfillment of the response before rising to announce it.

**Petition-Presenting Mudra:**
For matters of great import concerning the state and living beings, one must approach the Three Heavenly Gates below and complete the inner audience.

Visualize the Five Directions’ Great Numinous Yang of five colors forming luminous halos in their respective directions. The Three Heavens’ Great One’s Purple Clouds hang suspended, shading the entire body. Their light descends into the Mud Pill, revolving nine times to the left, nine times to the right within the heart, blending with the Imperial Abode, ascending and descending three times.

Then, visualize the heart emitting red qi, ascending to the heavens like a long rainbow. As usual, visualize the adept’s form entering the red qi, revolving and ascending for hundreds of miles until beholding the sun and moon’s Yellow Path intersecting—this is the stellar realm.

Next, proceed northwest for another thousand miles, where faint purple clouds appear in the distance—these are the Three Heavenly Gates. First, visit the Azure Dragon Palace to present the matter to the Supreme One of Primordial Life. Then, journey south to the Phoenix Tower’s pavilion below to report to the Host of the Dao and Virtue. Next, pass west to the Metal Tower’s pavilion below the Lesser Brilliance to present it to the Orthodox Heavenly Master and the Three Master Lords. Finally, return to the Central Palace and proceed to the Dark Obscurity Palace’s Northern Culmen True Gate below to present it to the Supreme One Great Thearch Lord.

Next, ascend to the Golden Portal’s towering jeweled hall to pay homage to the Supreme Thearch. Upon reaching the Jade Steps below, place the memorial upon the jade table, where it is received by the attendant numinous consorts—the Radiant Azure-Winged White Jade Maidens of Great Mystery and the Vermilion Phoenix Lads—who swiftly convey it to the throne. Here, one awaits the mysterious grace; at this stage, it is no longer mere visualization, for the intent must merge with non-action to attain it.

Unless one is a Yang Spirit Earth Immortal capable of commanding the numinous consorts of the Six Jia, one may not behold the Thearch. If, through inner audience with the Three Venerables of the Great One’s Mandated Spirits, one enters the Dao and transforms the primordial, then one is no longer confined to the celestial vaults—attainment lies within oneself, and one may thereby summon the Ten Heavens at will. Conclude the visualization as at the outset.

**Method for Inner Audience with the Supreme Thearch to Open the Gates**

At a point three *fen* inward from the space between the brows lies the Golden Terrace and Jade Portal. The left brow is the Yellow Portal Divine Master; the right brow, the Purple Gate General. One *cun* inward lies the Hall of Light; three *cun* inward, the Mud-Pellet Palace of the Great One, where the Thearch appears in imperial majesty. Two *cun* inward lies the Cavern Chamber of the Grand Clarity; four *cun* inward, the Palace of the Great Ultimate, where the Yellow Lord of the Dao is seen. Three *cun* inward lies the Palace of the Mysterious Elixir; above it, the Cinnabar Field Palace of the Great One, where a single Red Child resides. Five *cun* inward lies the Palace of the Supreme, where Lord Wang Chen is seen. Three *cun* further upward lies the Jade Clarity Palace, where the Jade Thearch resides, facing the Celestial Gate.

Bow nine times in the heart, presenting each matter in full. When the silent audience concludes, exit the hall and proceed to the cavern table. chunks.original_text: 先焚香，收神端坐，以子守母。 神为炁子，炁为神母，一呼一吸，以神御之。 上下循环，出入绵绵，昼则开耳闭目，夕则开目闭耳。 凡有心动，一念内外，以心遏之。 曰我为某事，不为此念。 念数息时，第一心动多静少，思众缘万境。 第二心静少动多，摄心入静。 第三动静相半，渐次。 第四心则静多动少，直至一向，神与炁合，息与胎交，心静一向纯静。 方起一念，为某事，仍先习默朝。 默朝一纯熟，乃可默朝。 是拜章时也，服了心章，亦默朝审章。 入定时默朝，即见景乃章中取承帝意。 所谓自己天尊，何劳上皇是也。 口传 □□□□□□，急管送言来。 □□□□□□□，急管送言来。 □□□□□□，急管送言来。 □□□□□□，急管送言来。 审章诀 入靖，存九宫明朗，内朝弄尊，画则闭目专耳，夜则塞耳瞑目。 外存章中官吏，罗列面前，纸笔安几案上，心月相望，中一上宫相通。 息静炁匀，忘形离染，心，有所起，目有所见，耳有所闻，或功曹玉女，或功曹，天官，所言天神，告示丹元，显悟灵妃，语报可以书之。 习真人定诀 道无为，无不为。 可澄心，非智知。 何为知，何为正。 智遗智，证虚应。 应无从，虚乃通。 通于一，万事毕。 一为根，事无门。 事归一，一常存。 存莫有，假言守。 守虚无，自长久。 悟无常，道可久。 淡居内，德弥长。 内韬煞，外威德。 忘形想，泯心诚。 色无尘，心自真。 声处静，心益定。 香臭同，心合空。 甘苦一，心转实，体如遗，心不堕。 意不乱，心不散。 常凝然，正諿全。 用无垠，为忘筌。 审章例 一切圆物。 不妨也。 一切不圆物。 妨也。 一切生育青物。 生也。 一切乾枯陈物。 死也。 一切五谷有穗。 皆未遂也。 一切残缺不成。 皆不遂也。 一切棺椁丘墓。 皆凶也。 多吉。

Enter stillness, visualize the Nine Palaces shining brightly, and perform the inner audience before the honored one. By day, close the eyes and focus the ears; by night, block the ears and close the eyes. Externally, visualize the officials of the memorial arrayed before you, with paper and brush placed upon the table. The heart-moon gazes toward them, the central Upper Palace connected within. Flowing into the One, all matters are complete.
The One is the root; affairs have no gate.
Affairs return to the One; the One abides constantly.
Abiding—yet there is nothing; one borrows words to guard it.
Guard the empty and non-existent, and it endures forever.
Awaken to impermanence, and the Dao may endure.
Dwell in blandness within, and virtue grows ever greater.
Internally conceal fierceness; externally manifest majestic virtue.
Forget form and thought; dissolve the heart’s sincerity.
When form is free of dust, the heart is naturally true.
In the midst of sound, stillness; the heart gains stability.
Fragrance and stench as one; the heart unites with emptiness.
Sweet and bitter as one; the heart turns solid.
The body seems forgotten; the heart does not fall.
Thoughts do not scatter; the heart does not disperse.
Ever serene, correctness is wholly preserved.
Use without limit; act by forgetting the means.

Much auspiciousness.

chunks.original_text: 告给符箓门 道一变而为法，盖法为道之用也。 然道为法之体者，亦无在而不在也，乃日用而不知耳。 经不云乎，譬道之在天下，犹川谷之与江海。 盖祖炁亦然。 而万法之中，何莫由斯也。 是故灵宝大法，有符箓简诰者，而义亦有所自来矣。 在昔皇人按笔，八角垂芒，曰凤篆龙章，曰金书玉字，皆上古天人之法制也。 所谓符者，以合其妙。 箓者，以纪其功。 简者，以格其言。 诰者，以出其令。 是皆法元始之祖炁，合灵宝之妙光，以会神着灵，於竹帛金玉朱墨楮札之间，而微显阐幽，开光长夜，执符把箓，监真度生，亦体夫自然神化玄通之妙也。 宣行之士，宜静虚守一，注念凝神，洞彻幽明，混融内外，则我之法性元神，即是本来真身元始。 其一点一画，悉是道炁金光。 诚如是则无所不通，无所不度者矣。 道法体用，岂有他哉。 请降诸符启奏 具仕臣恭焚宝香，重诚上奏三清大道，十极高真，启教宗师，三界官属。 伏望道慈，俯垂洞鉴。 伏以开坛岁事，聿严灵宝之科章，济苦度亡，须假玄元之光炁。 臣退惭蒙昧，未造精微。 然书篆恐未合於玄规，故施用当力祈於真命。 伏望勅侍仙而启蕴，付小兆以承宣，普告万方，俾遵行而无滞。 开度群品，即时刻以升迁。 臣干冒天威，下情无任激切，俟命之至。 稽首再拜，谨言。 书符行持存用 凡书篆诸品符，须依法入靖，香灯纸札笔砚之属，一一备具。 先行内炼十转回灵之道。 法师静座调息，神气澄虚。 存下丹田渊泉宫灵宝先天祖炁，自中而历二十四节，直透泥丸顶门，又复降下元宫，复升周回十过。 毕，次存三田中有三尊，乘三色云气，上升端坐泥丸之中，次有天上三色云气中三尊，降自泥丸，混合为一，如此分明。 自己丹元君上朝，心奏所陈之事。 须臾，慈颜允奏。 勅命左右侍真金童玉女，捧琅函玉笈，在百宝光中降付，容臣奉行。 即密谢毕，自己真人顶出宝光，混合神炁，内外洞明，凤篆龙章，徘徊于几案之上，叩齿十二通。 执笔咒曰 溟涬大梵，寥廓无光。 赤明开图，运度自然。 元始安镇，敷落五篇。 赤书玉字，八威龙文。 保制劫运，使天长存。 右玉诀，天门炁，布之，念合明天帝日。 三遍。 勑朱墨咒 玉音摄炁，灵风聚烟。 紫虚郁秀，辅翼万仙。 千和万合，自然成真。 右掐子丑，顺至亥，归中，吸巽炁旺諿，布其上。 玉清大梵咒 三十二天，三十二帝。 诸天隐讳，诸天隐名。 天中空洞，自然灵章。 诸天隐韵，天中之音。 天中之尊，天中之神。 天中大魔，天中之灵。 九和十合，变化上清。 右玉文祖炁，勅诸符等用。 押字咒 疾除罪簿，落减恶根。 不得拘留，逼合鬼群。 元始符命，时刻升迁。 勑印咒 亿曾万祖，幽魂苦爽。 皆即受度，上升南宫。 存太一天尊，三十二天帝，三光大圣并降，金光道炁，灌注无穷。 次取日精之光，合东方生炁九息，布于笔砚之上，右执笔调朱，左掐震文。 咒曰 玉诞长桑，栢空度仙。 丹华曜木，度魂升天。 炁映白简，金光自然。 永劫长存，安镇寒泉。 幽魂开度，长保劫年。 存我本来真性神光，即是天尊，运笔书篆。 救苦简正面符 书符咒 帝真混合，炼神溉胞。 左右奉令，司马洞谣。 九垒土皇，空洞九朝。 紫户定录，神府升霄。
chunks.translated_text:
**The Gate of Talismans and Registers**

The Dao transforms once to become the Law, for the Law is the application of the Dao. Yet the Dao as the essence of the Law is omnipresent, though in daily use it goes unrecognized. As the scriptures say, the Dao’s presence in the world is like rivers and valleys flowing into the great seas. So too is the primordial *qi*. Among the ten thousand methods, which does not arise from this?

Thus, the Great Law of Lingbao encompasses talismans, registers, writs, and decrees—each with its own origin. In ancient times, the Sovereign traced brushstrokes, eight-cornered rays descending, called "phoenix scripts" and "dragon charts," or "golden writings" and "jade characters," all ancient celestial methods of heaven and humanity. The talisman (*fu*) unites with the numinous; the register (*lu*) records merit; the writ (*jian*) sets forth words; the decree (*gao*) issues commands. All derive from the primordial *qi* of the Law’s origin, merging with the wondrous radiance of Lingbao to summon spirits and manifest the divine. Inscribed on bamboo, silk, gold, jade, cinnabar, or paper, they reveal the hidden and illuminate the dark, dispelling the long night. Holding the talisman and grasping the register, one oversees the true and delivers the living—embodying the marvel of natural spirit-transformation and mysterious communion.

Those who proclaim and practice this teaching must cultivate stillness, emptiness, and unity, focusing the mind and concentrating the spirit. Penetrating the obscure and the luminous, merging inner and outer, one’s Dharma-nature and primordial spirit become the original true body of the Primordial Beginning. Every stroke and line is the golden radiance of the Dao’s *qi*. Thus, nothing remains unpervaded, and none go undelivered. What more is there to the essence and function of Dao and Law?

**Invoking and Presenting the Talismans**

The officiant, with reverence, burns precious incense and solemnly petitions the Three Pure Ones of the Great Dao, the Ten Lofty Perfected, the Founding Masters of the Teaching, and the officials of the Three Realms. May the Dao’s compassion deign to gaze upon this offering.

Now, as the altar is opened for the annual rites, the sacred statutes of Lingbao must be strictly observed. To relieve suffering and deliver the deceased, we rely upon the radiant *qi* of the Mysterious Origin. Though this humble servant remains dull and unrefined, unversed in subtleties, I fear my talisman-writing may not accord with the celestial pattern. Thus, I earnestly beseech the true mandate. May the attending immortals be commanded to reveal their treasuries, bestowing upon this petty officer the authority to proclaim it universally, that all may follow without hindrance. May the multitudes be delivered, ascending at once. This servant, daring to offend celestial majesty, awaits the command with utmost urgency.

**Writing Talismans and Practicing the Method**

When inscribing any talisman, one must first enter the oratory (*jing*), preparing incense, lamps, paper, brushes, inkstones, and all necessary implements. Begin with the inner refinement of the "Ten Cycles of Returning the Numinous."

The master sits in stillness, regulating the breath until spirit and *qi* settle into emptiness. Visualize the Lingbao primordial *qi* of the ancestral origin within the Abyssal Spring Palace of the lower cinnabar field. From there, it ascends through the twenty-four nodes, piercing the mud-pill palace at the crown of the head, then descends back to the original palace, cycling ten times.

Next, visualize the Three Fields, each containing a Perfected One, riding clouds of three colors. They ascend to sit within the mud-pill. Then, from the heavens, three-colored clouds bearing three Perfected Ones descend into the mud-pill, merging into one. This must be vividly clear. The Lord of the Cinnabar Origin ascends to present the petition. Soon, the merciful countenance grants approval. The command is issued to the attendant immortals—golden lads and jade maidens—who descend bearing a jade case and a precious tome within a radiance of a hundred treasures, entrusting them to the servant for execution. Silently expressing gratitude, one’s true self emits a treasure-light, merging with the spirit-*qi*. Inner and outer become luminously clear. Phoenix scripts and dragon charts swirl above the desk. Knock the teeth twelve times.

**Incantation While Holding the Brush**

The vast primordial darkness, boundless and lightless.
The Crimson Clarity unfolds its chart, governing the natural order.
The Primordial Beginning establishes its reign, unfolding the Five Scriptures.
Crimson writings on jade, the eight mighty dragon texts.
They guard and regulate the kalpas, ensuring heaven’s eternal endurance.

*Jade mudra. Heavenly Gate qi. Distribute it while reciting "Harmonizing with the Radiant Heavenly Emperor" three times.*

**Incantation for Cinnabar and Ink**

Jade tones gather *qi*, numinous winds amass mist.
Purple emptiness flourishes, aiding the ten thousand immortals.
A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—naturally perfected.

*Press the zi and chou fingers, moving sequentially to hai, returning to center. Inhale the flourishing qi of xun, distributing it above.*

**Great Brahma Incantation of Jade Clarity**

Thirty-two heavens, thirty-two emperors.
The hidden names of the heavens, the hidden sounds of the heavens.
The empty cavern of heaven, the natural numinous scripture.
The hidden rhymes of the heavens, the sounds within heaven.
The honored within heaven, the spirits within heaven.
The great demons of heaven, the numina of heaven.
Nine harmonies, ten unions—transforming into the Upper Clarity.

*Jade script, ancestral qi. Empower all talismans with this.*

**Incantation for Sealing the Character**

Swiftly erase the ledgers of sin, sever the roots of evil.
No delay, no coercion by ghostly throngs.
By the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, ascend at once.

**Incantation for the Seal**

Countless ancestors, suffering souls in darkness—

chunks.original_text: 开度长夜，阴贯阳标。 三张总御，合庆幽寥。 六炁咸通，明梵演招。 司命司录，可功司杀。 总统三灵，明示都府。 玉皇上帝，降勅开幽。 中理五炁、混合百神。 昙诵延越，承受三清。 九阳司化，百神应朝。 覆云育灵，拔度沉冥。 太明合日，阴境承辉。 天覆之精，下荫地灵。 赫奕玉帝，威振火铃。 北酆受箓，九幽齐升。 冥曹合同，准勅迁神。 神笔一下，明检鬼营。 三官五帝，放大光明。 牛头狱卒，成皆听命。 周回万里，罪苦咸停。 急急如律令。 勑咒 元始上圣，玉帝高灵。 玉文告命，济死度生。 金箓妙戒，拯护幽冥。 白简宝文，九真玄经。 解消罪咎，冤债和平。 救苦真人，削罪除刑。 察命童子，注上生名。 护戒威神，引诣福庭。 超离五苦，乘戒云軿。 转轮得道，飞升上清。 祝咒曰 元始符命，茭龙驿传。 阴关夜府，罪苦咸原。 通幽达信，鱼龙告宣。 魂魄受炼，永离鬼关。 乘功迁化，上升三天。 一如告命，下入重泉。 救苦符简背告 文元始符命金箓白简救苦真符，告下十方无极世界，三官九府，百二十曹，五帝考官，九幽地狱，巨天力士，执罚神兵，司录司命，司功司杀，牛头狱卒，三界大魔。 拔度某等魂，出离地狱，永辞长夜，睹见光明，万罪消除，冤仇和释。 乘此九真妙戒拔度功德，上生天堂，一如告命。 年　岁次　月　日於黄麓斋坛告下。 预修告文改曰 元始符命金箓白简救苦真符，告下十方无极世界，三官九府，百二十曹，五帝考官，九幽地狱，巨天力士，执罚神兵，司录司命，司功司杀，牛头狱卒，三界大魔。 覆护预修弟子某，随所救度，出离幽沉，睹见光明，因缘轮转，衣食自然，得为初学天人，一如告命。 年　岁次　月　日於斋坛告下。 右符栢梓木，长九寸，阔二寸四分，厚二分。 朱篆时如前符命作用，面东长跪，取生炁九口，为日华之光，吹布简文，用震文，念后咒。 如普度亡魂，於几上九吹於简上，存日华周圆无边，方始书之，用玉帝诀。 简袋式 救苦真符告下　　具位姓某谨封 十方无极世界 预修书符咒 天宝君，灵宝君，神宝君。 朱明景化，保素通真，后土九垒，俱会帝庭。 五炁混合，日月停轮。 魔王保举，诸天纪名，三元合庆。 中监五岳，下统人伦。 注生注福，司命司勋。 南辰北极，陶魂铸魄。 六纪齐并，金舆玉辇。 明谒三清九霄，斡运紫户生神。 陀罗育邈，渺炁合云。 九府安镇，幽爽完形。 华都曲丽，禀勅奉行。 长生简正面符 中诀，祖炁仰首，取南斗炁 书符咒 元始上帝，炁灌胞元。 玉皇上帝，玄化照临。 左阳真神，右阴灵神。 无上七元，九幽罪魂。 神珠曜日，昼夜华明。 天帝合明，地神合精。 黄云郁单，气象交并。 左司天府，君形九阴。 右司天府，上生君胎。 三元校录，九夜升腾。 覃赦五岳，八狱恶根。 太一司命，桃康奉令。 司录谛迎，司非敬听。 太极都治，八天元君。 太玄司方，召八灵君。 天合地合，日月合明。 三元四始，阴阳混凝。 朱陵火府，王帝华京。 朱陵帝君，烁煌炳焕。 煜煴熳，上元天帝。 君命急行，元皇下覆。 三官奉迎，九地九水，九阴关津，道路开通，送护神庭。 太上老君，千真监临。 泰山之府，承命咸遵。 天勑宣行，黄光洞明。 司命元一，执符把箓。
