**Delivering the Long Night, Yin Pierces the Yang Standard.**
The Three Zhangs govern in unison, joining blessings in the desolate dark.
The Six *Qi* flow freely, the bright *Vairocana* chants the summons.
The Lords of Life and Record, the Officers of Merit and Execution—
Together they command the Three Spirits, clearly revealing the Capital Bureau.
The Jade Emperor, Supreme Theon, descends his decree to open the obscure.
Within, the Five *Qi* are ordered, the hundred spirits merge as one.
The *Tanyao* recitation extends, receiving the Three Clarities.
The Nine Yangs govern transformation, the hundred spirits respond in audience.
Clouds overspread to nurture the numinous, delivering the sunken and dark.
The Great Brightness joins the sun, the yin realm receives its radiance.
The essence of Heaven’s canopy shades below to shelter Earth’s spirits.
Resplendent, the Jade Emperor’s might shakes the fire bells.
The Northern Feng receives the register, the Nine Obscurities ascend as one.
The Nether Bureaus unite in accord, by decree the spirits are transferred.
With one stroke of the divine brush, the ghost encampments are inspected and illuminated.
The Three Officials and Five Emperors release great light.
Ox-Head jailers and minions all heed the command.
For ten thousand *li* around, suffering and torment cease at once.
**Hasten! As the statutes decree!**

**Decree Incantation**
The Primordial Supreme Sage, the Lofty Spirit of the Jade Emperor—
The Jade Script proclaims the mandate, delivering the dead and saving the living.
The Golden Register’s wondrous precepts rescue and protect the dark netherworld.
The White Talisman’s precious script, the Nine Perfected’s mysterious canon—
Dissolve transgressions, reconcile karmic debts.
The Deliverance-from-Suffering Perfected, erasing guilt and removing punishments.
The Life-Inspecting Youth inscribes the name of rebirth above.
The mighty guardian spirits of the precepts lead them to the blessed courts.
Transcending the Five Sufferings, they ride the cloud-chariot of precepts.
Turning the Wheel, they attain the Dao, ascending to the Highest Clarity.

**Incantation for the Prayer**
The Primordial’s talismanic mandate is relayed by the *jiaolong* courier.
The yin passes of the night bureaus—all suffering is absolved.
Communicating with the obscure, conveying trust, the fish and dragon proclaim the decree.
Souls and spirits undergo refinement, forever departing the ghostly passes.
By merit they transform and ascend to the Three Heavens.
As the mandate decrees, so it descends into the Nine Springs.

**Back of the Deliverance-from-Suffering Talisman’s Proclamation**
The Primordial’s talismanic mandate, the Golden Register’s White Talisman of Deliverance, the Perfected Talisman of Salvation—
Proclaimed to the ten directions’ boundless worlds, the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus, the hundred and twenty courts, the Five Emperors’ Examiners, the Nine Obscurities’ hells, the mighty Heavenly Enforcers, the divine soldiers of punishment, the Lords of Record and Life, the Officers of Merit and Execution, the Ox-Head jailers, the great demons of the Three Realms—
Deliver the souls of so-and-so, liberating them from hell, forever parting from the long night, beholding the light. All sins are erased, karmic debts reconciled.
By the merit of this deliverance through the Nine Perfected’s wondrous precepts, they ascend to Heaven’s halls. As the mandate decrees.

**Year... in the cycle... month... day, proclaimed at the Yellow Grove Retreat Altar.**

**Revised Proclamation for Preemptive Cultivation**
The Primordial’s talismanic mandate, the Golden Register’s White Talisman of Deliverance, the Perfected Talisman of Salvation—
Proclaimed to the ten directions’ boundless worlds, the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus, the hundred and twenty courts, the Five Emperors’ Examiners, the Nine Obscurities’ hells, the mighty Heavenly Enforcers, the divine soldiers of punishment, the Lords of Record and Life, the Officers of Merit and Execution, the Ox-Head jailers, the great demons of the Three Realms—
Shelter and protect the preemptive cultivator, disciple so-and-so, delivering them from obscurity, enabling them to behold the light. By karmic conditions they turn the Wheel, clothing and sustenance naturally provided. They become novice celestial beings. As the mandate decrees.

**Year... in the cycle... month... day, proclaimed at the Retreat Altar.**

**The talisman is made of cypress wood, nine *cun* long, two *cun* and four *fen* wide, two *fen* thick.**
When inscribing in cinnabar, proceed as with the previous talismanic mandate. Face east, kneel lengthily, draw nine breaths of *qi* as the sunlight’s radiance, and blow it over the talisman’s script. Use the *Zhen* mudra and recite the following incantation.
For universal deliverance of the deceased, blow nine times onto the talisman on the table. Visualize the sunlight’s radiance filling all directions without bound before inscribing. Use the Jade Emperor’s mudra.

**Talisman Bag Format**
*Deliverance-from-Suffering Perfected Talisman Proclaimed*
*Sealed by [Rank] [Name]*
*To the Ten Directions’ Boundless Worlds*

**Preemptive Cultivation Talisman Incantation**
The Heavenly Treasure Lord, the Numinous Treasure Lord, the Divine Treasure Lord—
Radiant transformation of cinnabar brightness, preserving simplicity to commune with the Perfected. The Nine Mounds of Earth’s Rear unite in the Emperor’s court.
The Five *Qi* merge, sun and moon halt their wheels.
Demon kings vouch, all heavens record names, the Three Origins join in celebration.
The Central Overseer of the Five Peaks governs humanity below.
Inscribing life and fortune, the Lords of Life and Merit—
Southern stars and Northern Pole, molding souls and casting spirits.
The Six Records align, golden chariots and jade carriages.
Clearly they visit the Three Clarities and Nine Empyreans, revolving the Purple Gates to generate spirits.
The *Taluo* nurtures the distant, the ethereal *qi* merges with clouds.
The Nine Bureaus are pacified, the obscure souls complete their forms.
The Flower Capital’s winding beauty receives the decree and acts.

**Front of the Longevity Talisman**
*Central Mudra: Draw the Ancestral Qi, raise the head, absorb the Southern Dipper’s Qi.*

**Talisman Incantation**
The Primordial Supreme Thearch, *qi* irrigates the primordial womb.
The Jade Emperor, Supreme Theon, mysterious transformation shines upon us.
The Left Yang Perfected Spirit, the Right Yin Numinous Spirit—
The Supreme Seven Origins, the Nine Obscurities’ sinful souls.
The divine pearl radiates sunlight, its brilliance illuminating day and night.
The Heavenly Emperor joins in brightness, Earth’s spirits join in essence.
Yellow clouds dense and solitary, *qi* and images intermingle.
The Left Celestial Bureau governs the Nine Yin’s lordly forms.
The Right Celestial Bureau nurtures the lordly embryo of rebirth above.
The Three Origins audit the records, ascending through the Nine Nights.
Extending amnesty to the Five Peaks, eradicating the roots of the Eight Prisons’ evil.
The Great One, Lord of Life, Peach Vitality obeys the command.
The Lord of Record solemnly welcomes, the Officer of Wrongs respectfully listens.
The Supreme Ultimate’s Capital Governance, the Eight Heavens’ Origin Lords—
The Great Mystery’s Directional Overseer summons the Eight Numinous Lords.
Heaven joins, Earth joins, sun and moon join in brightness.
The Three Origins and Four Beginnings, yin and yang merge and congeal.
The Vermilion Mound’s Fire Bureau, the Kingly Emperor’s Flower Capital—
The Vermilion Mound’s Lord Emperor, blazing with radiant splendor.
Resplendent and dazzling, the Highest Heaven’s Emperor—
The Lord’s command swiftly executed, the Primordial August descends to shelter.
The Three Officials receive and welcome, the Nine Lands and Nine Waters, the Nine Yin’s passes and fords—
All roads open, escorting and protecting the divine court.
The Most High Lord Lao, the Thousand Perfected oversee.
The Mansion of Mount Tai receives the command and all obey.
The Heavenly decree is proclaimed, yellow light illumines the cavern.
The Lord of Life, Primordial Unity, holds the talisman and grasps the register.

All grave sins of the three karmas and six senses, whether:

Unfilial to parents,
Slandering the Great Dao, forsaking truth for falsehood,
Harming siblings, betraying masters,
Colluding with kin in incestuous transgressions,
Robbing and murdering, slaughtering living beings for self-gain,
Bullying the weak, oppressing the lowly,
Feigning devotion to the Three Treasures while lacking sincerity,
Disrespecting Dharma masters, defiling sacred scriptures,
Harboring malice, nurturing envy and cruelty,
Engaging in slander, sowing discord among the virtuous,
Killing for sacrifices, exposing the Three Luminaries to defilement,
Or sins born of thought, speech, personal action, or incitement of others—

All such offenses, accumulated over countless kalpas, boundless in measure, shall now be absolved according to their weight. They are to be delivered and liberated, their sins expunged, their enmities resolved. Freed from hell, they shall behold the light; their myriad transgressions dissolved, they shall ascend to the ritual altar, receive salvation, and be transformed.

The souls thus delivered shall:
Refine the seven *qi* into perfection,
Orbit the six celestial motions in emptiness,
Weave the five numinous threads to completion,
Draw strength from the twin luminaries,
Traverse the void with the turning Big Dipper,
Ascend to the cloud palaces,
Where life begins in the womb and kalpas know no end.

Their essence shall gestate in golden citadels,
Their spirits congeal in jade grottoes,
Nurtured by true *qi* within to become perfected beings.
Above, they shall enter the Great Void;
Below, they shall traverse the nether springs.
Within the cloud palaces’ jeweled towers, their true souls shall dwell,
Moving freely through the land of blessings,
Roaming the gates of rebirth,
Feasting on sacred mushrooms,
Sipping from golden springs,
Bathed in flowing ambrosia,
Their cinnabar fields brimming with suspended elixirs.
Purple auroras shall dawn upon them,
The three *qi* shall condense into mist.
Their jade chambers shall transform them into immortals,
Seated upon golden lotuses.
Their true forms shall eclipse the sun,
And kalpas shall pass as years.

chunks.original_text: 今月　日恭奉 道旨，颁降 赤文，超度亡魂，上生 天堂者。 书天篆混沌赤文 右奉 太上棍洞赤文宝章，普告十方三界，五岳九幽，开光长夜，超度亡魂，径升 梵行之天，不堕重阴之地。 赤文焕发，风火无停，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日告下 具　法　位　臣姓某承诰奉行。 玉清上相大罗无极神公在天 右三诰并用方封，於三日午朝各告一道，依典告下，亦可一给付。 玄师曰：太极妙化神灵混洞赤文章书，天真皇人降玉隆腾胜天，授虚皇天尊灵宝大法。 谓东华上卿洞神大夫，领下元生籍左官，及诸仙官。 曰：九霄总梵，八帝治天，非混洞赤文，不能摄化九阳，而明天度。 是以 神霄玉清虚皇天，泛上灵景华九阳清真虚梵之炁，而成天境。 丹霄南极玉文天，泛丹灵妙宰洞阳景真元梵之炁，而成天境。 碧霄太虚真极天，泛广灵太华上阳元真灵一之炁，而成天境。 玉霄玉灵素华天，泛玉灵素华纯阳至真元一之炁，而成天境。 太霄太虚真元天，泛太灵洞华三阳九真太一之炁，而成天境。 琅霄素灵皓元天，泛素灵皓华六阳洞真至一之炁，而成天境。 紫霄玄灵上极天，泛元灵紫华清阳妙真天一之炁，而成天境。 景霄妙灵宝华天，泛妙灵宝华景阳精真虚一之炁，而成天境。 青霄玉华无极天，泛青灵玉华元阳天真纯一之炁，而成天境。 赤文化混洞，混洞化弥罗。 总天元九炁之道，下复九因，至八梵真言，亦此文之化也。 是以大丹田内，有帝宫宛利城奔贤世界，梵宝丹灵赤帝君所治。 中有朱陵之府，流火之庭，火炎之宫，赤明之馆，丹丘火池，元始天尊炼真文之所化梵也。 天中中下二真，由不得此。 吾以此文混沌梵元图，并付之於汝。 此去六天运亨，壬辰合度，庚子政化，自然敷露，其诸秘妙符文应，皆莫可测矣。 天官玉简亥文，西北炁 书符咒 玉虚九天，九日道乾。 九霄祖炁，万范开张。 明炁四骞，绿罗大千。 洞妙自然，罪爽咸原。 执符把箓，总监上天。 普受开度，死魂生身。 告文 灵宝符命，天官玉简，告下天官三府曹局，主罪录仙官，天帝北狱考吏，执罚神祇。 救度某神魂，出离天狱，赦除大罪，得升梵炁之天，不堕重阴之地。 主者敬听，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式 地官玉简巳文，东南炁 书符咒 风泽洞虚，金刚乘天。 罗酆九地，罪爽咸原。 太上勅命，解释冤愆。 斩绝地根，时刻升迁。 拔出地户，名列太玄。 根原本始，一时生神。 告文 灵宝符命，地官玉简，告下中元清泠三府，洞阳左宗天宫，九幽泉曲，岳狱冥司，主生死罪录灵官，四十二曹，考司典吏，案掾尊神。 拔度某神魂，拔出地户，永免幽囚，乘沐阳光，径生妙乐。 承此　灵宝符命拔度功德，上生天堂，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式 水官玉简申文，西南炁 书符咒 华阳真一，太和妙慧。 天河东井，灵泉荡秽。 北都泉曲，九幽主吏。 咸承动勅赦，开关启闭。 告文 灵宝符命，水官玉简，告下下元旸谷洞源三府，清泠左南水官，酆都劫掠，泉曲河伯，水狱冥司，主生死罪录灵官，四十二曹，考司典吏，案掾尊神。 拔度某神魂，永辞北都，寒池泉曲，苦海溟波，沐睹恩光，径生阳界。 乘此灵宝符命功德。 上生玄天，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。

chunks.original_text: 神霄玉简辰文，东南炁 书符 玉简金书，普告幽冥。 苦魂滞魄，即得更生。 八门通关，无影无形。 三景自然，敷落成真。 魂升金闱，游宴玉京。 幽关治狱，咸沐光明。 告文 神霄玉简，三天符命，上开八门，三十六狱，执法治官，径诣帝轩。 解宥宿罪，开度某神魂，上升神霄玉阙之天。 复还治职，悟入玄玄，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式 上元三天玉简玉清诀，上天炁 书符咒 三炁凝烟，明炁四骞。 亿曾万祖，苦爽幽魂。 运应灭度，身经太阴。 普受开度，便得神仙。 罪福禁戒，宿命因缘。 魂神超度，径上丹天。 疾除罪簿，时刻升迁。 炼魂九阳，与天齐年。 告文 三天白简，玉清玉符，告闻神霄高上之天。 左右狱卒，案掾尊神，天狱主者，执罚治官。 超度某神魄，消灭大罪，遏塞邪源，形神升度。 谒帝天关。 福智自生，骖侍龙辕，真道长存，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式 中元九天宝诰金书丹篆中文，神霄炁 告文 上帝玉府九天紫府内音，宣告三官九府，百二十曹，天牢地狱，主司大神。 超度某神魂，咸领符命，部卫形魂，上朝帝庭。 罪愆和释，冤债消沉，与道合真，神登金阙，受炼长存，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式 下元登真度命出离生死真符 神霄炁诀。 书符咒 赤文命灵，度命幽冥。 三天赦宥，遍告幽扃。 死魂乘化，出离死生。 斩绝死户，束井炼形。 天慈玉动，罔不钦承。 三台炳耀，六炁齐并。 九幽阴翳，尽睹光明。 得离五道，风火无停。 超登天堂，得证仙真。 咒曰 结空成梵，真炁自生。 赤书玉字，八威龙文。 保制劫运，使天长存。 真符告下，滞魄超升。 告文 下元登真度命出离生死真符，玉清赤书，上通紫庭。 天慈赦宥，三界冥狱，九幽罪魂、超度亡过某神魂，亿曾万祖，苦爽幽精。 消除罪籍，落灭恶根，速赴生方。 炁识闲宁，上登天堂。 澄质炼真，心神洞明。 一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式 元始上帝削死上生真符 书符咒 元始上帝，降勅玉晨。 罪消北府，名上南宫。 死魂受炼。 仙化成人。 生身受度，仙道潜通。 上生削死，升入无形。 告文 元始符命，赦罪宥愆。 亡过某神魂，解仇释结，削死上生，刊名金简、位列玉阶。 真光接引。 慈惠敷开，金莲捧步，紫炁开关，三变九炼，易容反颜。 三天魔王，保举制仙。 真心洞明，福慧自生。 骖侍龙辕，受炁长存，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式 神霄玉篆雷文神霄炁诀 告文 高上真王玉清宝箓玉篆雷文，普告南昌上宫，韩君丈人，注算真君，酆都冥关，诸治典吏。 炼度某神魂，消灭罪戾，开泰泉扃，荡除尘翳，调理阴阳，制魔保举，度品南宫。 死魂受炼，仙化成人，永离三涂五苦八难，超凌三界，逍遥上清，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 简袋式

**Divine Empyrean Jade Tablet Proclamation of the Chen Hour**

The *qi* of the southeast inscribes talismans upon the *Jade Tablet* in golden script, universally proclaiming to the hidden and dark realms. Suffering souls and stagnant *po*—let them be reborn anew. The *Eight Gates* open the passes, leaving no shadow, no form. The *Three Radiant Ones* arise naturally, scattering and coalescing into truth. The soul ascends to the *Golden Chamber*, roaming and feasting in the *Jade Capital*. The dark passes and prisons of hell—all bathe in radiant light.

**Proclamation**
The *Divine Empyrean Jade Tablet*, by the *Mandate of the Three Heavens*, opens the *Eight Gates* and the *Thirty-Six Prisons*. To the enforcing officials and governing magistrates, proceed directly to the *Imperial Terrace*. Absolve past sins, deliver the soul of [Name], ascending to the *Jade Palace of the Divine Empyrean*. Restore to office, awaken to the *Mystic of Mystics*, all in accordance with the proclaimed decree.

**In the cyclical year, month, and hour, the proclamation is issued.**
*Tablet Envelope Formula*

---

**Upper Prime: Jade Tablet of the Three Heavens, Jade Clarity Incantation**

The *qi* of the heavens inscribes talismans and invocations. The *Three Qi* congeal into mist, the *Luminous Qi* soars in four directions. The myriad ancestors, suffering spirits, and hidden souls—when the time comes for their deliverance, their bodies pass through the *Great Yin*. Universally receive deliverance, and they shall attain *immortality*. Sins and blessings, prohibitions and retributions, karmic causes and conditions—let the soul transcend, ascending directly to the *Cinnabar Heaven*. Swiftly erase the ledgers of transgressions, advancing by the hour. Refine the soul with the *Nine Yang*, attaining years equal to heaven.

**Proclamation**
The *White Tablet of the Three Heavens*, the *Jade Clarity Talisman*, proclaims to the *Highest Heaven of the Divine Empyrean*. To the left and right prison guards, case officers, honored spirits, wardens of the celestial prisons, and enforcing officials—deliver the soul of [Name], extinguish great sins, block the sources of evil, and ascend in body and spirit. Pay homage at the *Celestial Gate of the Emperor*. Blessings and wisdom arise naturally, riding the dragon-carriage, the *True Dao* enduring forever, all in accordance with the proclaimed decree.

**In the cyclical year, month, and hour, the proclamation is issued.**
*Tablet Envelope Formula*

---

**Middle Prime: Precious Edict of the Nine Heavens, Golden Script and Cinnabar Seal**

The *qi* of the *Divine Empyrean* proclaims:

**Proclamation**
The *Jade Treasury of the Emperor* and the *Inner Edict of the Nine Heavens’ Purple Palace* announce to the *Three Officials*, *Nine Treasuries*, *One Hundred Twenty Bureaus*, celestial prisons, earthly hells, and the governing deities—deliver the soul of [Name]. Let all receive the *Mandate of the Talisman*, escorting body and soul to ascend and pay homage at the *Imperial Court*. Sins and transgressions dissolve, grievances and debts subside. United with the Dao, the spirit ascends to the *Golden Palace*, undergoing refinement for eternal endurance, all in accordance with the proclaimed decree.

**In the cyclical year, month, and hour, the proclamation is issued.**
*Tablet Envelope Formula*

---

**Lower Prime: True Talisman of Ascending Perfection and Deliverance from Life and Death**

The *Divine Empyrean Qi Incantation* inscribes talismans and invocations. The *Vermilion Script* commands the spirits, delivering lives in the hidden and dark realms. The *Three Heavens* grant amnesty, universally proclaiming to the hidden gates. The dead souls ride transformation, departing from life and death. Sever the *Gate of Death*, bind the well, and refine the form. The *Heavenly Compassion* stirs the jade, none dare disobey. The *Three Terraces* blaze in splendor, the *Six Qi* unite as one. The *Nine Yin* shadows of the underworld all witness the radiant light. Liberated from the *Five Paths*, wind and fire cease not. Ascend to the *Celestial Hall*, attaining the realization of *immortal perfection*.

**Incantation**
Form emptiness into Brahman, the *True Qi* arises naturally. The *Vermilion Script* and *Jade Characters*, the *Eight Might* and *Dragon Script*—preserve and govern the kalpa, ensuring heaven’s eternal endurance. The *True Talisman* is proclaimed, stagnant *po* transcend and ascend.

**Proclamation**
The *True Talisman of Ascending Perfection and Deliverance from Life and Death*, the *Vermilion Script of Jade Clarity*, ascends to the *Purple Court*. By the *Heavenly Compassion’s* amnesty, the *Three Realms’* dark prisons, and the *Nine Yin* sinful souls—deliver the deceased soul of [Name], the myriad ancestors, suffering spirits, and hidden essences. Erase the records of sins, extinguish the roots of evil, swiftly proceed to the realm of the living. The *qi* and consciousness rest in tranquility, ascending to the *Celestial Hall*. Clarify the essence and refine the truth, the heart and spirit shining with clarity, all in accordance with the proclaimed decree.

**In the cyclical year, month, and hour, the proclamation is issued.**
*Tablet Envelope Formula*

---

**True Talisman of the Primordial Sovereign for Erasing Death and Ascending to Life**

Inscribe talismans and invocations. The *Primordial Sovereign* descends the edict to the *Jade Dawn*. Sins vanish in the *Northern Treasury*, names ascend to the *Southern Palace*. The dead souls undergo refinement, transforming into immortals. The living body receives deliverance, the *immortal Dao* secretly connects. Erase death and ascend to life, rising into the formless.

**Proclamation**
By the *Primordial Sovereign’s Mandate*, absolve sins and pardon transgressions. For the deceased soul of [Name], dissolve enmities and release entanglements. Erase death and ascend to life, inscribe the name on the *Golden Tablet*, rank among the *Jade Steps*. The *True Light* guides the way. Compassion unfolds, golden lotuses bear the steps, the *Purple Qi* opens the passes. Three transformations, nine refinements—alter the countenance and reverse the visage. The *Demon Kings of the Three Heavens* protect and recommend the immortal. The *True Heart* shines with clarity, blessings and wisdom arise naturally. Riding the dragon-carriage, receiving *qi* for eternal endurance, all in accordance with the proclaimed decree.

**In the cyclical year, month, and hour, the proclamation is issued.**
*Tablet Envelope Formula*

**Divine Empyrean Jade Seal and Thunder Script**

The *Divine Empyrean Qi Incantation* proclaims:

**Proclamation**
The *Jade Register of the Highest Perfected King* and the *Jade Seal Thunder Script* universally proclaim to the *Upper Palace of Nanchang*, *Lord Han the Venerable*, the *True Lord of Life Records*, the *Dark Pass of Fengdu*, and all governing officials—refine and deliver the soul of [Name]. Extinguish sins and transgressions, open the *Spring of Serenity*, sweep away the dust and shadows, harmonize *yin* and *yang*, subdue demons and protect the ascent, rank in the *Southern Palace*. The dead souls undergo refinement, transforming into immortals, forever departing the *Three Paths*, *Five Sufferings*, and *Eight Calamities*. Transcend the *Three Realms*, roaming freely in the *Upper Clarity*, all in accordance with the proclaimed decree.

**In the cyclical year, month, and hour, the proclamation is issued.**

chunks.original_text: 上清灵宝黄髴中文，黄炁 告文 元始黄箓，告下南昌。 上开八门，普受开度。 诸天诸地，阴狱冥官，五岳冤牢，罗酆寒庭，咸臻黄箓，勾落死名。 亡过某魂神澄正，万炁长存，不经苦恼，身有光明。 永契真道，逍遥上清，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 方函式 右三箓简文，分於三朝告行。 用栢木简，以彩装三色金书，碧袋如常式。 生天宝箓 法曰：凡书宝箓，面东，焚香，存玉晨上帝，如法陈意。 次诵宝号，研朱左右八十一转。 次取青玄炁，灌砂中。 至书箓时，先诵《灵宝经》一过，然后长跪启白： 具位臣姓某，谨诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首再拜。 奏启三清三境大道慈尊中天上帝。 臣今奏为入意，投叩向臣乞行开度。 臣今依式书篆宝箓，乞赐天恩下济，真炁流通，启蕴开函，降下宝箓，付臣书篆，依式颁行。 庶使幽狱停酸，死魂受度。 臣下情不胜激切，恳祷之至，谨言。 次九拜，存天门开。 天门乃金门三重，其中金光焕然，内有金阙宝殿。 见玉宸上帝端坐其中，左右侍真，罗列御座，奏前事理，上帝慈颜欢悦，勅命金童玉女捧宝匣，在百宝光中下降几案前，与所造之麓，合而为一。 光明徘徊於上，无极无尽。 次面南九拜，默奏南斗。 存见六星，每星大如日轮，初出之状，一合降下，与箓中六星合而为一，每一星各有一字在内分明，尽皆透底，光明如一。 一次上香，叩齿十二通。 咒曰 中有度人不死之神，中有南极长生之君，中有度世司马大神，中有好生韩君丈人，中有南上司命司箓。 延寿益算，度厄尊神。 回骸起死，无量度人。 急急如上帝律令。 咒毕，面天门长跪，存官童将吏，围绕左右，左手都监诀，右手执笔，念勑赦，密咒五十遍。 咒曰 无上玄元，太上道君。 教臣行符，照破幽狱，罪魂出离。 急急如律令。 次取天门青黄白三炁入笔，依式书篆。 上四字玉宸秘讳，沓书六星下，随书随念。 咒曰 元始符命，时刻升迁。 亡魂受度，立便生天。 急急如元始上帝律令。 十二遍，取天门炁，出笔发诀心 再运咒曰 太上道君，勑付昆仑。 神符一下，拔度死魂。 急急如律令。 右天门金光炁，搯玉清诀，布箓上六星，唯第三魁星虚运笔，不可实涂。 盖火空则明。 勑咒符 南斗六真，出幽入冥。 吾奉帝勑，速监生灵。 南昌上籍，即得返魂。 急急如上帝勑。 如前存用，南斗炁诀，透彻光明。 再用勑咒总勑之，又上帝诀，三天炁，盖下四字。 小宝箓式 太上勑赦生天宝箓 亡魂受度，炼化更生，人伦不坠，福报转增。 右奉 宝箓，告下十方三界，冥官主者，拔度三界十类，六道四生，九州五姓，男女幽魂。 上生 天堂，一如

The *Yellow Writ of the Numinous Treasure at the Yellow Center*, Yellow Qi
Proclamation Text

The *Primal Beginning’s Yellow Register* proclaims to *Nanchang*.
Opening the *Eight Gates*, universally receiving deliverance.
All heavens and all earths, *yin* prisons and nether officials,
the *Five Marchmounts’* grievance cells, *Luofeng*’s cold courts—
all draw near the *Yellow Register*, erasing names of the dead.
The deceased and transgressed soul of [Name] is purified and rectified,
eternally abiding in the *Ten Thousand Qi*,
free from suffering and affliction, the body suffused with radiance.
Forever in accord with the *True Dao*,
carefree and ascending to the *Upper Clarity*,
all in accordance with the proclaimed decree.

*In the cyclical year, month, and hour, the proclamation is issued.*
*Square Envelope Formula*

---

The three register writs are proclaimed separately over three mornings.
Use cypress wood slips, adorned with three-colored gold script in the customary manner, stored in azure bags.

*Register for Ascending to Heaven*
Method states: When inscribing the register, face east, burn incense, and visualize the *Jade Dawn Emperor*, performing the rite with proper intent.
Next, recite the register’s sacred title, grinding cinnabar eighty-one turns left and right.
Then draw the *Azure Mystery Qi* into the cinnabar.
When inscribing the register, first recite the *Scripture of the Numinous Treasure* once, then kneel and invoke:
*Your subordinate, [Name], with reverent trepidation, bows head to ground in prostration.*
Petitioning the *Three Clarities*, the *Three Realms’ Great Dao*, the *Compassionate Honored One*, the *Central Heaven Emperor*:
*Your subordinate petitions on behalf of the intent herein, humbly beseeching the granting of deliverance.*
*Your subordinate now inscribes the register in accordance with the formula, entreating the descent of celestial grace to aid below, the flow of true qi, the unsealing of the writ, and the bestowal of the register for inscription and distribution as prescribed.*
*May the nether prisons cease their sorrows, and the dead souls receive deliverance.*
*Your subordinate’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion, to the utmost of earnest prayer.*
Next, perform nine bows, visualizing the *Heavenly Gate* opening.
The *Heavenly Gate* is a triple-gated golden portal, resplendent with golden light, within which stands a golden palace hall.
The *Jade Dawn Emperor* sits enthroned therein, flanked by attendant perfected ones arrayed around the imperial seat.
Present the preceding matters, and the Emperor’s compassionate countenance brightens with joy.
By imperial decree, the *Golden Lads and Jade Maidens* bear the treasure casket, descending through a hundredfold radiance to the writing desk, merging with the prepared register.
Light lingers above, boundless and inexhaustible.
Next, face south and perform nine bows, silently petitioning the *Southern Dipper*.
Visualize the six stars, each vast as the solar wheel in its rising aspect, converging and descending to merge with the six stars of the register, each star bearing a distinct character within, fully luminous and transparent, their brilliance unified.
Next, offer incense and strike the teeth twelve times.
Incantation:
*Within is the immortal spirit who delivers the dead,*
*Within is the Southern Culmen’s Lord of Longevity,*
*Within is the Great Spirit Sima who delivers the world,*
*Within is the Life-Loving Elder Han,*
*Within are the Southern Superintendents of Destiny and Registers.*
*Extending life and increasing years, deliverers from calamity, revered spirits.*
*Restoring bones and reviving the dead, immeasurable deliverers of humanity.*
*Hasten as the Emperor’s statutes command!*

After the incantation, kneel facing the *Heavenly Gate*, visualizing the official youths and attendants encircling you.
With the left hand form the *Director’s Seal*, and with the right hand hold the brush, reciting the empowering absolution and the secret incantation fifty times.
Incantation:
*Supreme Mystery’s Primal One, Most High Dao Lord.*
*Command your subordinate to enact the talisman,*
*illuminating and shattering the nether prisons,*
*liberating the sinful souls.*
*Hasten as the statutes command!*

Next, draw the *Heavenly Gate’s* azure, yellow, and white *qi* into the brush and inscribe according to the formula.
First write the four characters of the *Jade Dawn’s* secret taboo name, then intersperse them beneath the six stars, reciting as you write:
Incantation:
*Primal Beginning’s talismanic mandate,*
*appointing the hour of ascent.*
*The deceased soul receives deliverance,*
*immediately ascending to heaven.*
*Hasten as the Primal Beginning Emperor’s statutes command!*
Twelve times, drawing the *Heavenly Gate’s qi* to release the brush and form the heart seal.
Recite again:
Incantation:
*Most High Dao Lord,*
*by decree dispatching Kunlun.*
*One talismanic stroke*
*delivers the dead soul.*
*Hasten as the statutes command!*

With the *Heavenly Gate’s* golden light *qi*, form the *Jade Clarity Seal* and trace the six stars on the register, leaving only the third *Kui* star unfilled—
for emptiness of fire yields clarity.
Empowering incantation for the talisman:
*The Six Perfected of the Southern Dipper,*
*emerging from darkness into the nether realms.*
*By imperial decree I command,*
*swiftly overseeing the living spirits.*
*Inscribed in the Southern Prosperity’s register,*
*immediately returning the soul.*
*Hasten as the Emperor’s decree commands!*

Proceed as before, using the *Southern Dipper’s qi* seal to suffuse luminous clarity.
Then employ the empowering incantation to consecrate it, again with the *Emperor’s Seal* and the *Three Heavens’ qi*, sealing the four characters below.

*Formula for the Lesser Register of Ascending to Heaven*
*By the Most High’s decree absolving the Register for Ascending to Heaven:*
*The deceased soul receives deliverance,*
*refined and reborn,*
*the human lineage unbroken,*
*blessings and retribution transformed and increased.*

Right: Presenting the *Register*,
proclaimed to the *Ten Directions and Three Realms*,
the nether officials and masters,
delivering the *Three Realms’ Ten Classes*,
the *Six Paths and Four Births*,
the *Nine Provinces’ Five Lineages*,
the male and female souls of the nether realms—
ascending to *Heaven’s Halls*,
all in accordance...

chunks.original_text: 神。 符告下解冤释结，求脱仇佛，执对分别，衅缘俱尽，不生恶业，出离寒庭。 罪根消灭，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 具　法　位　臣姓某承诰，奉行 东极宫中太一救苦天尊青玄上帝。 东华修炼玄旨朱陵符用 师平坐定息，研澄百虑，存自己头上泥丸中，乃太渊天谷宫、光照内外，中有太乙天尊、御金玉宝座、青服，朱履，云冠，玉圭，项负圆光，金莲捧足。 须臾天尊放百宝慧光、洞明八极。 又以自己一性，上朝天尊，心礼圣号。 忽见宫中紫炁如丝，降下丹田，凝结光明，如弹子大，紫金色。 常以一性居顶中天谷之宫，勿令散乱。 於真想处，倏然忘形，静定廓然，上下澄彻。 行住坐卧，皆可修持。 此乃修炼形神，得一之道也。 其紫炁入丹田，自然生真火毫光，元炁纯阳之所致也。 所谓太一在头，万神朝焉。 神明森卫，有大威力，降伏邪妖众恶，不敢当矣。 精神炁旺，疾病永消。 所为所作，叩之立应。 盖以炁炼神，以神炼形，形神俱妙，体入自然。 聚万法而归一真，散一真而化万景。 不滞有无，永绝生灭，是为真人矣。 得法之士，当焚香，东望拜跪。 存真首露前世今生，故误罪业。 解释九玄七祖，师资同学，阴阳过愆。 普及六道四生，飞走沉潜，咸蒙度化。 伏望天尊垂悯，应念感通。 庶令臣心安炁旺，神室光明，克就玄勋，永无魔试，同升长乐境界，与道合真。 然后书符。 勑笔咒 元始玉命，敷法布灵。 道法施惠，受符超生。 如有愆罪，悉以除蠲。 汝见玉言，万神咸听。 勑朱咒 玉音摄炁，灵风聚烟。 紫虚郁秀，辅翼万仙。 千和万合，自然成真，急急如灵宝度人律令。 祝咒 接以法门，导以法路，沃以神泉，洒以甘露，心洁形完，声尚神具。 未闻天尊法音者，今皆得使得闻。 未蒙天尊睿泽者，令皆使得遇。 得为人天，随符超度。 急急如律令。 右符玉清诀，天门炁，吹笔上。 次搯巽文，念太一救苦天尊八十一声，取青玄炁吹笔。 再念奉太一救苦天尊勑行，八十一声，取青玄炁入笔。 再念八十一声，再取炁入笔。 随炁书符。 朱陵符诰文 太上救生救死救苦超度朱陵直符 右符给付某魂。 天尊救苦，仙道贵生。 上开八门，飞天法轮，普受开度，死魂生身。 上诣丹霞丹天炎光世界，朱明国土，重阳宫中。 朝谒天君，超度朱陵，流火神庭，火炼池中。 火膏冶炼，荡除尘垢。 受化更生，红莲花上。 得为初学天人，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 具　法　位　臣姓某承　诰奉行。 东极宫中大慈仁者寻声赴感太一救苦天尊。 朱陵府散形黄箓中用 祝曰 上帝诀，南炁，存升度法。 玉眸太灵，分天地精。 一炁混合，阴阳佐成。 司命合德，四齐生灵。 火铃炼度，左右灵真。 急如律令，九炁生神。 灵宝玉鉴卷之二十五竟 灵宝玉鉴卷之二十六

**Divine Talisman—**
The talisman is issued to dissolve grievances, release karmic bonds, seek liberation from vengeful spirits, and resolve all confrontations and transgressions. May all malevolent karma cease, and the departed escape the Cold Courts of Hell. Let the roots of sin be eradicated, as decreed.

Issued in the year ____, month ____, day ____, at the hour ____.

By the ordained minister of the Dharma-position, [Name], who receives the decree and executes it.

**At the Palace of the Eastern Extremity, the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity’s Salvation from Suffering, the Azure Mystery Supreme Emperor.**

**Purport of the Vermilion Mound’s Refinement and Mysterious Directive—**
The master sits in tranquil repose, calming the hundred cares. Within the Mud-Pill Palace atop his own head—the Celestial Abyss of the Heavenly Valley—light illumines within and without. There, the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity sits upon a throne of gold and jade, clad in azure robes, vermilion slippers, a cloud-wrought crown, and holding a jade scepter. A halo encircles his neck, and golden lotuses bear his feet. Presently, the Heavenly Worthy radiates the luminous brilliance of a hundred treasures, illuminating the eight directions.

Then, with one’s own nature, one ascends to pay homage to the Heavenly Worthy, reverently reciting his sacred name. Suddenly, purple qi descends from the palace like threads, settling into the cinnabar field, coalescing into a luminous orb the size of a pellet, resplendent in purplish-gold. Let one’s nature ever abide within the Heavenly Valley atop the crown, never allowing it to scatter.

In the midst of this true visualization, the form is suddenly forgotten, stillness pervades, and clarity extends above and below. Whether walking, standing, sitting, or reclining, one may cultivate this practice. This is the Dao of refining form and spirit to attain unity.

When the purple qi enters the cinnabar field, it naturally generates the true fire of radiant essence—this is the work of primordial yang qi. As it is said: *When the Great Unity resides in the head, the myriad spirits pay homage.* The divine luminaries stand guard with mighty power, subduing all demonic and malevolent forces, which dare not oppose.

When spirit and qi flourish, illness vanishes forever. Whatever is sought or undertaken shall be instantly answered. For it is by refining qi with spirit, and spirit with form, that both form and spirit attain perfection, and the body merges with spontaneity. Gathering the myriad methods into the One True, dispersing the One True into the ten thousand scenes—no longer bound by existence or non-existence, forever transcending birth and death—this is the True Person.

Those who receive this method shall burn incense, face east, and kneel in reverence. Visualize one’s true nature, disclosing past and present transgressions and karmic errors. Release the nine generations of ancestors and the seven lineages of forebears, masters and fellow disciples, as well as all offenses in both yin and yang. Universally extend this deliverance to the six paths and four modes of birth—winged, crawling, submerged, and hidden—all shall be transformed and liberated.

Humbly beseech the Heavenly Worthy to bestow compassion, responding to devotion and effecting communion. May the minister’s heart be at peace, qi flourish, the spirit-chamber radiant, and the mysterious merit be accomplished. May no demonic trials arise, and may all ascend to the Realm of Eternal Joy, merging with the Dao in truth.

Thereafter, inscribe the talisman.

**Incantation for Empowering the Brush—**
By the Jade Mandate of the Primordial Beginning, the Dharma is spread and numinous power deployed. The Dao’s methods bestow grace, and those who receive the talisman transcend rebirth. Whatever transgressions and sins exist shall all be eradicated. Upon witnessing these jade words, the myriad spirits heed them.

**Incantation for Empowering the Vermilion—**
The jade tone gathers qi, the numinous wind assembles mist. The Purple Void flourishes in splendor, aiding the ten thousand immortals. A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—spontaneously perfected in truth. *Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Ordinance of the Numinous Treasure’s Salvation of Humanity!*

**Prayer Incantation—**
Through the Dharma-gate, guided along the Dharma-path, bathed in the divine spring, sprinkled with sweet dew—may the heart be purified, the form perfected, the voice exalted, and the spirit complete. Those who have never heard the Dharma-sound of the Heavenly Worthy shall now be enabled to hear it. Those who have never received the Heavenly Worthy’s benevolent grace shall now be enabled to encounter it. Attaining human or celestial rebirth, they shall follow the talisman to transcendence. *Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Ordinance!*

**The talisman on the right employs the Jade Clarity Mudra.** Draw the qi of the Celestial Gate and blow it onto the brush. Next, trace the Xun trigram’s pattern, recite the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity’s Salvation from Suffering eighty-one times, and gather the Azure Mystery qi to blow onto the brush. Then recite *By the decree of the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity’s Salvation from Suffering, execute the command* eighty-one times, drawing the Azure Mystery qi into the brush. Recite eighty-one times again, and once more draw the qi into the brush. Inscribe the talisman in accordance with the qi.

**Vermilion Mound’s Decree—**
*The Supreme’s Salvation of the Living, the Dead, and the Suffering—Vermilion Mound’s Direct Talisman for Transcendence.*

**The talisman on the right is conferred upon the soul of [Name].**
The Heavenly Worthy saves the suffering; the immortal Dao treasures life. Opening the eight gates, the Flying Celestial Dharma-Wheel universally bestows deliverance, transforming the dead into living beings. Ascend to the Cinnabar Radiance of the Cinnabar Heaven’s Flaming Light Realm, the Vermilion Brightness Land, within the Palace of Double Yang. Pay homage to the Celestial Lord, transcend through the Vermilion Mound, the Flowing Fire Divine Court, and the Fire-Refining Pool. The fire’s essence refines and purges all dust and filth. Transformed and reborn, they rest upon the red lotus. Attaining the status of a novice celestial being, all shall be as decreed.

Issued in the year ____, month ____, day ____, at the hour ____.

By the ordained minister of the Dharma-position, [Name], who receives the decree and executes it.

**At the Palace of the Eastern Extremity, the Greatly Compassionate One Who Responds to Cries and Attends to Devotion, the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity’s Salvation from Suffering.**

**Prayer for the Vermilion Mound’s Dispersed-Form Yellow Register—**
Invoke the Supreme’s Mudra, the southern qi, and visualize the method of ascension and deliverance.

The Jade Eyes of the Great Numinous divide the essence of heaven and earth. One qi blends and harmonizes; yin and yang assist in completion. The Controller of Destiny unites with virtue, and the four seasons give birth to life. The Fire Bell refines and delivers, with the numinous perfected ones to the left and right. *Swiftly, in accordance with the Ordinance, the nine qi generate the divine!*

*Thus concludes the twenty-fifth scroll of the* Numinous Treasure Jade Mirror.
*Here begins the twenty-sixth scroll of the* Numinous Treasure Jade Mirror.

The Golden Register White Tablet of Salvation from Suffering, proclaimed to the ten directions’ boundless worlds, the Three Bureaus and Nine Offices, the one hundred twenty courts, the Five Thearchs’ Examiners, the Nine Dark Hells, the Mighty Heavenly Enforcers, the divine soldiers who mete out punishment, the Recorders of Destiny, the Controllers of Merit, the Controllers of Execution, the Ox-Headed Wardens, and the great demons of the Three Realms:

*The Register of Golden Writs for Life-Prolonging Deliverance*

*The Golden Register of the Highest Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure, for Life-Prolonging Deliverance*

In the year of the cyclical sign [X], of the [X] district and [X] residence, [Name] humbly petitions for the intention of [Name].

Reverently approaching the Altar of the Yellow Register, [Name] is bestowed and entrusted with *The Golden Register of the Highest Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure, for Life-Prolonging Deliverance*, First Grade, to be received and upheld.

To traverse the Three Realms, to ascend beyond the Nine Heavens.

As the scripture states: In primordial times, the Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning, dwelling in the Three Yuan Palace of the Ninefold Pure Wondrous Realm, expounded the most profound teachings amidst the great assembly, enlightening humans and devas. He recorded meritorious deeds, inscribing names upon the Yellow Register, golden tablets, and jade slips, arrayed before the Three Clarities.

Within every hell, the Ten Directions’ Celestial Worthies of Salvation from Suffering were seen entering the Nine Dark Realms to deliver all from torment.

The Celestial Worthy universally addressed the four assemblies: "If you can receive and uphold the Golden Register and White Tablet, the Nine Perfected Wondrous Precepts, the Talisman of Longevity, and the True Talisman of Salvation from Suffering, you shall eradicate the great sins of the Nine Dark Realms and inscribe your names in the Nine Palaces.

The Youths Who Observe Fate, the Guardian Spirits of the Precepts, the Direct Talismans of the Five Emperors, and the Clerks of the Six Palaces shall naturally follow the writ’s text to shelter and protect the precept-receiving disciples."

Now, for your sake, the Nine Perfected Wondrous Precepts and the merits of receiving and upholding the Golden Register and White Tablet shall be expounded—to deliver from peril, to relieve suffering, with divine power beyond comprehension.

All spirits bow their heads in reverence, humbly receiving the teachings and commands.

chunks.original_text: 天尊告日 一者敬让，孝养父母。 二者克勤，忠於君主。 三者不杀，慈救众生。 四者不淫，正身处物。 五者不盗，推义损己。 六者不嗔，凶怒凌人。 七者不诈，谄贼害善。 八者不骄，傲忽至真。 九者不二，奉戒专一。 护戒威神 元始符命金箓白简救苦真符，告下十方无极世界，三官九府，百二十曹，五帝考官，九幽地狱，巨天力士，执罚神兵，司箓司命，司功司杀，牛头狱卒，三界大魔。 拔度某神魂，出离地狱，永辞长夜，睹见光明。 万罪荡除，冤仇和释。 乘此九真妙戒拔度功德，上生天堂，一如告命。 元始符命金箓白简长生灵符，告下南方丹天世界，朱陵火府，南昌上宫，长生大君，韩君司马，司命司箓，延寿益算，度厄尊神，回骸起死，监生大神。 超度某灵魂，上登朱宫，流火之庭，玉眸炼质，黄华荡形。 书名紫策，受化更生。 乘此金箓度命功德，时刻升迁，一如告命。 当愿亡过某魂，受度之后，永充济拔，人间天上，敬信奉行，一如玄科律令。 年岁次　月　日黄箓斋坛给。 保举师具法位　姓　某　押。 监度师具法位　姓　某　押。 度　师具法位　姓　某　押。 右长生度命金箓，用青缯被背，金锦表首，轴头长八尺一寸，并泥金书篆，人物等形，亦用金画，外以经带束之。 於炼度后宣给，同升天大券用之。 九天宝诰 青素九尺制造成轴，研朱书篆。 玉清神霄九天宝诰 据乡贯入意，乞行 科法，炼度亡魂。 请颁 神霄九天宝诰，给付正度某魂，遵守奉行，永为身宝者。 上帝玉符，九天紫府内音，宣告三官九府，百二十曹，天牢地狱，主司大神。 拔度亡过某，统领符命，部卫形魂，上朝帝庭。 罪仇和释，与道合并，神登玉阙，受炼长存，一如告命。 亡过某魂 受度之后，当愿手持

The Heavenly Worthy proclaims:

First: reverence and deference, filial piety and care for parents.
Second: diligence and loyalty to one’s lord and sovereign.
Third: non-killing, compassionate deliverance of all beings.
Fourth: non-lechery, rectifying the body and dwelling in integrity.
Fifth: non-theft, extending righteousness and diminishing the self.
Sixth: non-anger, forsaking violence and aggression toward others.
Seventh: non-deceit, abandoning flattery and harm to the good.
Eighth: non-arrogance, casting off pride and contempt for the Perfect Truth.
Ninth: non-duality, upholding the precepts with single-minded devotion.

The Guardian Spirits of the Precepts, the Mandate of the Primordial Beginning, the Golden Register and White Tablet, and the True Talisman of Salvation from Suffering now proclaim to the ten directions of the boundless worlds, to the Three Bureaus and Nine Offices, the One Hundred Twenty Courts, the Examiners of the Five Emperors, the Nine Dark Hells, the Mighty Heavenly Enforcers, the Divine Soldiers of Punishment, the Registrars of Destiny, the Recorders of Merit, the Executors of Death, the Ox-Headed Wardens, and the Great Demons of the Three Realms:

Deliver the divine soul of so-and-so, extricating it from hell, forever parting from eternal night, beholding the light. All sins shall be purged, all grievances resolved. By the merit of this deliverance through the Nine Perfected Wondrous Precepts, ascend to the heavens, all as commanded.

The Mandate of the Primordial Beginning, the Golden Register and White Tablet, and the Talisman of Longevity now proclaim to the Southern Cinnabar Heavenly Realm, the Vermilion Numinous Fire Bureau, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, the Great Lord of Longevity, the Venerable Han and Sima, the Registrars of Destiny, the Extenders of Lifespan, the Divine Deliverers from Calamity, the Reanimators of the Dead, and the Overseers of Life:

Exalt the divine soul of so-and-so, ascending to the Vermilion Palace, the Courtyard of Flowing Fire, where jade pupils refine the form and yellow blossoms purify the body. Inscribe the name upon the purple register, receiving transformation and rebirth. By the merit of this deliverance through the Golden Register, ascend moment by moment, all as commanded.

May the delivered soul of the departed so-and-so, after receiving this deliverance, forever serve in salvation, in the human realm and the heavens, reverently believing and practicing, all in accordance with the Mysterious Statutes and Ordinances.

Issued on the ___ day of the ___ month, in the year ____, by the Altar of the Golden Register Retreat.

Recommending Master (rank and title) _____ (seal)
Supervising Deliverance Master (rank and title) _____ (seal)
Deliverance Master (rank and title) _____ (seal)

This Longevity and Life-Delivering Golden Register shall be backed with blue-green silk, its front adorned with golden brocade, the scroll’s shaft measuring eight feet and one inch in length. All characters shall be inscribed in gold powder, with figures and forms likewise painted in gold. It shall be bound externally with a scripture ribbon. After the refinement and deliverance rites, it shall be proclaimed and bestowed, to be used as a celestial contract for ascension to heaven.

The Nine Heavens’ Precious Edict
Crafted from nine feet of blue-green silk, inscribed in cinnabar seal script.

The Precious Edict of the Nine Heavens of the Jade Clarity Divine Empyrean
In accordance with the petitioner’s native place and intent, seeking to perform the ritual statutes for the refinement and deliverance of the departed soul, the Precious Edict of the Nine Heavens of the Divine Empyrean is hereby issued to the rightful recipient, the delivered soul of so-and-so, to be reverently upheld as a lifelong treasure.

The Jade Mandate of the Celestial Emperor, the inner decree of the Nine Heavens’ Purple Bureau, is proclaimed to the Three Bureaus and Nine Offices, the One Hundred Twenty Courts, the Heavenly Prisons and Earthly Hells, and the presiding divine officials:

Deliver the departed so-and-so, commanding the talismanic writ to escort the soul, ascending to the Celestial Court. All grievances shall be resolved, merging with the Dao, the spirit ascending to the Jade Palace, undergoing refinement for eternal preservation, all as commanded.

May the departed soul of so-and-so, after receiving deliverance, vow henceforth to hold fast...

**Proclamation of the Right Contract for Ascension to the Numinous Treasure, issued to the guardian deities of the celestial gates.**

All contract texts shall be proclaimed one by one after the recitation of precepts and transmission of talismans, then divided according to the prescribed form. The left side, together with the four talismans of safeguarding, shall be burned at the Refinement and Salvation Altar. The right side shall be given to the departed as proof for ascension to heaven. The two contracts, once separated, shall each be affixed to the left and right sides of the banner, alongside the Ninefold Refinement Talismans of the Celestial Worthies. The banner shall then be placed above the gate.

**Inscription of Talismans and Incantations**
The ninefold qi refines the spirit; the Three Luminaries coalesce to form it.
The fire of life refines the spirit, restoring the human form.
Hasten to obey the Jade Purity’s decree.

**Jade Purity Numinous Treasure Universal Salvation of Myriad Spirits Incantation**
**Incantation of the Golden Portal’s Lord, Transmitted to Xu Jingyang for the Salvation of Ancestral Spirits**
Oṃ hūṃ trāḥ līḥ.
Oṃ, the Primal Origin generates heaven; Oṃ, the Primal Origin generates earth; Oṃ, the Primal Origin generates humanity.
The Two Modes complete the transformation, and the myriad things flourish.
If humans fail to preserve their wholeness, they transform into yin spirits.
If spirits fail to preserve their wholeness, they degenerate into lower ghosts.
Oṃ, upon hearing my jade-like voice, the ghostly form shall vanish.
Abandoning that ghostly form, ascend to the celestial abode.
Oṃ, upon hearing my jade-like voice, those in the human realm shall instantly renounce their mortal karma, attaining long life as immortals, sharing the lifespan of heaven and earth, and the radiance of sun and moon.
One’s own body receives grace, and the seven ancestors are honored.
Having delivered the seven ancestors, one dwells in the Jade Purity.
Oṃ, upon hearing my kingly voice, those in the celestial realm shall instantly increase their celestial blessings, forever extinguishing past karma, never falling to the lower heavens, and eternally abiding in the Jade Purity.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Primal Origin’s Lord’s universal salvation of myriad spirits, as decreed.

This incantation may be recited daily to universally deliver all true registers.

*Lingbao Yujian*, Scroll Twenty-Seven concludes.

chunks.original_text: 山简 告文共五行 今谨有略节意於某处，修建黄箓大斋几昼夜。 以今满散，投简名山。 愿神愿仙，长生度世，飞行上清。 五岳真人，至圣至灵，乞削罪簿。 上名九天。 谨诣名山，金龙驿传。 年岁次　月　日具位臣姓某於某处告下。 右山简制式，在前。 用金龙一枚，金钮九只，青彩缠之。 斋事毕，卜良辰，法师同众官诣名山洞府，依式投醮，法事关告，投龙进简。 若路远师众不可拘，选委二三人去，亦可。 水简 如山简式，诣灵泉海渎等处投之。 告文 今谨有略节意於某处，修建黄箓大斋几昼夜。 以今满散，投简水府。 愿神愿仙，九府水帝，十二河源，江河淮济，溟冷大神。 乞削罪簿，上名九天，谨诣水府，金龙驿传。 年岁次　月　日具位臣姓某於处告下。 土简 如山简式，埋於坛所中庭土宫。 告文 今谨有略节意於某处，修建黄箓大斋几昼夜。 以今满散，投简灵坛，中黄九地，戊己黄神，土府五帝。 乞削罪名，请诣中宫，一切灵神。 削除罪簿，注名九天，谨诣土府，金龙驿传。 年岁次　月　日具位臣姓某於某处告下。 投山简符 书符咒 太上三天，天帝玉直。 三光监映，威制群灵。 五常回度，山岳藏烟。 真炁结实，应化自然。 急急如　天皇上帝律令。 投水简符 书符咒 太上冲玄，勑制河源。 九江水渎，河海弥洋。 天运回度，开释九玄。 急急如律令。 投土简符 书符咒 太上三晨，大罗之中。 九地厚德，合妙元宫，万神宗集，福庆弥隆。 急急如上帝律令。 四季投简符 右符立春甲寅日书之。 右符立夏甲午日书之。 右符立秋甲申日书之。 右符立冬甲子日书之。 简内告文 元始符命，玉清真文，告下诸天丞相，度人不死之神，长生大神，司马大神，韩君丈人，南斗六司，权机省署，太玄神庭。 严校三界，无极神乡，泉曲之府，北都罗酆，三官九署，十二河源。 普度苦爽，亿万幽魂，疾除罪簿，落灭恶根。 不得拘留，部卫形魂，速灭三恶，斩绝地根。 飞度五户，名列太玄，魔王保举，度上南宫。 朱陵受炼，仙化成人。 永度三涂，五苦八难。 天门无拘，五帝侍迎。 超凌三界，逍遥上清。 今日受命？ 万神成听，一如契令。 年岁次　月　日时某处告下。 玉璧三枚，投进龙简。 天官用苍璧圆形，地官用黄璧方形，水官用玄璧六出形，皆虚其中，各径三寸。 科曰：玉以 贞洁之德，可以盟感上真，故以为信。 若投龙简，当以青彩纽缠，而副之青丝，以代割发，金纽以代歃血，上告三官也。 缺者考属地官九都曹。 金纽二十七枚，径九分，如环之状。 每简用九枚。 天子用金。 余用银涂金，以青丝缠之，同龙简投之。 水简璧式黑色 土简璧式黄色 山简璧式青色 右简三式，君主用玉，王侯用璧玉，士庶用玉石为之，其次许以梓木代之。 并长一只二寸，阔三寸六分，厚三分。 以金泥篆之。 加木简，以粉刷简，以雌黄界边，朱书符，墨书告文，黄罗为袋。 各以金龙一条，金纽十二枚，玉璧一事，散坛各诣逐处设醮，依科投之。 书时用灵宝炁诀。 投山简宣咒 玄上开明，元始监真。 上帝五色，赤书丹文。 天地本始，总领三光。 摄气召会，催促举仙。 高上符命，普告十方。 日月星宿，五岳灵山。 天上地下，冥灵大神。 监生主录，南上三门。 关领玉简，勒名丹篇。

**Mountain Memorial**
The memorial text shall consist of five lines. Herein, with reverent intent at [location], a grand Yellow Register Retreat of [number] days and nights is conducted. Upon its completion and dispersal, the memorial tablet is to be presented to the sacred mountains. May the divine and transcendent ones grant long life and deliverance from the world, ascending to the Upper Clarity. O Five Marchmount Perfected, most sagely and numinous, we beseech you to expunge our names from the ledgers of sin. May our names ascend to the Nine Heavens. With due reverence, we journey to the sacred mountains, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year [cyclical year], month [month], day [day], the humble official [name], at [location], respectfully submits this memorial.

The above is the prescribed form for the Mountain Memorial, as previously set forth. Use one Golden Dragon tablet, nine golden clasps, and bind them with azure silk. Upon the retreat’s conclusion, select an auspicious day, and the Dharma Master, together with the assembled officials, shall proceed to the sacred mountains and grotto-palaces to present the offering, perform the ritual, and submit the memorial in accordance with the prescribed form. If the journey is distant and the assembly cannot be convened, two or three delegates may be dispatched in their stead.

**Water Memorial**
Follow the form of the Mountain Memorial, but present it to the numinous springs, seas, and riverine deities.

**Memorial Text**
Herein, with reverent intent at [location], a grand Yellow Register Retreat of [number] days and nights is conducted. Upon its completion and dispersal, the memorial tablet is to be presented to the Water Palaces. May the divine and transcendent ones, the Nine Water Sovereigns, the Twelve River Sources, the Jiang, He, Huai, and Ji, and the vast and numinous deities of the deep, expunge our names from the ledgers of sin. May our names ascend to the Nine Heavens. With due reverence, we journey to the Water Palaces, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year [cyclical year], month [month], day [day], the humble official [name], at [location], respectfully submits this memorial.

**Earth Memorial**
Follow the form of the Mountain Memorial, but bury it in the central courtyard of the altar’s Earth Palace.

**Memorial Text**
Herein, with reverent intent at [location], a grand Yellow Register Retreat of [number] days and nights is conducted. Upon its completion and dispersal, the memorial tablet is to be presented to the Numinous Altar, the Central Yellow of the Nine Earths, the Yellow Deities of Wu and Ji, and the Five Sovereigns of the Earth Palace. We beseech the expungement of our names from the ledgers of sin and petition to approach the Central Palace, all numinous deities. May our names be expunged from the ledgers of sin and inscribed in the Nine Heavens. With due reverence, we journey to the Earth Palace, conveyed by the Golden Dragon Courier.

In the year [cyclical year], month [month], day [day], the humble official [name], at [location], respectfully submits this memorial.

**Talisman for Presenting the Mountain Memorial**
*Inscribe the talisman and incantation:*
The Three Heavens of the Supreme, the Jade Uprightness of the Celestial Thearch. The Three Luminaries oversee and illuminate, their majesty restraining the host of spirits. The Five Constants reverse their course, the mountains and peaks conceal their mists. True qi congeals and solidifies, responding and transforming by nature. Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Celestial August Thearch.

**Talisman for Presenting the Water Memorial**
*Inscribe the talisman and incantation:*
The Supreme’s Profound Mystery commands and restrains the river sources. The Nine Jiang and watercourses, the rivers and seas stretch boundlessly. The celestial revolutions reverse their course, releasing the Nine Mysteries. Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

**Talisman for Presenting the Earth Memorial**
*Inscribe the talisman and incantation:*
The Three Mornings of the Supreme, within the Great Net. The profound virtue of the Nine Earths harmonizes with the Mysterious Origin Palace. The myriad spirits gather in reverence, their blessings and felicity overflowing. Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Celestial Thearch.

**Seasonal Talismans for Presenting Memorials**
The above talisman is to be inscribed on the *jiayin* day of the Beginning of Spring.
The above talisman is to be inscribed on the *jiawu* day of the Beginning of Summer.
The above talisman is to be inscribed on the *jiashen* day of the Beginning of Autumn.
The above talisman is to be inscribed on the *jiazi* day of the Beginning of Winter.

**Text of the Memorial Tablet**
The Primal Origin’s talismanic command, the true script of the Jade Clarity, is hereby proclaimed to the celestial ministers, the deathless deities who deliver humanity, the great deities of long life, the Controller of Horses, the Venerable Lord Han, the Six Offices of the Southern Dipper, the bureaus of authority and scrutiny, the divine courts of the Great Mystery. Strictly examine the Three Realms, the boundless divine lands, the palaces of the Yellow Springs, the Northern Capital of Fengdu, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, the Twelve River Sources. Universally deliver the suffering souls, the countless myriads of hidden spirits. Swiftly expunge the ledgers of sin, eradicate the roots of evil. Do not detain or restrain them; escort their forms and souls. Speedily extinguish the Three Evils, sever the roots of the earth. Ascend through the Five Gates, their names inscribed in the Great Mystery. The Demon Kings shall vouch for them, delivering them to the Southern Palace. They shall receive refinement in the Vermilion Mound, transformed into transcendent beings. Forever delivered from the Three Paths, the Five Sufferings, and the Eight Difficulties. The gates of heaven shall not detain them; the Five Thearchs shall welcome them. They shall transcend the Three Realms, roaming freely in the Upper Clarity. Today, they receive the mandate. May the myriad spirits heed and fulfill this decree.

In the year [cyclical year], month [month], day [day], at [location], this memorial is respectfully submitted.

**Three Jade Discs for Presenting the Dragon Tablets**
For the Celestial Office, use a round azure disc; for the Earth Office, a square yellow disc; for the Water Office, a six-pointed dark disc, each hollowed at the center, three *cun* in diameter.

The ritual states: Jade, with its virtue of purity and integrity, may ally and move the Upper Perfected, and thus serves as a token of faith. When presenting the Dragon Tablets, bind them with azure silk, and attach azure threads to substitute for the cutting of hair, and golden clasps to substitute for the blood oath, thereby proclaiming to the Three Offices. Those found deficient shall be examined by the Nine Bureaus of the Earth Office.

**Golden Clasps**
Twenty-seven clasps, nine *fen* in diameter, ring-shaped. Use nine clasps per tablet. The Son of Heaven uses gold; others use silver gilded, bound with azure threads, and presented together with the Dragon Tablets.

**Water Memorial Disc**
The disc for the Water Memorial is black.

**Earth Memorial Disc**
The disc for the Earth Memorial is yellow.

**Mountain Memorial Disc**
The disc for the Mountain Memorial is azure.

For the three forms of memorials above, the sovereign uses jade, feudal lords use jade discs, and scholar-officials and commoners use jade or stone; if unavailable, catalpa wood may be substituted. Each tablet is one *chi* and two *cun* in length, three *cun* and six *fen* in width, and three *fen* in thickness. Inscribe them with golden cinnabar. For wooden tablets, coat them with powder, outline the edges with orpiment, inscribe the talismans in vermilion, the memorial text in ink, and place them in yellow silk bags. Each is accompanied by one Golden Dragon tablet, twelve golden clasps, and one jade disc. At the dispersal of the altar, proceed to each respective site to perform the offering and present them in accordance with the ritual.

When inscribing, use the Lingbao qi hand seal.

**Incantation for Presenting the Mountain Memorial**
The Mysterious and Exalted opens the light, the Primal Origin oversees the true. The Five Colors of the Celestial Thearch, the vermilion script of the red writings. The origins of heaven and earth, governing the Three Luminaries. Gather and summon the qi, hasten the ascent of the transcendent. The exalted talismanic command universally proclaims to the ten directions. Sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the numinous mountains of the Five Marchmounts. Above in heaven, below on earth, the great spirits of the hidden and numinous. Supervisors of life and keepers of records, the Three Gates of the Southern Summit. Receive and transmit the Jade Tablet, inscribe the names in the vermilion register.

chunks.original_text: 削落罪目，上补帝臣。 斋主某人，皈凭至道，建立斋功，拔赎九祖，一切罪魂。 行道事竟，径诣灵山。 请投玉简，乞削罪名，皆蒙解脱，无有冤亲。 去离三恶，魂升九天，生死开度，亿劫长存。 今日上告，万神咸闻，请以金纽，开盟真官。 乞如所告。 金马驿传。 投水简宣咒 元始五老，上帝高尊。 十方至真，太华灵仙。 赤文告命，无幽不闻。 上御九天，请下玉文。 日月五星，北斗七元。 中告五岳，四方灵山。 下告河海，十二泉源。 九府水帝，溟泠大神。 今日上告，万愿开陈。 斋主某人，建斋行道，普为存亡。 请赎九祖，宿对罪根。 谨设玉简，乞得上闻。 记名水府，过去升天。 生死开度，万神咸闻。 谨以金纽，告盟水帝。 请如所陈，金龙驿传。 投土简宣咒 天地开张，万炁分灵。 三元同符，十方朗清。 五老上帝，主领死生。 丹书赤文，元始上清。 普告天下，九地皇灵。 今日上告，万仙定生。 斋主某人，建斋行道，普为存亡。 我愿我身，即得飞仙。 谨投玉简，土府太皇。 削除罪刑，奏名上宫。 刊籍华清，早得成仙。 天地同灵，九祖种亲。 腐骸更荣，魂生南宫，受化仙庭。 今日告命，万神成听，谨以金纽，表盟至诚。 请如斯言，金龙驿传。 灵宝玉鉴卷之二十八竟 灵宝玉鉴卷之二十九

The erasure of transgressions shall ascend to redeem the imperial ministers. The patron, [Name], takes refuge in the Supreme Dao, establishing merit through the retreat, redeeming the nine generations of ancestors and all sinful souls. Present the jade tablet, beseeching the erasure of transgression names, that all may attain liberation, without enmity or kinship. Departing the Three Evil Realms, souls ascend to the Nine Heavens, delivered from life and death, eternally preserved through kalpas. Today’s supplication is universally heard by the myriad spirits. With golden clasps, invoke the covenant of the perfected officials. May the petition be granted as proclaimed. Transmitted by the Golden Horse Courier.

**Incantation for Presenting the Water Tablet**
The Primal Origin and Five Elders, the Exalted Lords of Heaven. The perfected of the ten directions, the numinous immortals of Mount Taihua. The vermilion script proclaims the command, heard in even the most hidden realms. Ascending to the Nine Heavens, beseech the descent of the jade writ. Sun, moon, and five stars, the Northern Dipper’s seven origins. Petition the Five Marchmounts at the center, the numinous mountains of the four directions. Below, address the rivers and seas, the twelve springs. The Water Emperors of the Nine Treasuries, the great spirits of the vast and cold. Today’s supplication is laid before all. The patron, [Name], establishes the retreat and performs the Daoist rites, universally for the living and the dead. Beseech redemption for the nine generations of ancestors, the karmic roots of past transgressions. Reverently present the jade tablet, that it may ascend and be heard. Inscribe names in the Water Bureau, that the departed may ascend to heaven. Delivered from life and death, universally heard by the myriad spirits. With golden clasps, covenant the Water Emperor. May the petition be granted as proclaimed. Transmitted by the Golden Dragon Courier.

**Incantation for Presenting the Earth Tablet**
Heaven and earth unfold, the myriad qi divide their numinosity. The Three Origins unite in resonance, the ten directions shine in clarity. The Five Elder Lords of Heaven govern life and death. The vermilion script of the red writings, the Primal Origin of the Supreme Clarity. Universally proclaimed beneath heaven, the august spirits of the nine earths. Today’s supplication is affirmed by the myriad immortals. The patron, [Name], establishes the retreat and performs the Daoist rites, universally for the living and the dead. My vow is for my own self to swiftly attain transcendence. Reverently present the jade tablet to the Great Emperor of the Earth Bureau. Erase the records of transgressions and punishments, memorialize names in the Upper Palace. Engrave the register in the Flowery Clarity, swiftly attain immortality. Heaven and earth unite in numinosity, the nine generations of ancestors and kin. The decayed bones shall flourish anew, souls reborn in the Southern Palace, transformed in the immortal courts. Today’s command is universally heard by the myriad spirits. With golden clasps, pledge utmost sincerity in covenant. May these words be fulfilled as spoken. Transmitted by the Golden Dragon Courier.

chunks.original_text: 开明幽暗门 夫一炁肇分，二仪定位。 阴则为重浊之炁，凝于地。 阳则为轻清之炁，浮于天方阴阳混凝妒则为中和之黑，锺于人。 一一是故亭毒．三才，发育万化者，莫非一炁流行之妙。 况夫人性，本来清净明妙，虚彻灵通。 地狱天堂，了无所有。 因其性习之异，人欲滋萌，由念缘情，因情积业，触境应现，随报湮沉。 故善之类则为阳，恶之类则为阴。 所以天堂地狱之事，实由善恶一念之所致也。 故我灵宝大法，有燃灯破狱，拯滞拔幽之义，则必先内发玄照，以明天本然妙无之慧灯。 然后以发明众生固有之觉性，使灯灯相续，内外洞明。 俾其开释无辜，迁善远罪。 则一旦超然，摄化於高明正大之域，顿悟本来清净自然之道。 前之所谓罪根恶业，安所有哉。 地狱天堂，等归空寂。 然而善不善之念，可不慎欤。 造策杖式 法曰：凡造策杖，须择名山福地，净域灵墟，用吉日取向阳甘竹一枝，长五尺五寸，通有九节者。 安奉争处，选甲午、丙午、丁卯，或三月三日，七月七日，九月九日。 其第二节左，微曲一曲。 於第三节下，四面开窍，以纳五岳内形符，又实以灵书中篇。 各以黄蜡封固。 专意佩持者，用黄缯袋之。 行事之际，以小黄旛一首，长七寸，中篆十天玄化符，背书青玄威章，悬於第二节下。 受持之久，以杖指天，则天神设礼，指地则地祇奉迎，指四方八表，则万鬼束形，指地狱幽牢，则罪魂升度。 久则解衣覆竹，可以隐形。 行持之时，当叩齿三十六通，存五帝直符，金童玉女，各一人侍卫策杖。 久则自然有五色流光，焕明于上矣。 咒曰 泰山之阳，元始上精。 开张天地，甘竹通灵。 真符守吏，部卫形神。 五色流光，朱衣金缨。 辅翼上真，出入幽冥。 灵竹神策，与天齐龄。 合我以生，契我以成。 万化之外，以代我形。 五解同机，三景。 合明。 天上地下，靡不通灵。 急急如律令。 右咒毕，引五方真炁，各三十六咽。 於三元、八节、本命、生辰，合炁行持，存神诵咒，精诚不怠，与道合真，久则与我同升矣。 五灵破狱策杖内符 咒曰 金阙化身，真炁周流。 慧光焕景，金虎破幽。 急急如律令。 右符混合五炁书，入策杖内。 五岳内讳符 东方卯文，青炁； 用五色纸书之于杖内。 南方午文赤炁 西方酉文白炁 北方子文黑炁 中央玉文中炁 旛式用黄缯制，正面肚中书十天方化符。 十方玄化符 咒曰 天地之先，妙化无垠。 磅礴二气，万汇肇形。 凝景合妙，返胎复婴。 慧光无碍，洞朗八冥。 普受开度，十转回灵。 急急如青玄天尊律令。 肚面中书后救苦天尊符。 十方救苦天尊符祖炁中文 存天尊放百宝祥光，照明天地。 咒曰 天尊宝诰，勅汝诸鬼。 关锁速开，铁城摧毁。 拔度幽魂，速离关轨。 急急如律令。 背面顶中书
chunks.translated_text:
The Illumination of the Gates of Darkness

When the primordial qi first divided, the Two Modes took their places. Yin, as the heavy and turbid qi, congealed into earth; yang, as the light and pure qi, floated into heaven. Where yin and yang intermingled and fused, the harmonious blackness of the Center coalesced in man. Thus, the nurturing of the Three Powers and the generation of the myriad transformations arise from nothing but the wondrous flow of the one qi.

Moreover, human nature is originally pure, luminous, and subtly wondrous—empty, penetrating, and spiritually communicative. Hell and heaven are utterly non-existent. Yet due to differences in nature and habit, human desires sprout and grow. From thought arises emotion, from emotion accumulates karma, and as karma encounters circumstances, it manifests accordingly, leading to sinking or rising in accordance with retribution. Thus, those of good kind belong to yang, while those of evil kind belong to yin. Therefore, the affairs of heaven and hell are truly brought about by a single thought of good or evil.

Hence, in the great methods of the Numinous Treasure, there is the principle of lighting lamps to break open hells and deliver the stagnant and rescue the hidden. This must first begin with the inner arising of mysterious illumination, to brighten the originally wondrous and non-existent wisdom-lamp of heaven. Then, one illuminates the inherent awakened nature of all beings, causing lamps to connect in succession, inwardly and outwardly pervading with clarity. Thereby, the innocent are released, goodness is pursued, and transgressions are distanced. Then, in an instant, one transcends and is transformed within the domain of the lofty, bright, upright, and great, suddenly awakening to the originally pure and natural Dao. Where then are the so-called roots of sin and evil karma? Hell and heaven alike return to emptiness and quiescence. Yet how can one not be cautious of thoughts of good and evil?

---

**Method for Crafting the Staff of Strategy**

The method states: For crafting the staff of strategy, one must select a propitious day in a renowned mountain, blessed land, pure domain, or numinous site. Take a single stalk of sweet bamboo facing the sun, five feet and five inches in length, with nine nodes in total. Enshrine it in a clean place. Choose days such as *jiǎ-wǔ*, *bǐng-wǔ*, or *dīng-mǎo*, or the third day of the third month, the seventh day of the seventh month, or the ninth day of the ninth month.

At the second node from the top, make a slight curve to the left. Below the third node, open apertures on all four sides to receive the inner talismans of the Five Peaks, and fill it with the middle section of the Numinous Scriptures. Seal each with yellow wax. For those who carry it with focused intent, use a yellow silk bag.

When performing rituals, attach a small yellow pennant, seven inches long, inscribed on the front with the *Ten Heavenly Transformations Talisman* and on the back with the *Mighty Chapter of the Azure Mystery*. Suspend it below the second node.

With prolonged use, pointing the staff to heaven will cause celestial spirits to present themselves in reverence; pointing to earth will cause earth deities to offer welcome; pointing to the four directions and the eight boundaries will cause the myriad ghosts to restrain their forms; pointing to the dark prisons of hell will cause sinful souls to ascend and be delivered. Over time, covering the bamboo with one’s robe can render one invisible.

When wielding the staff, knock the teeth together thirty-six times, and visualize the Five Emperors’ direct talismans, with one Golden Lad and one Jade Maiden attending the staff. With prolonged practice, five-colored flowing light will naturally radiate and shine above.

On the southern slope of Mount Tai, the primordial essence of the Supreme Origin.
Opening heaven and earth, the sweet bamboo communicates with the numinous.
True talismans guard the officers, protecting form and spirit.
Five-colored flowing light, crimson robes and golden tassels.

Unite with me in life, align with me in accomplishment.
Beyond the myriad transformations, it substitutes for my form.
Five liberations share the same mechanism, the Three Radiant Ones.
Conjoined in brightness.
Above in heaven, below on earth, none fail to communicate with the numinous.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

Upon reciting the incantation, draw in the true qi of the five directions, swallowing each thirty-six times. On the Three Primes, the Eight Nodal Days, one’s life destiny, and birthdays, harmonize the qi, practice the visualization, recite the incantation, and cultivate sincerity without negligence. In unity with the Dao, over time, one will ascend together with it.

---

Golden Palace transformation body, true qi circulating throughout.
Wisdom-light shining brilliantly, the Golden Tiger breaks the hidden.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

chunks.original_text: 今据某投词入意。 以今恭准道旨，告下并九阳梵炁元皇破暗真符，开光长夜，拔度亡魂，来诣斋坛，承功超化，须至告下者。 符 高上神霄，九天真文。 光映泉扃，照破寒庭。 阴洞冥关，纣绝帝城。 三涂苦爽，九夜沉魂。 真辉洞烛，万狱摧倾。 罗酆九垒，咸睹光明。 皆蒙解脱，考掠俱停，真皇符命，万神咸听，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　承诰奉行。 束封 九天梵炁元皇破暗真符具位臣姓其谨封 方函 九天元皇破暗真符告下 十方三界地狱冥曹主者　具位臣姓某谨封 玉清慧光符 请光用师，玉诀，祖炁。 咒曰 九阳至精，三天尊明。 日月星斗，晨光合明。 三华宝耀，混合群晶。 三宝发华，惠光发神。 长吐飞空，下烛幽冥。 慈光一照，遍彻阴扃。 三涂罢对，五苦停刑。 火山息焰，寒池催冰。 刀化玉树，剑变骞林。 铁城摧毁，魂升玉清。 臣今上告，愿赐开明。 日月灵妃，星光真人。 一十二员，稽首奉行。 分灯散辉，照破重阴，一如告命。 依式入九天灯科。 右诵各天生神章，请泰玄本际仙府一百二十童子，众宣童子牒十二本。 灵宝自然九天金字玉文生神阳符 九道见坛旛门。 灵宝自然九天金字玉文生神阴符 九道。 郁单无量天一阴之符子文北炁 咒曰 三炁尊神，合生九炁。 出乎太空，隐乎空洞。 仍诵本天章。 上上禅善无量寿天二阴之符丑文艮炁 咒曰 无光无像，无形无名。 无色无绪，无音无声。 仍诵本天章。 梵监须延天生神三阴之符寅文震炁 咒曰 开辟玄通，三色混沌。 天地合德，乍存乍亡。 仍诵本天章。 寂然兜术天四阴之符卯文震炁 咒曰 炁清高澄，炁结凝滓。 九气列正，并受生成。 仍诵本天章。 波罗尼密不骄乐天五阴之符 辰文南炁 咒曰
chunks.translated_text:
Here the petitioner submits their plea in earnest.

By the sacred decree of the Dao, we now reverently present the True Talisman of the Primordial Sovereign of the Nine Yangs’ Brahman qi for Breaking the Darkness, to illumine the eternal night, deliver the departed souls, and summon them to this ritual altar, that they may receive the merit of transcendence. Thus, this proclamation is issued.

**Talisman**
Highest Divine Empyrean, True Writ of the Nine Heavens.
Its radiance shines upon the gates of the Yellow Springs, piercing the cold courts of the underworld.
The yin caverns and dark passes, the city of King Zhou’s damnation—
the suffering spirits of the Three Wretched Paths, the souls sunk in the Nine Nights’ gloom—
all are illuminated by the true brilliance, and the ten thousand hells collapse.
The nine ramparts of Fengdu are bathed in light.
All attain liberation; tortures and punishments cease.
By the true command of the Primordial Sovereign, the myriad spirits heed this decree.

Issued on the ___ day of the ___ month in the year ___.
Presented by the Daoist officiant, [Name], who reverently executes the mandate.

**Sealed Document**
True Talisman of the Primordial Sovereign of the Nine Yangs’ Brahman qi for Breaking the Darkness
Sealed by the officiant [Name]

**Envelope Inscription**
Proclamation of the True Talisman of the Primordial Sovereign of the Nine Yangs for Breaking the Darkness
To the rulers of the Ten Directions, the Three Realms, the underworld, and the courts of darkness:
Sealed by the officiant [Name]

**Jade Radiance Talisman**
Invoke the radiance with the master’s hand seal and ancestral qi.

**Incantation**
Essence of the Nine Yangs, luminous clarity of the Three Heavens.
Sun, moon, stars, and constellations—dawn’s light converges in brilliance.
The Three Flowers’ precious radiance merges with the host of luminous beings.
The Three Treasures blossom, and the light of wisdom awakens the spirit.
It streams forth through the sky, descending to illumine the dark underworld.
A single beam of compassionate light pierces the gates of yin.
The Three Wretched Paths cease their torments; the Five Sufferings halt their punishments.
The flames of the Fire Mountain subside; the ice of the Cold Pool melts.
Blades transform into jade trees; swords become forests of *jian* blossoms.
The Iron City crumbles; souls ascend to the Jade Purity.
I now make this supplication above—may enlightenment be granted.
The Divine Consorts of the Sun and Moon, the True Persons of Stellar Radiance—
twelve in number—bow their heads and execute this command.
As the lamps divide their splendor, the layered darkness is shattered.
All is as decreed.

Proceed according to the rites of the Nine Heavens Lamp.

To the right, recite the *Chapters on the Birth of the Gods of Each Heaven*, and invoke the One Hundred Twenty Divine Lads of the Primordial Mystery’s Celestial Court of the Tai Xuan Origin. Present the twelve memorial documents for the assembly of lads.

**Yang Talisman of the Natural Nine Heavens Golden Script Jade Writ for the Birth of the Gods**
Nine talismans. See the *Banner Section* of the altar.

**Yin Talisman of the Natural Nine Heavens Golden Script Jade Writ for the Birth of the Gods**
Nine talismans.

**Talisman of the Zi Writ of the North Qi for the Heaven of Utmost Joy and Infinite Light**
**Incantation**
Three qi of the honored gods, uniting to form the nine qi.
Emerging from the Great Void, concealed within the empty cavern.
Recite the chapter of this heaven.

**Talisman of the Chou Writ of the Gen Qi for the Heaven of Utmost Goodness and Infinite Longevity**
**Incantation**
No light, no image; no form, no name.
No color, no trace; no sound, no voice.
Recite the chapter of this heaven.

**Talisman of the Yin Writ of the Zhen Qi for the Heaven of Brahma’s Watchful Extension**
**Incantation**
Opening the mysterious passage, the three colors merge in primordial chaos.
Heaven and Earth join in virtue, now existing, now vanishing.
Recite the chapter of this heaven.

**Talisman of the Mao Writ of the Zhen Qi for the Heaven of Silent Confinement**
**Incantation**
Qi purifies and clarifies; qi congeals and forms sediment.
The nine qi array in order, all receiving life and completion.
Recite the chapter of this heaven.

**Talisman of the Chen Writ of the South Qi for the Heaven of Joy Without Pride**
**Incantation**

chunks.original_text: 三元所育，九炁所导。 还生人道，濯形太阳。 仍诵本天章。 洞元化应声天六阴之符巳文坤炁 咒曰 三元养育，九炁结形。 九月神布，炁满能声。 仍诵本天章。 灵化梵辅天七阴之符午文北炁 咒曰 太一执符，帝君品会。 司会定算，五帝监生。 仍诵本天章。 高虚清明天八阴之符未文北炁 咒曰 万神唱恭，万神唱奉。 灵音振空，感爽无滞。 仍诵本天章。 无想无结无爱天九阴之符申文太阳炁 咒曰 司命敬诺，司命敬顺。 玄虚中澄，反胎有恒。 仍诵本天章。 右九符於九天灯坛中，按天焚之。 牌面篆文背书炁宫 帝真胞命元元一黄演之炁，太霄宫。 帝真胎命元洞明紫户之炁，青霄宫。 帝真魂命元长灵明仙之炁，碧霄官。 帝真魄命元砀尸明演由之炁，丹霄宫。 帝真藏府命元五仙中灵之炁，景霄宫。 帝真灵府命元高真冲融之炁，玉霄宫。 帝真元府命元高仙洞笈之炁，琅霄官。 帝真华府命元真灵化凝之炁，紫霄官。 帝真岳府命元自然玄照之炁，神霄宫。 九天灯图 师曰：九天灯即九卮灯也。

chunks.original_text: 若不用灯树，未免就地铺之。 盖洞经中，以第一天居中正，在头上，第二天在南，第三天在东南，第四天在西，第五天在东北，第六天在西北，第七天在北，第八天在西南，第九天在东是也。 亦随方立九炁牌，上悬九天旛。 当依此图，如式铺设。 今人以东北方起第一天，甚悖其理也。 当细考而详之。 九垒灯符 第一垒洞渊泽地土皇君符 第二垒金刚泽地土皇君符 第三垒石脂色泽地土皇君符 第四垒润色泽地土皇君符 第五垒金粟泽地土皇君符 第六垒金刚铁色泽地土皇君符 第七垒水制泽地土皇君符 第八垒大风泽地土皇君符 第九垒洞渊无色纲维泽地土皇君符 右九卮九垒灯图，以梓木作一灯树，上分九卮，每一卮安一灯。 下用净土，作坛三级，上圆下方。 上层安灯、灯树上悬九旛卮。 中层立九炁牌，安灯九盏。 层安九垒皇君牌，安灯九盏。 三层共灯二十七盏。 外方列八卦八门，灯八盏。 使上照九天，中照九野，下照九地九垒，通光九道，周回十方，通计灯三十五盏，合三十五分，总契上玄。 九卮九垒灯图 灵宝玉鉴卷之二十九竟 灵宝玉鉴卷之三十
chunks.translated_text:
If lamp trees are not used, the lamps must be arranged on the ground. In the *Dongjing* scriptures, the First Heaven occupies the central position above the head, the Second Heaven lies to the south, the Third to the southeast, the Fourth to the west, the Fifth to the northeast, the Sixth to the northwest, the Seventh to the north, the Eighth to the southwest, and the Ninth to the east. Corresponding qi tablets are erected in each direction, with the Nine Heavens banners suspended above. The arrangement must follow this diagram precisely. Modern practitioners often begin with the First Heaven in the northeast, which contradicts the principle. This should be carefully examined and corrected.

**Nine-Tiered Lamp Talismans**
First Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Abyssal Marsh
Second Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Adamantine Marsh
Third Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Ochre Marsh
Fourth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Lustrous Marsh
Fifth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Golden Grain Marsh
Sixth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Adamantine Iron Marsh
Seventh Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Water-Restrained Marsh
Eighth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Great Wind Marsh
Ninth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Abyssal Marsh of the Colorless Net

For the diagram of the Nine Goblets and Nine Tiers, a lamp tree is crafted from catalpa wood, divided into nine goblets, each holding one lamp. Below, pure earth is used to construct a three-tiered altar, round above and square below. The upper tier holds the lamps and the lamp tree, with the Nine Heavens banners suspended above the goblets. The middle tier displays the nine qi tablets and nine lamps. The lower tier bears the tablets of the Nine-Tiered Sovereigns and nine lamps. Together, the three tiers hold twenty-seven lamps. Beyond the square, the eight trigrams and eight gates are arrayed with eight lamps. Thus, the light shines upward to the Nine Heavens, illuminates the nine regions of the earth, and penetrates the Nine Lands and Nine Tiers below. The radiance traverses the nine paths, encircles the ten directions, and totals thirty-five lamps, corresponding to the thirty-five divisions, all in harmony with the Supreme Mystery.

**Diagram of the Nine Goblets and Nine Tiers**

chunks.original_text: 开明幽暗门 九幽地狱灯 元始威章拔魂箓符玉文祖炁 咒曰 大明东出，浮罗阳光。 紫炁郁霄，变化黄老。 九阳真炁，龙篆成章。 天宝灵宝，神宝天君。 太一青宫，东华生炁。 破狱灭考，覃宥罪魂。 十方天尊，混合成形。 上有三十六天，下有三十六泉。 分形散影，变化亿千。 玉圭所指，铁城摧毁。 魂神受度，罪业俱消。 九光圆像，普照十方。 元始开化，勑降青玄。 急急如律令。 告文 玉清宝光梵真元始威章拔魂宝箓 今月　日恭奉 道旨，告下 元始威章，覃宥罪魂，出离幽狱，回集善因，专神正度某魂，上生 仙界，须至告下者。 符 道君有命，勑付昆仑，破毁铁围，罗酆幽阴。 十方三界，无极棒乡，三官九署，十二河源。 解释亡过某魂，洎亿劫种亲，疾除罪簿。 落灭恶根。 不得拘留，时刻升迁。 万神护送，径诣人天。 随品受化。 更生福乡，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日告下。 具　法　　位　臣　姓　某承诰奉行。 方函式 元始威章拔魂宝箓告下 十方三界酆都幽狱冥官　　具法位臣姓某谨封 九狱灯 三晨慧光破狱真符三光炁诀 咒曰 赤明开图，运度自然。 开明主景，亿劫之先。 今日大庆，‘沉魂受炼。 重昏幽暗，永夜寒泉。 欲请慧光，照破冥关。 冰池温和，炉炭息烟。 刀山剑树，永断攀缘。 回光十方，照耀诸天。 魂消五累，业除勾连。 三晨同辉，永劫除愆。 玄元开光，承恩上愿。 三光玉女，请如斯言，一如告命。 右符各狱焚之，能通光阴境，覃宥罪魂。 然点诸灯，不可缺此。 执策杖咒 天地交光，日月合明。 上冲牛斗，下彻幽冥。 左扶六甲，右卫六丁。 神杖破狱， 万汇超升。 急急如律令。 毁锁符玉文祖炁 咒曰 太上符命，普度幽魂。 出离苦趣，俓超生门。 急急如律令。 张门符 咒曰
chunks.translated_text:
The Opening of the Gates of Darkness and Obscurity
Nine Lamps for the Nine Dark Hells
*The Yuan Shi Wei Zhang Ba Hun Lu Fu* of the Jade Scripture of Ancestral Qi

**Incantation:**
Great brightness emerges in the east, floating Luoyang’s sunlight.
Purple qi thickens in the skies, transforming into the Yellow and the Old.
The true qi of the Nine Yangs forms dragon-script chapters.
Heavenly Treasure, Numinous Treasure, Divine Treasure, Heavenly Lords—
The Great One of the Azure Palace, the qi of life born in Donghua.
Breaking open hells, extinguishing torments, bestowing grace upon sinful souls.
The Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions merge and take form.
Above lie the thirty-six heavens, below the thirty-six springs.
Shapes disperse, shadows scatter, transforming into billions.
Where the jade scepter points, iron cities crumble.
Souls receive deliverance, sins and karma dissolve entirely.
The ninefold radiance forms a perfect image, universally illuminating the ten directions.
The Yuan Shi initiates transformation, issuing the decree to descend upon the Azure Mystery.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

**Proclamation:**

chunks.original_text: 三清玉勑，光耀九衢。 神灯破狱，吏卒准符。 铁城摧毁，铜柱清虚。 威灵猛将，六道启逢。 释放罪魂，咸升玉都。 急急如律令。 焚九狱符咒 玉清祖炁，罢对幽堂。 三星煌煌，元始开光。 有罪无罪，得赦某方。 宝光焕映，普登天堂。 急急如律令。 又咒 太上道君，勑付昆仑。 神符一下，拔度死魂。 勑赦咒 无上玄云，太上道君。 教臣行符，照破幽狱，死魂出离。 急急如太上律令。 右存自己为元始天尊，执策杖於各狱，勑破之念前咒，存地狱化为坦途，众魂乘此宝光，皆得度化。 次度杖与符，侍灯执水盂，洒净念： 茫茫酆都中，重重金刚山。 灵宝无量光，洞照炎池烦。 七祖诸幽魂，身随香云旛。 定慧青莲花，上生神永安。 功德金色光，晖辉开暗幽。 华池流真香，莲盖随云浮。 千灵重元和，常居十二楼。 急宣灵宝旨，自在天堂游。 破狱秘咒玉诀祖炁 唵俱祇知帝阿勒萨昙婆伽娄伐耶婆叱咤吽诃。 九真梵炁破狱真符 东方玉真梵炁之符卯文东炁 咒曰 三阳之光，妙炁缠结。 九垒禀令，永破风雷。 又咒 九炁生烟，玉宝慈尊。 皇上正炁，流降真空。 雷电息威，偃消迅风。 剑戟摧折，罪业消融。 元始符命，升济魂宗。 急急如律令。 南方玄真梵炁之符午文南炁 咒曰 六阳之光，照焕阴狱。 火翳清凉，焦肌完复。 幽夜开明，乾和妙毓。 又咒 三炁丹华，万福玄真。 吹嘘阳光，拔度苦魂。 火翳灭烬，炎息威风。 炮炙涂炭，法雨慈云。 惠光普化，罪苦消蠲。 一如告命，群灵敬听。 急急如律令。 西方太真梵炁之符酉文西炁 咒曰 四炁合阳，分阴感化。 金刚摧毁，冥曹奉行。 又咒 七炁素英，太妙至极。 金光宝耀，焕映千亿。 铁杖考掠，永使蠲释。 金槌刀叉，应时消释。 天慈赦宥，削名黑簿。 魂登太素，逍遥自适。 急急如律令。 北方上真梵黑之符子文北炁 咒曰 五炁顺度，玄光合真。 溟泠变温，寒池生春。 又咒 五炁精，玄上玉晨。 九和阳光，普济罪魂。 清香周布，秽恶除氛。 冰戈霜刃，悉除其根。 九天道炁，嘘寒为温。 罪考解脱，升度沉魂。 急急如律令。 东北仙真梵炁之符寅文艮炁 咒曰 梵炁定极，斗运旋衡。 镬汤停沸，死魂更生。 又咒 镇劫保运，晨景慈尊。 化形救苦，度仙上圣。 惠泽流布，镬汤灭衅，沸煮火烂，复形端正。 汤化甘凉，莲生青柄。 永出苦爽，普登元应。 一如灵命，鬼官敬听。 急急如律令。 东南度真梵炁之符巳文巽炁 咒曰 魁鳄回度，真炁混康。 铜柱摧折，阴府消殃。 又咒 先化梵阳，一炁好生。 度命大圣，普济无穷。 焦烂生肌，热脑散冲。 炎然铜柱，永灭无荧。 苦除罪考，上升仙宫。 急急如律令。 西南宝冥梵炁之符申文坤炁 咒曰 六真分治，回尸返生。 屠割停考，刀剑消洋。 又咒 坤炁虚皇，太灵高尊。 景色元辉，下照幽宫。 风刀割切，霜刃摧锋。 罪魂零落，肌体复充。 永免荼毒，克证先宗。 急急如律令。 西北命真梵炁之符亥文乾炁 咒曰 九炁肇运，万灵振降。 火车俱灭，咸睹慈光。 又咒 乾灵玉真，无量太华，天元正气，廓照无涯。 火车停轮，消弭踪瑕。 溃烂肢体，变生玉葩。 神与魂升，上登仙界。 急急如律令。 中央真阳梵炁之符玉文祖炁 咒曰 四炁四正，四真四明。 阴尸九炼，返朴如真。 万炁凝混，普停幽刑。 上元玉虚，明皇紫宸。

chunks.original_text: 下洞九渊，真皇洞神。 慧慈二光，普度亡魂。 刀山剑树，立化骞林。 考掠苦毒，径降酸辛。 锯解倒悬，永不由经。 铁城破散，鬼官迁真。 亿劫罪爽，普度朱陵。 十天诰命、群灵奉迎。 敢不从命，列奏玉宸。 元始回光化形符玉诀祖炁 右符於九狱毕，次作用於中央。 咒曰 元始一炁，散耀诸天。 灵宝阳晶，郁仪之君。 光回九地，辉破八冥。 太玄阴景，结璘之神。 炎炎热恼，廓照生清。 引日月星，合照炁神。 六合内外，破暗生明。 化形咒 吾师天中救苦尊，常善化形十方界。 以此威神成大慈，救彼众生无量苦。 九夜重泉幽暗乡，普令廓然生光明。 牛头狱卒尽升仙，一切沉魂俱解释。 三途五苦诸囚系，考对停闲上紫清。 见闻有识及有情，感此皆成无上道。 唵轰咤哩遍光明。 师先以回光化形符，元始威章，酆都真形，共三道，作一杳怀於胸前。 至破中央狱时焚此符，两手玉清诀，擎灰於手中，自己即本来元始，性光化为百宝祥光，内外洞明。 上达三天，下通九地。 天尊化形十方，救度苦魂，诸狱幽牢，悉为乐土。 众魂咸乘妙光，上升天境。 吹灰于灯坛中，念前咒三遍，次纳策杖。 酆都山真形 元始符命，制魔奉行。 保举亡魂，度品南宫。 酆都消烬，三官解刑。 赦缚闲业，受化更生。 随品受炼，上登福庭。 右山形连上题下咒，共作一板刊之应用。 九狱牌符九道 东方狱牌符 咒曰
