Beneath the Nine Abysses, the True August One illumines the numinous.
The twin lights of wisdom and compassion universally deliver the departed souls.
Blade-mountains and sword-trees instantly transform into towering forests.
Tortures of scourging and venomous torments swiftly dissolve into bitterness.
Sawings and inverted suspensions shall never recur.
Iron citadels shatter and disperse; demonic officials escort the true.
Sins and transgressions of kalpas unnumbered are universally delivered to the Vermilion Mound.
By the edicts of the Ten Heavens, all spirits come forth in reverence.
Dare they disobey this command, their names shall be memorialized in the Jade Court.

**Talisman of the Primordial’s Revolving Light for Transforming Forms (Jade Script, Ancestral Qi)**
After employing this talisman in the Nine Prisons, proceed to apply it at the center.

**Incantation:**
The Primordial’s singular qi scatters its radiance through the heavens.
The Lord of the Luminous Treasure’s solar essence, the Sovereign of Flourishing Splendor.
Light revolves through the Nine Earths, brilliance shatters the Eight Darknesses.
The numinous of the Supreme Mystery’s yin luminance, the deity of congealed luster.
Flaming afflictions and scorching torments dissolve into clarity and purity.
Draw forth the sun, moon, and stars to unite and illumine the qi and spirits.
Within and beyond the Six Directions, darkness is shattered and light is born.

**Incantation for Transforming Forms:**
My master, the Venerable Savior of Heaven’s Center, ever transforms forms across the ten directions.
By this mighty power, great compassion is perfected, delivering all beings from boundless suffering.
In the ninefold nights of the Yellow Springs’ dark realms, all is made vast and luminous.
Ox-headed jailers ascend as immortals; every sunken soul is liberated.
The Three Paths, Five Sufferings, and all imprisoned beings—
their trials cease, and they ascend to the Purple Clarity.
All who see, hear, know, or possess sentience,
by this grace, attain the supreme Dao.
*Oṃ hūṃ traḥ sarva-prabhā.*

First, the master holds the Talisman of Revolving Light for Transforming Forms, the Primordial’s Mighty Chapter, and the True Form of Fengdu—three talismans in all—concealed within the breast.
When breaking open the central prison, this talisman is burned. With both hands in the Jade Clarity mudra, the ashes are held, and the master’s original Primordial self transforms: the light of inherent nature becomes a radiance of a hundred treasures, illumining all within and without.
Above, it reaches the Three Heavens; below, it penetrates the Nine Earths.
The Heavenly Worthy transforms forms in the ten directions, delivering suffering souls.
All dark prisons become realms of bliss.
The multitudes of souls ride the wondrous light, ascending to the celestial realms.
The ashes are blown into the lamp altar, the preceding incantation recited thrice, then the inscribed staff is received.

**True Form of Fengdu Mountain**
By the Primordial’s talismanic command, demons are subdued and the mandate fulfilled.
The departed souls are commended, their ranks assessed in the Southern Palace.
Fengdu is reduced to ashes; the Three Officials remit their punishments.
Bonds are loosed, karmic deeds dissolved, and rebirth through transformation is granted.
According to their rank, they undergo refinement and ascend to the courts of fortune.

The mountain’s form, with the above incantation inscribed below, is carved onto a single board for use.

**Nine Prison Talismans (Nine Talismanic Tablets)**
**Talisman of the Eastern Prison Tablet**
**Incantation:**

chunks.original_text: 青阳青帝，震宫之精。 流光下照，洞彻杳冥。 摧破地狱，风雷悉停。 急急如上帝律令。 南方狱牌符 咒曰 南方赤帝，离宫耀明。 下照万重，无幽无冥。 火翳停焰，除热得清。 西方狱牌符 咒曰 白帝刚骑，诛斩妖魁。 乘炁驱驰，飞戈走骑。 下破幽牢，救度一切。 北方狱牌符 咒曰 重阴冥冥，黑龙驰符。 径达重泉，罪无久拘。 北帝有令，违者速诛。 东北狱牌符 咒曰 重阴之境，罪业之门。 镬汤煮溃，考掠罪魂。 符命一下，善恶悉分。 东南狱牌符 咒曰 九龙符命，下入重泉。 积劫滞魄，无路可宜。 铜柱之苦，咸赐赦原。 西南狱牌符 咒曰 三光普照，幽冥易开。 积衅不原，万劫可哀。 兔罹屠割，获登天堂。 西北狱牌符 咒曰

chunks.original_text: 炎炎之心，重重之罪。 火车轮转，受此苦会。 符命下颁，九幽罢对。 中央狱牌符 咒曰 乾坤交泰，二炁感通。 元始符命，万圣成从。 一切地狱，永扇慈风。 右符咒书于牌上。 九幽狱图 师曰：按法天象地，方圆为式。 九幽曹主罪宪，职任罗酆，东南巳地，是其所也。 按太一圣真之科，以砂土作坛九，方阔二寸，九坛一同，总方六尺，以法地之阴极二六之象。 每坛四角三曲，如狱之形。 每狱明灯三炬，九狱共二十七炬。 九狱之心，随方立牌，牌之上书破地狱符、见斋法门背写狱名，上悬九旛。 见旛盖门至破九狱，烧九旛了，却以此旛挂其拉。 仍先立迁神回黄旛，使幽魂睹之，万罪皆灭也。 夫九幽者，八卦中宫。 按九州分野，各系社令主守。 在天为九霄，在地於九宫，化形为九幽狱。 其名又九，皆一炁所化，一念所感。 凡亡人一念之恶，其狱即现，其报随之。 故大上垂慈拯济，立此斋法，超拔幽爽，当知其所出也。 九幽名者 一曰幽冥。 二曰幽阴。 三曰幽夜。 四曰幽酆。 五曰幽都。 六曰幽治。 七曰幽关。 八曰幽府。 九曰幽光。 大凡建九狱，本为普度沉沦之设。 若是建小缘，上不礼君王而及寰区，下不度九祖而及六道，区区只度一二之魂，则上帝岂特为一人，而能颁曲赦，悉开九狱，必无是理。 地狱未必皆可破，幽魂未必皆可度。 而我之立意，无一毫及物之功，岂本科之意也。 倘或专荐，止可然灯祝赞，或建九卮灯之类足矣。 破狱之科，不必举行，庶免僭渎。 然孝子报亲，无非尽诚忏罪足矣。 岂可以我祖必堕地狱，而行此科，理之所在也。 若果欲行之，却当随宜，设斛食，度沉魂，不拘多寡，随力建功，则破狱一节行之无兼矣。 盖无量苦爽，沉迷有无，一念既差，终堕其狱。 若非祈天请命，行符破幽，何由解脱，故当按法行之。 九狱牌 东方幽冥风雷地狱。 南方幽阴火翳地狱。 西方幽夜金刚地狱。 北方幽酆溟泠地狱。 东北幽都镬汤地狱。 东南幽治铜柱地狱。 西南幽关屠割地狱。 西北幽府火车地狱。 中央幽光普掠地狱。 总九狱图 玉清荡涤血湖大符 告文 灵宝玄坛

**Talisman of the Northwestern Prison Tablet**
**Incantation:**
Blazing heart, layered sins.
Fire chariots wheel, bearing this suffering’s assembly.
With the talismanic command’s descent, the Nine Dark Realms cease their trials.

**Talisman of the Central Prison Tablet**
**Incantation:**
Heaven and Earth harmonize, the Two Qi interflow.
The Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command—all sages comply.
Every hell forever stirs with the breeze of compassion.

Inscribe the talisman and incantation on the tablet.

**Diagram of the Nine Dark Prisons**
The Master says: According to the method of "Heaven’s pattern, Earth’s form," square and round serve as the model.
The Nine Dark Courts govern transgressions and judgments, their office bound to Mount Fengdu, in the southeast’s *si* region, where they reside.
Following the statutes of the Supreme Perfected of Great Unity, fashion nine altars of sand and soil, each two inches square. The nine altars together span six feet, embodying Earth’s utmost yin in the image of two sixes.
Each altar’s four corners curve thrice, resembling a prison’s shape.
Three lamps burn brightly at each prison, twenty-seven lamps in all.
At the heart of each prison, erect a tablet facing its direction. Inscribe upon it the *Talisman for Breaking Hell* and the *Dharma Gate of the Offering Ritual*, with the prison’s name written on the reverse. Suspend nine banners above.
When the banners are raised to open the gates and shatter the Nine Prisons, burn the nine banners, then hang them upon their poles.
First, raise the *Yellow Banner for Guiding Spirits Home*, so that the dark souls may behold it—all ten thousand sins are extinguished.

The Nine Dark Realms reside in the central palace of the Eight Trigrams.
According to the divisions of the Nine Provinces, each is overseen by local deities.
In Heaven, they are the Nine Heavens; on Earth, the Nine Palaces; their transformed forms become the Nine Dark Prisons.
Their names are nine, yet all arise from a single *qi*, a single thought’s resonance.
For every evil thought of the deceased, a prison manifests, and retribution follows.
Thus, the Most High, in boundless compassion, established this ritual offering to deliver the suffering souls. Know well its origin.

**Names of the Nine Dark Realms:**
1. Dark Nether (*Youming*)
2. Dark Yin (*Youyin*)
3. Dark Night (*Youye*)
4. Dark Feng (*Youfeng*)
5. Dark Capital (*Youdu*)
6. Dark Tribunal (*Youzhi*)
7. Dark Pass (*Youguan*)
8. Dark Bureau (*Youfu*)
9. Dark Radiance (*Youguang*)

Generally, the construction of the Nine Prisons serves to universally deliver the sunken and lost.
If the rite is small in scale—failing to honor the sovereign and all under Heaven above, or to deliver the nine ancestors and the six paths below, but only saving one or two souls—how could the Celestial Emperor issue a special pardon, opening all Nine Prisons for a single person? Such a thing is impossible.
Not all hells can be shattered, nor all dark souls delivered.
If one’s intent lacks even the slightest merit of benefiting others, it contradicts the ritual’s true purpose.
For private offerings, lighting lamps and reciting praises—or constructing nine cups of lamps—suffices.
The *Rite for Breaking Prisons* need not be performed, lest one commit presumption and blasphemy.
A filial child repaying a parent need only exhaust sincerity in repentance—how could one assume their ancestor *must* have fallen into hell and thus perform this rite? Such is the principle.
If one truly wishes to proceed, adapt the ritual as circumstances allow: prepare offerings of grain, deliver the sunken souls, and build merit according to one’s capacity. Then, the *Breaking Prisons* rite may be performed without impropriety.

For countless suffering souls, lost in delusion, a single misguided thought may consign them to prison for eternity.
Without beseeching Heaven’s decree, enacting talismans, and breaking the dark realms, how could they find liberation? Thus, follow the method precisely.

- Northeastern Dark Capital Cauldron-Scalding Hell
- Southeastern Dark Tribunal Bronze-Pillar Hell
- Southwestern Dark Pass Slaughter Hell
- Northwestern Dark Bureau Fire-Chariot Hell
- Central Dark Radiance Universal-Torture Hell

chunks.original_text: 今月　日恭奉 元皇勑命，颁降 玉清荡涤血湖大符，覃宥罪魂，须至告下者。 符 右奉 灵宝符命，普济幽涂。 告下翻体大神，掷尸神王，食心啖脑神王，牛头狱卒，牢槛冥官。 仰遵符命，拔度某亡魂，洎无间血湖，产亡罪众，出离幽暗，睹见光明，免滞血湖，炼质澄神，径上南宫，仙化成人，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　承诰奉行。 方函式 玉清灵宝荡涤血湖符命告下 无间血湖大小铁围诸狱冥官　具法位臣某谨封 勑咒 元始符命，普济幽涂。 灵宝内篆，度脱血湖。 神清保护，径上南都。 急急如元皇上帝律令。 高功执符宣祝咒 大慈二真人，能救产死苦。 放光照世间，地狱悉停住。 刀山高巍巍，镬汤飞炎炎。 至心念真文，罪魂宿冤解。 昼夜心不离，解脱全尔身。 归心发回向，同上七宝林。 急急如元皇上帝律令。 师澄心，存一炁透玄关，上升泥丸，为元始天尊，顶出宝光，流布符篆，照破幽狱，拔度苦魂。 书符行持，不出於此。 救军阵伤亡之符九符并中黄炁玉文 救遭刑纪法之符 救劫盗伤残之符 救堕胎落子之符 救恶疾血光之符 救母丧子存之符 救子丧母存之符 救已产俱亡之符 救未产俱亡之符 总祝咒 灵宝玉书，拔度真符。 流光普照，荡涤秽躯。 天符告下，径上南都。 急急如元始上帝律令。 右九符兼流光符九道，各狱焚之。 血湖图 师曰：大铁围山之南，在峡山石狱，其形皆黑。 旁有火焰，下有血湖，在东南一石问，上大下尖，中间一缝，罪人皆出入。 自有百药毒汁，灌其身心。 狱号血湖，产罪妇人，亿劫沉堕，苦不可胜，秽恶之甚。 狱中有百万鬼卒，昼夜拷掠。 乃翻体大神，掷尸大神，食心啖脑鬼王之类也。 血湖图 产死图 法以前血湖九狱形，铺之灯旛。 见旛盖门。 灵宝玉鉴卷之三十竟

This day of the present month, reverently receiving the August Emperor’s edict, we issue the *Jade Clarity Talisman for Purging the Blood Lake*, extending grace to sinful souls. The following proclamation must be announced:

By virtue of the *Numinous Treasure Talisman Mandate*, we universally deliver those lost in the dark paths. We now proclaim to the Great Gods of Transformed Bodies, the Corpse-Flinging Divine Kings, the Heart-Eating and Brain-Devouring Divine Kings, the Ox-Headed Wardens, and the Underworld Officials of Prison Cells: Obey this talismanic command, rescue and deliver the departed soul of [Name], along with all those imprisoned in the Avīci Blood Lake and the multitudes of women who perished in childbirth. Lead them forth from darkness, let them behold the light, free them from the stagnation of the Blood Lake, refine their forms, and purify their spirits. Let them ascend directly to the Southern Palace, where they shall be transformed into immortals, all in accordance with this proclamation.

Proclaimed in the year [Year], month [Month], day [Day], at the hour [Hour].
Respectfully executed by the ordained minister [Name], bearing the Dharma rank.

**Sealed Document Format**
*Jade Clarity Numinous Treasure Proclamation for Purging the Blood Lake*
To the Underworld Officials of the Avīci Blood Lake and all lesser and greater Iron Enclosures: The ordained minister [Name] respectfully seals this.

**Edict and Incantation**
By the Primordial Talisman Mandate, we universally deliver those lost in the dark paths.
By the inner script of the Numinous Treasure, we rescue and liberate the Blood Lake.
With divine clarity and protection, ascend directly to the Southern Capital.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the August Emperor’s celestial statutes.

**High Master Holds the Talisman and Recites the Incantation**
Great Compassionate Two Perfected Ones, who save those who suffer in childbirth’s death,
Radiate light to illuminate the world, halting all hells in their course.
The Knife Mountain stands towering, the Cauldron of Scalding Water blazes fiercely.
With sincere heart, recite the true script—let sinful souls and long-held grievances be resolved.
Day and night, hold fast to this mind—liberation shall complete your being.
Turn your heart, dedicate the merit, and ascend together to the Forest of Seven Treasures.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the August Emperor’s celestial statutes.

**Master’s Meditation**
The master calms the mind, concentrates a single *qi* to penetrate the Mysterious Pass, ascending to the Mud Pill Palace. There, he visualizes the Primordial Heavenly Worthy, from whose crown emanates a radiant light, suffusing the talismanic script. This light pierces the dark prisons, rescuing and delivering suffering souls. The writing of talismans and their application proceed thus.

**Nine Talismans for Salvation of Those Slain in Military Campaigns** (accompanied by the Central Yellow *Qi* Jade Script)
**Talisman for Salvation of Those Executed by Legal Sentence**
**Talisman for Salvation of Those Wounded or Maimed by Bandits**
**Talisman for Salvation of Those Who Miscarry or Lose Children**
**Talisman for Salvation of Those Afflicted by Malignant Illnesses and Blood Disasters**
**Talisman for Salvation of Mothers Who Perish While Their Children Survive**
**Talisman for Salvation of Children Who Perish While Their Mothers Survive**
**Talisman for Salvation of Those Who Perish Together in Childbirth**
**Talisman for Salvation of Those Who Perish Before Childbirth**

**General Incantation**
By the *Numinous Treasure Jade Scripture*, the true talisman for rescue and deliverance,
Radiant light universally illuminates, purging defiled forms.
The celestial talisman is proclaimed—ascend directly to the Southern Capital.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Primordial August Emperor’s celestial statutes.

The above nine talismans, along with nine *Flowing Light Talismans*, are to be burned in each respective hell.

**Diagram of the Blood Lake**
The master states: South of the Great Iron Enclosure Mountain lies the Stone Prison of the Gorge Mountain, its form entirely black. Beside it burns a flame, and below lies the Blood Lake, situated in a stone chamber to the southeast. Its shape is broad above and narrow below, with a fissure at its center through which the condemned pass. There, a hundred toxic brews are poured over their bodies and hearts. This prison is called the Blood Lake, where women who died in childbirth sink for kalpas, their suffering beyond measure, their defilement extreme. Within, a million ghostly wardens torture them day and night—these are the Great Gods of Transformed Bodies, the Corpse-Flinging Divine Kings, the Heart-Eating and Brain-Devouring Ghost Kings, and the like.

**Diagram of the Blood Lake**
**Diagram of Childbirth Death**
Arrange the forms of the Blood Lake and the Nine Prisons before the altar, displaying them on lanterns and banners. The banners are to be placed above the gate.

*This concludes the thirtieth scroll of the* Numinous Treasure Jade Mirror.

**Numinous Treasure Jade Mirror, Scroll Thirty-One**
**The Gate of Illuminating the Dark**
**Thirty-Two Heavenly Lamps and Proclamation of the Mandate**
**Mandates for Passing Through the Heavens**

**Incantation:**
Primal Thearch of the Origin,
Spirit-Summoner of all Heavens.
True qi of the Three Heavens,
Nine transformations form the human.
Real qi blends and merges,
Passing through the barriers of the host of Perfected.
Above, it reaches the Celestial Pass—
All heavens descend in unison.
Safeguard and deliver the departed souls,
All as proclaimed in the mandate.

**Proclamation:**
Numinous Treasure Mystic Altar
On this day of the present month and year, reverently upholding the
Dao Decree, we issue the
Mandates for Passing Through the Heavens.
Dispel the long night, extend grace to sinful souls—
This is the proclamation to be issued.

**Mandate:**
By command of the Most High Jade Edict, we traverse the barriers of all heavens, proclaiming to the Thirty-Two Heavens, the Thirty-Two Emperors, the Demon Kings of the Three Realms, and the divine officers of the Celestial Gates.
Today, in celebration, we deliver the souls of the departed, So-and-So and others, opening the path through darkness that all may behold the light of wisdom. We beseech the eradication of the Three Evils, the severing of earthly roots, the ascension through the Five Portals, and the inscription of their names in the Great Mystery.
Let the Demon Kings supervise and record,
Let the Celestial Gates make no obstruction.
All as proclaimed in the mandate.
Issued on the day of the year, month, and day.

**Prepared by:**
Minister of the Dharma-Position, [Name], bearing the decree and carrying it out.

**Envelope:**
Mandate for Passing Through the Heavens—Proclamation Issued
To the Heavenly Emperors, Celestial Gate Deities, and all gods of the heavens.
Sealed by Minister of the Dharma-Position, [Name].

After reciting the mandate and incantation, summon the Heavenly Merit Registrar to announce the passage, then burn it.

**Thirty-Two Heavenly Lamp Mandates:**
Mandate of the Mystic Womb Nurturing Heaven (Mao script)
Mandate of the Luminous Childlike Heaven (Middle script)
Mandate of the Grand Luminous Jade Perfected Heaven (Chou script)
Mandate of the Grand August Yellow Once Heaven (Gen script, Ancestral Qi)
Mandate of the Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven (Li script)
Mandate of the Void Transcending the Balance Heaven (Wu script)
Mandate of the Upper Luminous Seven Luminaries Demon-Barbarian Heaven (Si script)
Mandate of the Origin-Luminous Script-Raising Heaven (Chen script)
Mandate of the Bamboo-Falling August Reed Heaven (Wu script)
Mandate of the Luminous Radiance Ancestral Fluttering Heaven (Li script)
Mandate of the Mystic Luminous Reverent Florescence Heaven (Chen script)
Mandate of the Vermilion Luminous Harmonious Yang Heaven (Si script)
Mandate of the Grand Resplendent Ultimate Jade Heaven (Kun script)
Mandate of the Mystic Luminous Reverent Celebration Heaven (You script)
Mandate of the Observant Luminous Upright Tranquility Heaven (Shen script)
Mandate of the Void Luminous Hall Radiance Heaven (Wei script)
Mandate of the August Filial Awn Heaven (You script)
Mandate of the Manifestly Fixed Ultimate Wind Heaven (Kun script)
Mandate of the Grand Peace August Cliff Heaven (Wei script)
Mandate of the Origin-Loaded Cavity-Rising Heaven (Shen script)
Mandate of the Non-Ultimate Dharma-Oath Heaven (Dui script)
Mandate of the Upper Gambling Joyous Heaven (Zi script)
Mandate of the Non-Thought River-Flowing Heaven (Hai script)
Mandate of the Grand August Old Man Floating Countenance Heaven (Xu script)
Mandate of the Supreme Plain Elegant Forbidden Upper Heaven (Zi script)
Mandate of the Grand Literary Adorned Wondrous Completion Heaven (Dui script)
Mandate of the Abyssal Penetrating Origin Cavern Heaven (Xu script)
Mandate of the Luminous Court Cloud-Soaring Heaven (Hai script)
Mandate of the Supreme Ultimate Nurturing Jia Yi Heaven (Shen script)
Mandate of the Dragon-Transforming Brahman-Passing Heaven (Mao script)
Mandate of the Supreme Release Jade Dragon Ascendant Victory Heaven
Mandate of the Supreme Void Non-Supreme Constant Countenance Heaven (Chou script)

First recite the *Numinous Treasure Perfect Scripture*, visualize the descent of the Thirty-Two Emperors, and with the mudra, draw the Ancestral Qi of the Numinous Treasure into the mandate. During the repentance-lamp ritual, burn them one by one.

**Diagram of the Thirty-Two Heavenly Lamps**
The Master says: Construct the lamp altar in three tiers.
The upper tier represents the Four Heavens of the Formless Realm; establish the Demon King’s position and hang the banners of the Ten Directions’ Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings.
The middle tier represents the Eighteen Heavens; establish the position of the Form Realm’s Demon Kings.
The lower tier represents the Ten Directional Heavenly Worthies; establish the position of the Desire Realm’s Demon Kings.
At the center of the altar, erect a banner inscribed with the titles of the Great Demon Kings of the Three Realms.

The Master says: This diagram follows the image of the *Original Guidelines’* unfolding. Above, hang the banners of the Thirty-Two Heavens. Open eight gates on the exterior, and place the tablets of the Twenty-Eight Constellations around the perimeter.

**Names of the Thirty-Two Heavenly Palaces**
Begin with the tablets of the Grand August Yellow Once Heaven, proceeding in order:
Purple Tenuity Palace
Purple Chamber Palace

Middle Origin Palace
Jade Radiance Palace
True Origin Palace
Numinous Seclusion Palace
Heavenly Treasure Palace
Transforming Numinosity Palace
Myriad Blessings Palace
White Canopy Palace
Cloud Harmony Palace

**Twenty-Four Hell Lamps**
**Mandate for the Origin Thearch’s Grace to Sinful Souls**

**Incantation:**
Five Stars shine resplendent,
Origin’s azure and jasper mists.
The *Origin Scripture* revolves and delivers,
Bathing in the golden florescence.
Soul and spirit return to life,
Jade-pure without blemish.
Numinous light voidly reflects,
Silently illuminating the Three Flowers.
The flying spirit enters the Southern Palace,
Whistling and chanting in the empty song.
All as proclaimed in the mandate.

**Proclamation:**
Numinous Treasure Mystic Altar
On this day of the present month and year, reverently upholding the
Dao Decree, we issue...

Arrange the forms of the Blood Lake and the Nine Prisons before the altar, displaying them on lanterns and banners. The banners are to be placed above the gate.

*This concludes the thirtieth scroll of the* Numinous Treasure Jade Mirror.

chunks.original_text: 虚明紫兰，太素高虚。 太真元晨，三炁淳于。 玉清八观，朗映九衢。 妙觉变化，始青肇图。 应感轮回，消魔琼都。 紫晶炼质，逍遥帝舆。 三清曲赦，原照夜图。 九幽五岳，无间酆都。 波罗摩辱，下救三途。 五苦八难，苦厄俱除。 冥官禀命，元始真符。 急如灵命，违者速诛。 急急如灵宝无量度人律令。 告文 灵宝玄坛 今月　日，恭奉 道旨颁降 太上玉勑普告三界符命，覃宥罪魂，须至告下者。 符 右奉 太上玉勑，普告三界十方主者，无极神乡，泉曲之府，北都罗酆，三官九署，十二河源。 上解亡过某祖考，亿劫种亲。 疾除罪簿，落灭恶根，不得拘留，逼合鬼群。 一如告命。 年岁次　月　日告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　承诰奉行。 方函 太上普告三界符命告下 十方三界无极神乡至宰　　具法位臣姓某谨封 宣符毕，召功曹宣关，焚之。 八难灯符 解袪雷役电之难符 解担砂负石之难符 解涟汲溟波之难符 解刀山地狱之难符 解剑树地狱之难符 解镬汤地狱之难符 解炉炭地狱之难符 解寒冰地狱之难符 总勑符咒 天尊救群迷，超度离八难。 庆会人道中，五苦一齐并。 永灭三途津，焕轮发周范。 希夷守真常，浩劫无期限。 急急如律令。 右存引金光万丈，绵绵一炁成符，然发本性慧光，照破阴狱。 如法行持，则冥有所济矣。 其符如关灯时，逐一焚之。 永度三途五苦八难符玉文祖炁 咒曰 灵宝玉符，超度八难。 一切幽魂，得登彼岸。 大道幽微，阳光灿烂。 获生人天，兴善赞叹。 元始符命，至逍遥上清。 木轴朴 内围灯牌九旛睿号 色欲门元灵隐耀天尊。 上尸道威光宝际天尊。 天涂门普照幽明天尊。 受欲门随机赴感天尊。 中尸道虚皇普济天尊。 人涂界大慈救苦天尊。 贪欲门慈悲救苦天尊。 下尸道无边普度天尊。 地涂界法力超升天尊。 中围灯牌十五并十五旛号 人道元洞玉晨天尊。 色累苦心门普光弘济天尊。 神道通光普济天尊。 爱累苦神门法轮开化天尊。 风刀地狱苦灵源普润天尊。 鬼道慈悲惠爱天尊。 贪累苦形门神光广被天尊。 摙山负石苦道玄上玉华天尊。 地狱道宝光通昭一天尊。 华竞苦精门玉清玄上天尊。 作江河苦道慈恩万善天尊。 旁生道金华慈惠天尊。 身累苦魂门玄明梵行天尊。 吞火食炭道玉真隐韵天尊。 外围灯牌二十四并二十四睿号 监天地狱广常慈爱天尊。 玄天地狱普垂妙泽天尊。 元上地狱开度无量天尊。 太真地狱光华宝华天尊。 虚天地狱随劫救苦天尊。 火庭地狱寻声救苦天尊。 毒刃地狱无边普济天尊。 寒夜地狱九幽拔罪天尊。 律令地狱妙化无边天尊。 风刀地狱广常覆护天尊。 九幽地狱金华广耀天尊。 刑正地狱圣力无边天尊。 太平地狱广大慈悲天尊。 清沼地狱无极快乐天尊。 玄阴地狱轮转万变天尊。 天玄地狱广度沉沦天尊。 天一北狱高皇玉晨天尊。 三十六天狱高灵最妙天尊。 无正地狱慈教广度天尊。 河伯地狱普垂惠泽天尊。 禁罚地狱广大无边天尊。 黄天地狱大弘普济天尊。 累劫地狱随念往生天尊。 女青地狱开度宿障天尊。 回耀轮灯 师曰：按真人二十四戒经，凡人生前造二十四种罪恶，死后历二十四报，化为二十四狱。 三途五苦，八难之场八狱，共二十四狱。 按人身中，三部八景，二十四神之数。 多因在世贪着情欲，设心邪境，结节凝滓，不能开通。

Void-luminous purple orchid, Great Simplicity’s high emptiness.

Jade Clarity’s eight visions, radiant through nine thoroughfares.
Wondrous awakening’s transformations, Azure Genesis’s first chart.

Three Clarities’ winding amnesties, illuminating the night’s chart.
Nine Yins and Five Peaks, Fengdu’s Avīci.
Pāramitā of humility, descending to save the Three Wretched Paths.
Five Sufferings and Eight Perils, all afflictions wholly dispelled.

Swift as the numinous command—those who disobey are swiftly executed.
Swift, swift, as the Numinous Treasure’s *Limitless Salvation* precept commands.

**Proclamation Document**
**Numinous Treasure Mystic Altar**
On this day of the present month, reverently receiving the Dao’s decree and promulgating the Most High Jade Edict’s *Universal Mandate to the Three Realms*, we extend clemency to sinful souls. This proclamation is hereby issued.

**Talisman**
Right: Reverently receiving the Most High Jade Edict, we universally proclaim to the rulers of the Three Realms and the ten directions, the boundless divine realms, the Yellow Springs’ courts, Fengdu of the Northern Capital, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, and the Twelve River Sources.
May the transgressions of the departed ancestor [Name] and all karmic kin of countless kalpas be absolved.
Swiftly erase their sin registers, extinguish their evil roots, and forbid their detention or coercion into ghostly throngs.
As this mandate commands.

Year, cyclical year, month, day—proclamation issued.
[Rank] [Title] [Name], humbly receiving the decree and carrying it out.

**Envelope**
*Most High Universal Mandate to the Three Realms*
Proclamation issued to the rulers of the ten directions and Three Realms, boundless divine realms, and all authorities.
[Rank] [Title] [Name], respectfully sealed.

After announcing the talisman, summon the Merit Officers to disseminate the decree and burn it.

**The Jade Origin Pursuit and Deliverance Gate**

The Dao’s capacity to encompass the cosmos and nurture the myriad things arises entirely from the wondrous workings of spontaneity—how could it ever involve retribution? Yet with beings, it is otherwise. The qi that dwells within form is but fleeting dust, and from the moment a thought of good or evil arises, retribution inevitably follows.

Thus, the Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure include the *Jade Origin Pursuit and Deliverance* protocol, specifically for delivering the souls of those who died in childbirth or blood-related deaths. Given that their karmic entanglements have already accumulated and the conditions for retribution swiftly follow—drowning them in the rivers of desire and seas of craving—how much more so when they fall into gestation, suffer bodily harm, or perish in blood and filth? The stench of their defilement defies description.

Though their physical forms may be gone, their lingering attachments remain unextinguished. Therefore, they must be cleansed in the pure, vast source of the Forest of Judgment, washing away the stains of their past impurities. Through the light of true yang and perfect goodness, their original nature is awakened. The Purple Essence clarifies their Dao, and the Jade Talisman transports their spirits.

Thus, their illusory karmic bonds and phantom shadows dissolve like fallen blossoms, while their wondrous true bodies shine like the moon in the sky—utterly unobstructed, equal to the vast emptiness. How could this not be beneficial?

The Master says: The Gorge Stone Prison lies in the southeast of the Iron Enclosure. There stands a great stone, broad above and tapering below, with a narrow fissure at its center. Ghosts who enter it are naturally drenched in a hundredfold of poisonous juices, tormenting their bodies and minds. To the north of this prison is the Blood Lake Great Prison, the most defiled of all. Within it, women who died in childbirth endure suffering for countless kalpas—an agony beyond measure, truly pitiable.

When delivering the souls of those who died in blood or childbirth, one must first dispatch talismanic commands to the specialized officials overseeing childbirth, who will purge the filth and transform the Blood Lake. Only then may the deliverance proceed. The pardon must be memorialized three days prior, and only after its completion may the rites of summoning and gathering commence.

Upon arriving at the ritual arena, the Dharma Master must first perform the purification of defilements and petition the Heavenly Physicians for healing. Only thereafter may the souls sequentially receive offerings and precepts. If one merely performs a generic pursuit and deliverance without discernment, there will inevitably be places the talismans cannot reach—this must be carefully heeded in practice.

chunks.original_text: 右奉 符命，追取血湖之内，生产落胎堕子一切女魂，径出地狱，洗涤形神。 前诣玄坛，祇受功德，时刻超度，仙化成人。 遵奉 太上度人律令，风火无停，一如告命。 年岁次　月　日告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　承诰奉行。 玉箓度血湖解冤符取天门炁吹 咒曰 梵炁弥罗，周回十方。 五苦罴对，三途消灭。 冤缠和平，恶根断绝。 前缘宿债，业根解结 秘咒 唵檀哪兜喽哪勑帝喃娑诃。 此咒密念系三天梵语，能解一切冤业。 告文 灵宝玄坛 今月　日，恭奉 符命，拔度产死女魂，解释冤憎，上登福堂者。 符 右奉 玉箓度血湖解冤符命，告下十方世界，幽牢地狱，冥局曹案主者，北溟血湖主者。 解释亡某三业六根，仇雠执对，出离长夜，各睹光明。 万罪荡除，积冤未释一如告命，风炎驿传。 年岁次　月　日告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　承诰奉行。 玉箓金书破血湖大赦真符 咒曰 玉清辉映，金碧流光。 日精散耀，五方五斗。 上帝真师，玄元正炁。 冲破幽关，酆都煞气。 六洞鬼王，遵依勑命。 三途九阴，流光朗照。 苦海停轮，水精净秽。 七星洞明，火精焚尸。 妖恶俱镯。 五老启途。 九灵飞仙，万神秉命，风火驿传。 又咒 元始勑下，救苦真人。 承受符命，下达幽阴。 阳光所照，黑暗生明。 万罪荡除，六根澄清。 急急如玉清元皇上帝勑。 元皇上帝拔度血湖产亡罪魂赦文运真含灵会，宝勑召诸神。 六天垒重阴，酆都九幽狱。 典吏部冥洞，三官执冤府。 曹治神吏众，一切主罪录。 拔度产死魂，免罹诸荼毒。 流光玉元符，照破血湖狱。 炉炭生青莲，刀剑化骞林。 火池变温泉，镬汤为春浦。 超度长夜魂，往生极乐国。 玉箓度血湖破秽开光宝箓 咒曰 无极太上，至真天尊。 玉虚勑命，遍达泉扃。 天丁甲卒，百二十人。 前袪腥秽，径冲幽冥。 日光童子，百二十人。 月光童子，百二十人。 无间地狱，光彻分明。 冰寒融和，秽气消平。 尸血臭秽，消荡不停。 南丹真火，洞彻杳冥。 死魂出离，得睹光明。 飞令下速，万神皈依。 勑策咒 圆光五彩，素辉三晨。 结根纯莹，光华九清。 三洞符命，径冲幽阴。 断绝罪源，消解迷津。 玉符到处，万神成听。 右符书之粘破秽牒前，用青纸朱书，三光咒勅符。 唯是血湖臭秽，幽暗难入，虽官史承帝令，有神通能入，亦不能径达血湖之所。 若得此符，用檄付冲血湖解秽破暗天丁，则能通达。 此符一百二十里暗晦秽恶自消，光明通彻，不可不秘。 玉元虎文符牒用 咒曰 唵哪咤哩。

**Appearance of the Blood Lake Officers and Generals:**
- **Peng Ding:** Face blue, indigo hair, azure form resembling a vajra; clad in yellow robes with a white sash, lower body cyan; wields a halberd, commands one hundred soldiers. To summon, visualize the central mark on the middle finger.
- **Huang Que:** Face dark, crimson in hue, form like a celestial soldier; wears a white robe, bare red feet, white sash; wields a demon-subduing vajra, strides with raised steps, voice thunderous, commands one million troops. To summon, visualize the *you* trigram.

For all childbirth chambers and bathing areas, memorialize the Celestial Pivot Bureau and address the two Generals, stating the circumstances to dispatch them. Visualize the two Generals expelling the dead fetus.

The talismans for expelling and purifying the fetus are detailed in the *Dissemination and Transformation* section.

**Three Generals for Retrieving the Mother Who Died in Childbirth:**
- **Zhong Zhi:** "The Great Spirit King who severs unrighteous bonds, seizes ghosts, and liberates essence." [Text from *Zhi Zhong*]
- **Hu Jing:** "The Great Spirit who shakes drums like thunder, flashes lightning, gathers souls, and restores flesh."
- **Lu Mao:** "The Great Spirit who rectifies essence, ignites fiery eyes, gathers dark energies, and dissolves karmic obstructions."

The above three Generals wear turquoise embroidered headscarves and crimson robes, each wielding three-colored weapons, descending amidst black clouds.

**Four Generals for Retrieving Mother and Child Who Perished Before Birth:**
- **Xu Li:** "The Great Spirit of upright nature, pure essence, who breaks defilement and revives vitality."
- **Zhou Mian:** "The Great Spirit of awe-inspiring efficacy, who restores form through cleansing bonds."
- **Li Xing:** "The Great Spirit who dissolves grievances, restores the soul, and revives the body."
- **Feng Zun:** "The Great Spirit who rectifies grievances, restores the soul, revives form, and replenishes fluids."

The above four Generals wear red embroidered headscarves and four-colored robes, each descending with talismans in hand.

**Talisman of the Latrine Tower Messenger (Eastern Qi):**
*Incantation:*
"Left virtue, right assistance,
Fortify the tower’s host of spirits.
As I tread with Su and Lu,
Transform the turbid into purity.
Expel all wayward influences,
Swiftly manifest your numen.
Swift, swift, as the Supreme Lord’s command!"

*Alternate Incantation:*
"Supreme Flame Spirit,
Essence of flowing fire.
By the Emperor’s decree,
No delay is permitted.
Left, dispatch the Six Ding;
Right, employ the Six Ren.
Holding the talismanic command,
Summon the mountain spirits.
Latrine Tower Messenger,
Swiftly seize, swiftly act,
Execute with utmost urgency!
Left, Green Dragon General;
Right, White Tiger General.
Open their eyes—ten thousand *zhang* of flame,
Scorching and dispersing demonic *qi*!
Swift, swift, as the Supreme Lord’s command!"

*Incantation:*
"Truth, truth! Dharma water dissolves and purifies.
The Round Tower’s Generals,
Summon the altar’s grounds.
If retrieving the childbed guardian,
Banish misfortune and calamity.
Swift, swift, as the Supreme Lord’s statutes!"

Burn one portion of gold paper and a cup of tea in the latrine for the woman. Alternatively, the talisman may be inscribed and affixed to the messenger’s memorial.

chunks.original_text: 召摄幽灵门 夫法性平等，广大无碍，增之不益，损之不亏，近之不迩，远之不遐。 聚而为一，不为不足。 散而为万，不为有余。 曰天，曰人，曰圣，曰凡，初未尝有以异也。 奈何众生业识渐染，离本去原，毫厘之差，千里之谬。 是以崇卑顿异，凡圣迥殊，彼此相速，亿万有间。 是故灵宝大法，有召摄幽灵之旨。 盖以神通威力，普度天人，犹恐诸趣尚或沉滞，未究法性之玄。 故以清净自然灵宝妙光，普摄普度，使十方无碍，万境圆融。 则心内圣凡，性中天地，洪纤一致，无欠无余。 此真一不二之妙义也，岂易异哉。 净秽天目符子文北炁 咒曰 天目神君，急速降临。 流布真炁，助吾眼明。 立见神鬼，役召六丁。 鬼神受命，不得隐形。 右符焚於水盂中，畎太玄神水颂洒之，不可念净天地等咒。 天地尚净，何鬼敢当，切宜慎之。 咒食夜斋香符上天炁玉诀 咒曰 食满十方，通开百饱。 食之无尽，飞升玉都。 急急如上帝律令。 摄见爽灵符卯文青玄炁吹坛下 祝曰 谨请无上救苦真人，左玄真人，右玄真人。 摇金精，动玉户，照见天上天下。 摄见亡某，及六道四生，幽灵滞爽，速现大身。 急急如玉帝勑。 开通道路符散形 咒曰 元始登引，天真大神。 上圣高尊，妙行真人。 十方无极，至真大神。 倾光回驾，监真度生。 诸天丞相，南昌上宫。 韩司主录，监生大神。 执箓把籍，齐到帝前。 随所应度，严校诸天。 普告三界，无极神乡。 泉曲之府，北都罗酆。 三官九署，十二河源。 上解祖考，亿劫种亲。 疾除罪簿，落灭恶根。 不得拘留，逼合鬼群。 元始符命，时刻升迁。 急急如元始无量度人律令。 右符焚，存灰於手中，合玉诀，念前咒，吹灰於坛之座下。 存大行梵炁，周回十方，遍满坛场，内外洞明，并无遮碍。 左手艮文，右手剑诀，面鬼户丁罡三步，以剑诀虚书摄召长夜府五字。 祝曰 引领鬼魂使者，地道鬼道，当界土地，五道神祇。 疾速与吾，监引所荐亡魂，及六道幽爽，赴坛受度。 吾奉玉清勑。 再以剑诀，向鬼户画开字，存黍珠妙光，照破黑暗。 左瞬目三次，定神，觉悲风凄惨。 仿髴胡见幽魂自艮户出，俱集坛前。 召六道二十四类孤魂等文。 并见科范门。 召六道诀 天仙道，子文存自天门乘宝光飞云，而至于上。 神明道，丑文存自地户乘梵炁，驾风马，至于左。 人伦道，寅文存自人门乘宝光，而至于右。 地狱道，申文饿鬼道，酉文畜生道戌文。 念三官北酆咒，运目出慧光，飞斗，双手搯玉清诀，引炁。 如河路鼻出二炁融合，运太一圆象之光，自天而下，烛破幽阴，众魂皆随光赴坛。 召六道符 天仙道符子文宝光炁 咒曰 元始摄召汝，符命告十方。 成闻大法音，天道应福堂。 急急如律令。 又咒 玉清梵炁，普告天仙。 参驭飞云，咸赴法筵。 急急如上帝勑。 神道符丑文梵炁 咒曰 功成利万绌物，妙化应诸一天。 含符摄召汝，神道合自然。 急急如律令。 又咒 玉清大献，广布酥酡。 高际九霄，香环十极。 咸令度化，普受法食。 急急如上帝勑。 人道符寅文白光炁 咒曰 三界法元主，应物享无边。 闻会上真语。 人道俱成仙。 急急如上帝勑。 又咒 玉清大化，梵炁氤氲。 普遍摄召，接引人伦。 急急如上帝令。 地道符申文玄炁 咒曰 符命应三界，摄召万灵分。
chunks.translated_text:
Summoning the Gate of Hidden Spirits

The nature of the Dao is equality, vast and unbounded—augmented yet not increased, diminished yet not diminished. Near yet not proximate, distant yet not remote. Gathered into one, it is not lacking; dispersed into ten thousand, it is not excessive. Be it heaven, humanity, sages, or commoners, there was never any difference. Yet sentient beings, gradually stained by karmic consciousness, drift from their origin and root. A hair’s deviation becomes a thousand *li* of error. Thus, the noble and the base diverge sharply, the common and the sacred stand worlds apart, and myriad distinctions arise between self and other.

Therefore, the Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure possess the principle of summoning and gathering hidden spirits. Through divine power and majesty, they universally deliver heaven and humanity, yet still fear that beings in all destinies may remain mired, never fully realizing the mystery of the Dharma-nature. Thus, with the pure and spontaneous wondrous light of the Numinous Treasure, they universally gather and deliver, so that the ten directions become unimpeded and the myriad realms perfectly fused. Then the sage and the common within the heart, heaven and earth within the nature, the vast and the minute become one, without lack or excess. This is the wondrous meaning of the True One, non-dual—how could it be otherwise?

*Talisman of the Heavenly Eye, Northern Qi of the Purified Realm*
*Incantation:*
"Divine Lord of the Heavenly Eye, descend swiftly!
Disperse the true *qi*, brighten my vision.
Instantly perceive spirits and ghosts, command the Six Dings.
Ghosts and gods, receive the mandate—concealment is forbidden!"

Burn this talisman in a water vessel, sprinkle with the *Ode to the Great Mystery’s Divine Water*, and do not recite the *Purify Heaven and Earth* incantation. If heaven and earth are already pure, what ghost would dare resist? Exercise utmost caution.

*Incantation for Offering Nighttime Vegetarian Feast, Celestial Qi Jade Mudra*
*Incantation:*
"Food fills the ten directions, sating all hunger.
Eating without end, ascend to the Jade Capital.
Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s statutes!"

*Talisman for Summoning Departed Spirits, Eastern Qi of the Azure Mystery*
*Prayer:*
"Reverently invite the Supreme Savior of Suffering, the Left Mystery Perfected, the Right Mystery Perfected.
Shake the golden essence, stir the jade portals—illuminate all above and below heaven.
Summon the departed so-and-so, and the six destinies’ four births, hidden spirits and lingering souls—manifest in full form!
Swift, swift, as the Jade Emperor’s command!"

*Talisman for Opening Roads, Dispersed Form*
*Incantation:*
"Primordial Beginning ascends and guides, Heavenly Perfected Great Spirits.
Exalted Saints, Highly Honored, Perfected Ones of Wondrous Conduct.
Ten Directions’ Boundless, Utmost True Great Spirits.
Incline your light, turn your chariots—oversee the deliverance of beings.
Celestial Chancellors, Southern Palace of High Prosperity.
Han, Controller of Records, Great Spirit of Life-Monitoring.
Grasp the registers, hold the ledgers—all assemble before the Emperor.
According to those to be delivered, strictly examine the heavens.
Universally proclaim to the Three Realms, the boundless divine lands.
The subterranean courts, the Northern Capital of Fengdu.
The Three Offices, Nine Bureaus, Twelve River Sources.
Release the ancestors, the karmic kin of countless kalpas.
Swiftly erase the ledgers of sin, sever the roots of evil.
No detention, no coercion into ghostly throngs.
By the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, ascend without delay!
Swift, swift, as the Primordial Beginning’s *Limitless Deliverance of Beings* statutes!"

Burn this talisman, hold the ashes in hand, form the Jade Mudra, recite the above incantation, and blow the ashes beneath the altar’s seat. Visualize the great expanse of Brahma-*qi* circulating through the ten directions, filling the altar grounds inside and out with luminous clarity, utterly unimpeded.

With the left hand in the *Gen* mudra and the right in the Sword Mudra, face the Ghost Gate’s *Ding* alignment and take three steps. With the Sword Mudra, trace the five characters of the *Long Night’s Repository* in the air.

*Prayer:*
"Lead the ghostly messengers, the earthly and ghostly paths’ local earth gods, the Five Paths’ deities—
Hasten to supervise and guide the recommended departed souls and the six destinies’ hidden spirits to the altar for deliverance.
I act by the Jade Clarity’s command."

Again with the Sword Mudra, draw an *Open* character toward the Ghost Gate. Visualize the luminous pearl’s wondrous light piercing the darkness. Blink the left eye three times, compose the spirit, and sense the mournful, chilling wind. Vaguely perceive the hidden souls emerging from the *Gen* Gate, all assembling before the altar.

*Text for Summoning the Six Destinies’ Twenty-Four Classes of Lonely Spirits*
(See the *Procedural Standards* section.)

*Mudra for Summoning the Six Destinies*
For the **Heavenly Immortal Path**, trace the *Zi* character, visualizing oneself ascending through the Heavenly Gate on a flying cloud of precious light.
For the **Divine Path**, trace the *Chou* character, visualizing oneself emerging from the Earthly Gate on Brahma-*qi*, riding the wind-horse to the left.
For the **Human Path**, trace the *Yin* character, visualizing oneself entering through the Human Gate on precious light to the right.
For the **Hell Path**, the *Shen* character; for the **Hungry Ghost Path**, the *You* character; for the **Animal Path**, the *Xu* character.
Recite the *Three Offices’ Northern Fengdu* incantation, emit wisdom-light from the eyes, fly the Dipper, and with both hands form the Jade Clarity Mudra to guide the *qi*. As if from a river’s course, exhale two streams of *qi* from the nose, merging them. Circulate the Great One’s spherical light from heaven downward, illuminating and breaking the hidden yin—all souls follow the light to the altar.

*Talismans for Summoning the Six Destinies*

**Heavenly Immortal Path Talisman, Zi Character, Precious Light Qi**
*Incantation:*
"Primordial Beginning summons you, talismanic command proclaims to the ten directions.
Upon hearing the great Dharma-sound, the Heavenly Path responds to the Hall of Blessings.
Swift, swift, as the statutes!"

*Additional Incantation:*
"Jade Clarity’s Brahma-*qi*, universally proclaims to the Heavenly Immortals.
Ascend flying clouds, all attend the Dharma feast.
Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!"

**Divine Path Talisman, Chou Character, Brahma-Qi**
*Incantation:*
"Merits complete, benefiting the myriad things—wondrous transformations respond to the One Heaven.
Holding the talisman, summon you—Divine Path, harmonize with spontaneity.
Swift, swift, as the statutes!"

*Additional Incantation:*
"Jade Clarity’s great offering, widely disperses ghee and wine.
High as the nine skies, fragrant encircling the ten poles.
All are delivered and transformed, universally receive the Dharma-food.
Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!"

**Human Path Talisman, Yin Character, White Light Qi**
*Incantation:*
"Lord of the Three Realms’ Dharma-origin, responding to beings with boundless enjoyment.
Upon hearing the Perfected’s words at the assembly, the Human Path all attain immortality.
Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!"

*Additional Incantation:*
"Jade Clarity’s great transformation, Brahma-*qi* suffuses and swirls.
Universally gather and summon, guide and receive humanity.
Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!"

**Earth Path Talisman, Shen Character, Mysterious Qi**
*Incantation:*
"Talismanic command responds to the Three Realms, summoning the myriad spirits’ divisions."

**Dharma-voice proclaims the wondrous decree, hell realms open to radiant light.**
*Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!*

*Additional Incantation:*
"Jade Clarity’s great transformation, penetrating the dark underworld.
Hell’s gates open to peace, sinful souls unbound.
*Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!*"

**Ghost Path Talisman, Shen Character, Void Qi**
*Incantation:*
"Hunger and thirst arise from karmic deeds, sins weigh heavy or light.
The Primordial Beginning issues talismanic command—ghosts attain immortal form.
*Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!*"

*Additional Incantation:*
"Jade Clarity’s great transformation, compassion gives rise to spirits.
The parched and withered, all feast on abundance.
*Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!*"

**Karma Path Talisman, Shen Character, Turbid Qi**
*Incantation:*
"Through kalpas, the true origin is lost, suffering drowns the four births.
The Eastern Florescence bestows gracious power—karmic retribution finds purity and peace.
*Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!*"

*Additional Incantation:*
"Jade Clarity’s great transformation, universally saving all beings.
The four births’ emotions surge, hastening to the altar’s court.
*Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!*"

**Summoning Talisman of the Four Births**
*Transformed Birth Talisman, Shen Character, Xun Qi*
*Moist Birth Talisman, Kan Character, Gen Qi*
*Egg Birth Talisman, Shen Character, Dui Qi*
*Womb Birth Talisman, Zi Character, Qian Qi*

*Incantation:*
"Primal Essence’s jade spirit, chariot drawn by crimson dragons.
Above, it connects to the boundless; below, it enters the dark underworld.
Pursuing and summoning the Three Realms, the ten directions and six paths.
All four births—men and women, thousands of kinds, myriad types.
Lingering souls and solitary spirits, all hasten swiftly.
Descend and transform your forms, utter the universal sound *zhazhapu*!
*Swift, swift, as the Celestial Emperor’s command!*"

**Talisman of Pursuit, Summoning, and Manifestation for Offering**
*Jade Seal Talisman of Ancestral Qi*
*Universal Summoning Talisman, Mao Character, Eastern Qi*
*Summoning Ancestors Talisman, Jade Character, Ancestral Qi*
*Summoning Solitary Spirits Talisman, Mao Character, Northeast Qi*

*Incantation:*
"Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command—swiftly manifest your true forms!
The Vermilion Mound delivers lives—who dares conceal their shape?
*Swift, swift, as the law’s command!*"

*Recite the incantation seven times, then burn it before the offering vessel.*

**General Concluding Incantation**
"Jade Clarity’s great Brahma, illuminating the three paths.
Lifting and saving the six destinies, nurturing the myriad distinctions.
Cloud-script and treasure-seals, purple palace’s cinnabar writings.
All receive deliverance, ascending to the Pure Capital.

chunks.original_text: 列幙敷化门 夫道体若虚空，然无所不容，无所不化也，岂限以一隅而成哉。 且知月出于天，凡有水处，影无不在也。 雷震于地，凡得闻处，声无不应也。 法性亦然，静虚则能应物也。 苟推常善救人救物之心，而无所不被其化也。 故众生障翳，本来元明。 眼根依物，乃转种种染着，造诸业缘。 生前为疾病所侵，以至毁伤夭折，形体不完，皆不得其正命。 而死也身虽灭度，妄念犹存。 故以灵宝大法，敷化一科，以元始妙化而复其本然之性。 天庶业识断除，善根滋长，复何疾病困苦之有哉。 经不云乎，吾有大患，为吾有身。 及吾无身，吾有何患。 今既身空幻灭，云散月明，不着於色相之尘，不落於万缘之化，岂语言文字所可议哉。 九天监生真文 咒曰 飞玄之气，结成真文。 死骸开度，万品生根。 右九天监生真文一十六字，作真文立於监生司中。 鬼神见之，自然百骸流光，辟却尸秽血光之气。 九天监生司 谨请九天监生司马大神，卫房圣母元君，天医列职仙众。 只今引过血湖，未分娩产魂，约入幕。 次俾令分娩，托化人天。 召天医符 卯文，东炁，诵隐语书之。 咒曰 太上九光，真华之炁。 流光下临，洞彻九幽。 上帝有勅，普救幽魂。 出离苦爽，速离寒庭。 急急如律令。 天医尚药符斗印，天门炁 咒曰 天医大圣，地医元神。 灵丹仙药，普救群生。 降临真炁，闻召速临。 吾奉南极好生大帝律令。 又曰 天医天医，速降天门。 拯救群生，治病消危。 上帝有勑，风火急行。 急急如律令。 次想亡魂入幕。 分娩符中文，灵宝炁 谨请加保之母，速赐真炁，救死魂生天。 众念灵书三遍，东南炁，想魂入幕，念已生未生，皆得生成。 一法四句并诵，又念三十二遍。 每三遍一取灵宝炁，吹去亡魂。 母子分解，又咒三遍。 咒曰 元始洞玄，灵宝本章。 胎化生根，断除邪秽。 百神定命，离合自然。 雌一变魄，雄一变魂。 混洞变化，中有帝尊。 和阳召阴，炼精正胞。 升降明堂，晖映景霄。 内结流珠，融结万方。 紫烟青云，玉婴金光。 产亡之鬼，胎根解散，母子速分。 太素生五脏，七魄入泥丸。 急急如上帝勑。 监生符卯文，长生诀 咒曰 天帝合明，下付幽冥。 真炁成象，阴阳附行。 宿愆冤缠，解结开明。 监生速降，卫房急生。 玉真灵书，救拔产清。 大道有令。 天医全形。 急急如律令。 唵呜轮尼哆嗏。 全形符 咒曰
chunks.translated_text:
**The Gate of Arrayed Pavilions for Dispensation and Transformation**

The body of the Dao resembles emptiness, yet it contains all and transforms all—how could it be confined to a single corner? Consider how the moon emerges in the heavens: wherever there is water, its reflection is present without fail. Or how thunder resounds upon the earth: wherever it is heard, its echo responds without exception. The nature of the Dharma is likewise—still and empty, it can respond to all things. If one extends the mind of constant goodness to save beings and things, its transformative power will reach everywhere without limit.

Thus, the obstructions of sentient beings obscure their original luminosity. The eye-root clings to phenomena, turning to manifold defilements and creating karmic conditions. In life, they suffer invasion by illness, leading to injury, premature death, or incomplete forms—none attain their rightful destiny. Though the body perishes in death, deluded thoughts persist. Therefore, through the great methods of the *Lingbao*, a dispensation is arrayed: by the wondrous transformation of the Primordial Beginning, their original nature is restored. Heavenly karma and karmic consciousness are severed, wholesome roots flourish—what illness, distress, or suffering could remain?

As the scripture says: *"My great affliction is that I have a body. When I no longer have a body, what affliction remains?"* Now that the body is empty, illusory, and dissolved—like clouds dispersing to reveal the bright moon—no longer clinging to the dust of form, no longer entangled in the transformations of the ten thousand conditions, how could this be discussed in words or captured in writing?

---

**True Writ of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Monitoring**
*Incantation:*
"Flying Mystery’s qi, congealing into true writ.
The dead’s remains open to deliverance, the ten thousand kinds take root."

The sixteen characters of the *True Writ of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Monitoring* are inscribed as a true writ and established within the Life-Monitoring Bureau. When ghosts and spirits behold it, their hundred bones naturally radiate light, dispelling the qi of corpse-filth and blood.

---

**Nine Heavens’ Life-Monitoring Bureau**
Reverently invite the Great Deity Sima of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Monitoring Bureau, the Sage Mother of the Protective Chamber, the Celestial Lady of Primordial Power, and the assembled immortals of the Heavenly Physicians’ ranks.

Now lead forth the souls from the Blood Lake, those not yet delivered in childbirth, and gather them into the pavilion. Then enable their delivery, entrusting them to transformation in the human and heavenly realms.

---

**Summoning Talisman of the Heavenly Physicians**
*Mao* character, *qi* of the East. Recite the hidden-language writ.

*Incantation:*
"Great Radiance of the Supreme, true efflorescence of qi.
Flowing light descends, penetrating the Nine Netherworlds.
By the Emperor’s decree, universally deliver the imprisoned souls.
Depart from suffering and clarity, swiftly leave the cold courts.
*Swift, swift, as the law’s command!*"

---

**Talisman-Seal of the Heavenly Physicians’ Medicinal Ladle, Qi of the Heavenly Gate**
*Incantation:*
"Heavenly Physicians, Great Sages; Earthly Physicians, Primordial Spirits.
Divine elixirs and immortal medicines, universally save the multitudes.
Descend with true qi, heed the summons and swiftly arrive.
I act by the law-command of the Great Emperor of the Southern Culmen, Lover of Life."

*Also recited:*
"Heavenly Physicians, Heavenly Physicians, swiftly descend through the Heavenly Gate.
Rescue the multitudes, cure illness, and dissolve peril.
By the Emperor’s decree, wind and fire hasten the journey.
*Swift, swift, as the law’s command!*"

---

Next, visualize the deceased soul entering the pavilion.

**Talisman of Childbirth, Lingbao Qi**
Reverently invite the Protective Mother to swiftly bestow true qi and deliver the dead soul to rebirth in heaven.

Recite the *Lingbao* writ three times, *qi* of the Southeast. Visualize the soul entering the pavilion, whether born or unborn, all attain completion.

Recite the four-line method in unison, then repeat thirty-two times. After every three recitations, draw in *Lingbao* qi and blow it toward the deceased soul.

Mother and child separate; recite the incantation three more times.

*Incantation:*
"Primordial Beginning, penetrating mystery, fundamental chapter of the *Lingbao*.
Womb-transformation generates roots, severing defilement and impurity.
The hundred spirits stabilize destiny; separation and union occur naturally.
Yin transforms into *po*, yang transforms into *hun*.
Within the chaos of transformation, an imperial sovereign resides.
Harmonizing yang to summon yin, refining essence to rectify the womb.
Ascending and descending in the Hall of Light, radiance illumines the luminous heavens.
Within, a flowing pearl coalesces, fusing and structuring the ten thousand directions.
Purple mist and azure clouds, jade infants and golden light.
Ghosts of the deceased in childbirth—womb-roots dissolve, mother and child swiftly part.
Primal Simplicity generates the five viscera; the seven *po* enter the Mud-Pill Palace.
*Swift, swift, as the Emperor’s decree!*"

---

**Life-Monitoring Talisman, Mao Character, Long-Life Formula**
*Incantation:*
"Heavenly Emperor unites with light, bestowing it upon the netherworld.
True qi forms images; yin and yang follow in movement.
Karmic obstructions and entangling grievances—knots unravel, clarity dawns.
Life-Monitoring swiftly descends; the Protective Chamber hastens birth.
Jade-true numinous writ, delivering and purifying childbirth.
The Great Dao issues its command: Heavenly Physicians perfect form.
*Swift, swift, as the law’s command!*"

*Oṃ vareṇi dhara hūṃ.*

**Talisman of Perfect Form**
*Incantation:*

chunks.original_text: 太上大慈，死者能完。 神形得妙，上朝玉房。 急急如玉清上帝勑。 出胎符二指下节 荡胎符二指中节 咒曰 元始符命，时刻升迁。 胎根生化，返灵向真。 断除邪秽，变化形营。 死魂受符，仙化成人。 蓬丁中文黄确酉文，天中之灵。 日月俱通，甲乙炁令。 五行旺克，八景玉音。 守符真形，招灵致真。 摄魔符使，速降通灵。 承符奉令，辄莫容情。 急急如律令。 回骸起死符 众诵灵书三遍，存一炁金光，洞彻十方。 永度三涂符卯文东炁 荡秽所 谨召本司坛下官君将吏，请同运秽神君，收秽神君，却秽神君，除秽神君，断秽神君，灭秽神君，洗秽神君，破秽神君，荡秽神君，东西南北四灵解秽神君。 将见今已产亡魂，及幽魂中已生未净众魂，同入室中，涤除秽炁。 使得受生汝等众魂，已沐生成之恩。 仰再入室，涤荡秽炁。 元皇净血尸沐浴真符 咒曰 天河神水，洗涤凡躯。 普濯膻秽，消罪荡除。 玉箓符命，径上南都。 急急如元皇上帝勑。 元皇荡血尸清神真符 咒曰 神清炁化，炼质形躯。 内符所受，保举帝书。 经络存布，径上南都。 急急如上帝勑。 元皇荡血尸通灵净魄咒 五行之炁周流，三光之炁飞浮。 神魂澄正新上天，会合万神玉京游。 师为慈尊，顶出震炁，注血尸，皆令清净。 托水盂，搯卯文，东炁，入幕遍洒。 涤血秽通神净魄符卯文东炁 又咒 天帝有勑，曲赦生灵。 荡徐血秽，举令通真。 流光洞照，体合自然。 急急如上帝勑。 又咒 太华神水，浩渺无穷。 能令秽浊，悉变清凉。 玉华流注，魂魄生光。 符与真人，俱会玉房。 急急如律令。 子次，北炁，焚符入盂，想内外光明。 解秽通真符 咒曰 天地成章，光射三宫。 三魂守固，七魄守中。 解释除恶，道炁无穷。 令魂通炁，上达阳光。 急急如上帝勑。 又曰 阴尸九转，化成神尸。 水火之炁，变入玄玄。 三化九炼，升入无为。 九天之劫，炼度身魂。 受化更生，得为真人。 急急如上帝勑。 水炼血尸符子文北炁 咒曰 元始符命，拔度幽灵。 血尸臭秽，凶恶潜宁。 七液得注，五脏光生。 急急如上帝劫。 建天医院 臣谨虔诚，上启圣祖神农皇帝天医大圣，九天高赐大使神功妙济真君，胗脉真师，尚药灵童，治病功曹，握针童子，卢扁神王，五官医吏，六职治官，五行典吏，验疾博士，审疾真人，九天司马，卫房圣母，监生大神，胎生君，护生君，分生君，速生君，加保之母，浣濯夫人，灵宝局中主产功曹，下死胎功曹，天医合属仙吏。 臣闻二炁运行，尚有否终之理。 群生处世，宁无故误之愆。 疾恙既缠，死生难愈。 臣今摄召六道四生，孤魂滞魄等众。 切虑生前妄想，夙世贪求，智巧纷纭，利名缠缚，神亏精散，气耗形凋。 生时为病苦所侵，死后乃随魂受疾。 复有一切伤亡，及诸横夭，虽为鬼爽，昼夜呻吟。 杳杳沉魂，滔滔滞魄，若非经由於拯济，亦难临与於法筵，仰体道慈，依科拯疗。 谨请天医列职官君，尚药治病仙吏。 於凤凰宫中取太清五色神药，散布亡魂，拯疗生前一切疾病，分头拯治。 木官散药，火官主灸，金官持针，水官主汤，土官和剂，五官医吏，协力同心，全心复性。 如有拳挛跛躄病者，请针灸神将治之。 或有疮疖脓血病者，请外科使者治之。 或喑哑末疾死者，请活人天医治之。

**Great Compassion of the Supreme**
The Most High’s great mercy perfects the dead.
Spirit and form attain wondrousness, ascending to the Jade Chamber.
*Swift, swift, as the Jade Purity Emperor’s decree!*

**Talisman for Exiting the Womb** (applied at the lower joint of the second finger)
**Talisman for Cleansing the Womb** (applied at the middle joint of the second finger)
*Incantation:*
"Primal Beginning issues its writ of command, advancing by the hour.
Womb-roots transform and generate; the spirit returns to truth.
Cut away defilement and impurity; transform and refine the form’s dwelling.
The dead soul receives the talisman, immortalized and reborn as human.
*Peng-ding* in the central script, *Huang-que* in the western script—numinous power of Heaven’s midst.
Sun and moon both penetrate; the qi-mandate of *jia-yi*.
Five Phases wax and wane; the Jade Sounds of the Eight Effulgences.
Guard the talisman’s true form, summon the spirit to attain truth.
Command the talisman’s demon-subduing envoys to swiftly descend and commune with the numinous.
Bear the talisman and uphold the decree—let none dare delay!
*Swift, swift, as the law’s command!*"

**Talisman for Restoring the Body and Reviving the Dead**
Recite the numinous writ three times, visualize a single qi of golden light pervading the ten directions.

**Talisman for Eternal Deliverance from the Three Paths** (Mao-script, eastern qi)
**Cleansing the Defiled Realm**
Solemnly summon the officials and generals beneath this ministry’s jurisdiction:
the Spirit Lords of Transporting Defilement, Gathering Defilement, Repelling Defilement, Removing Defilement, Severing Defilement, Extinguishing Defilement, Washing Defilement, Breaking Defilement, and Scouring Defilement;
the Four Numinous Defilement-Dissolving Spirit Lords of East, West, South, and North.
Together, lead the souls of those deceased in childbirth and all lingering, uncleansed spirits among the hidden dead into the chamber to purge their defiled qi.
Grant that these souls, now reborn, may receive the grace of life’s completion.
Once more, bid them enter the chamber to scour and cleanse all defiled qi.

**Numinous Talisman of the Primordial August One for Bathing the Blood-Corpse**
*Incantation:*
"Heavenly River’s divine water washes the mortal frame.
Universally rinses fetid defilement, dissolves transgressions and scours away sin.
Jade Register’s writ of command ascends directly to the Southern Capital.
*Swift, swift, as the Primordial August Emperor’s decree!*"

**True Numinous Talisman of the Primordial August One for Scouring the Blood-Corpse**
*Incantation:*
"Spirit clears, qi transforms; the bodily form is refined.
The inner talisman received safeguards and presents the Emperor’s writ.
Meridians and collaterals are preserved and spread, ascending directly to the Southern Capital.
*Swift, swift, as the Emperor’s decree!*"

**Incantation for Scouring the Blood-Corpse and Communing with the Numinous to Purify the Po**
"The qi of the Five Phases circulates; the qi of the Three Luminaries soars and floats.
Spirit and soul, clarified and rectified, ascend anew to Heaven,
to roam the Jade Capital in assembly with the myriad spirits.
The master, as compassionate sovereign, emanates *zhen*-qi from the crown,
infusing the blood-corpse, rendering all pure and clean.
Hold the water vessel, trace the Mao-script, eastern qi, and sprinkle throughout the chamber."

**Talisman for Scouring Blood-Defilement and Communing with the Numinous to Purify the Po** (Mao-script, eastern qi)
*Incantation:*
"The Heavenly Emperor issues his decree, granting amnesty to living beings.
Scour away lingering blood-defilement; raise the command to commune with truth.
Flowing radiance pervades and illumines; the body harmonizes with spontaneity.
*Swift, swift, as the Emperor’s decree!*"

*Incantation:*
"Divine water of Mount Taihua, vast and boundless,
transforms all foul defilement into cool purity.
Jade effulgence flows and infuses; soul and po shine with light.
Talisman and perfected one together ascend to the Jade Chamber.
*Swift, swift, as the law’s command!*"

Next, with northern qi, burn the talisman into the vessel and visualize inner and outer luminosity.

**Talisman for Dissolving Defilement and Communing with Truth**
*Incantation:*
"Heaven and Earth complete their pattern; light shines upon the Three Palaces.
The three *hun* are firmly guarded; the seven *po* abide at the center.
Dissolve and remove evil; the Dao’s qi is inexhaustible.
Command the soul to commune with qi and ascend to the light of yang.
*Swift, swift, as the Emperor’s decree!*"

*Incantation:*
"The yin-corpse undergoes nine transformations, refined into a spirit-corpse.
The qi of water and fire transmute and enter the profound mystery.
Three transformations, nine refinements, ascend into non-action.
Through the kalpas of the Nine Heavens, body and soul are tempered and delivered.
Receiving transformation and rebirth, one attains the status of a perfected person.
*Swift, swift, as the Emperor’s decree!*"

**Talisman for Refining the Blood-Corpse with Water** (Zi-script, northern qi)
*Incantation:*
"Primal Beginning issues its writ of command to deliver and uplift hidden spirits.
Blood-corpse’s foul defilement and malevolent evil are stilled and pacified.
Seven fluids are infused; the five viscera shine with light.
*Swift, swift, as the Emperor’s kalpa!*"

**Establishing the Celestial Bureau of Medicine**
Your servant humbly and reverently invokes the Divine Ancestor, the Holy Farmer, Emperor of Heavenly Medicine, the Great Sage of the Nine Heavens, the Highly Exalted Divine Envoy of Wondrous Salvation, the True Lord of Pulse-Diagnosis, the Numinous Youth of Medicinal Attendants, the Merit Officers of Disease Treatment, the Needle-Holding Youths, the Divine Kings *Lu* and *Bian*, the Medical Officials of the Five Offices, the Healing Officers of the Six Ministries, the Clerks of the Five Phases, the Doctors of Disease Verification, the Perfected Ones of Disease Examination, the Marshal of the Nine Heavens, the Holy Mother of the Protective Chamber, the Great Spirit of Life-Monitoring, the Lord of Embryonic Birth, the Lord of Life-Protection, the Lord of Parturition, the Lord of Swift Birth, the Mother of Enhanced Protection, the Lady of Washing and Purification, the Merit Officers of Childbirth in the Numinous Treasure Bureau, the Merit Officers of Removing Dead Fetuses, and all immortals and officials of the Celestial Bureau of Medicine.

Your servant has heard that as the two qi revolve, there is still the principle of eventual resolution after adversity.
As sentient beings dwell in the world, how could there be no errors or transgressions?
Once illness and affliction entangle, life and death become difficult to cure.
Your servant now summons the six paths and four modes of birth, the multitude of solitary souls and stagnant po.
Deeply concerned that in life they harbored vain desires, pursued greed and craving from past lives,
were entangled in cleverness and scheming, bound by profit and fame,
their spirits depleted, essence scattered, qi exhausted, and forms withered.
In life, they were assailed by suffering and disease; in death, their souls continue to bear affliction.
Moreover, there are all those who perished from injury or untimely death—though they became luminous ghosts,
they moan day and night.
Their souls sink in obscurity; their po stagnate in deluge.
Without deliverance through salvation, they can scarcely approach the Dharma assembly.
In reverent accord with the Dao’s compassion and the ritual’s provisions for healing,
your servant humbly invokes the ranked officials of the Celestial Bureau of Medicine and the immortal attendants of medicinal treatment.
From the Phoenix Palace, gather the Five-Colored Divine Medicines of Great Purity,
dispense them to the deceased souls, and heal all their ailments from life, treating each according to its kind.
The Wood Official disperses medicine; the Fire Official presides over moxibustion;
the Metal Official wields the needle; the Water Official administers decoctions;
the Earth Official compounds remedies.
The Medical Officials of the Five Offices unite in purpose and wholehearted effort to restore nature and completeness.
If there are those afflicted with contractures, paralysis, or lameness, summon the Divine Generals of Acupuncture and Moxibustion to treat them.
If there are those with sores, abscesses, or purulent blood diseases, summon the Envoys of External Medicine to treat them.
If there are those who died mute or with terminal illnesses, summon the Heavenly Physicians of Revivification to treat them."

chunks.original_text: 或证候不明而死者，请拯候功曹治之。 或胎产横死者，请玉仙圣母治之。 或惊悸霍乱而死者，请安魂定魄童子治之。 或饮药食毒而死者，请续命放生真人治之。 或患伤寒时气而死者，请发汗神将治之。 或首体不完而死者，请续头功曹治之。 或身状不完而死者，请聚形功曹治之。 或肢体不具而死者，请返魂功曹治之。 或丧乱真炁而死者，请全形聚炁功曹治之。 其余该说不尽者，请列职仙真，察证候而治之。 俾令首断为续，筋断为联，骨伤为补，身碎为全，水腹为去，缢缚为释，柳锁为脱，泥沙为除，虫癞为剥，脓血为净，胎孕为下，蓐损为育，仇雠为解，执对为和，盲者开视，聋者发聪，哑者能言，跛者能履，挛者能伸，悲辛恼乱者应时解释，饮渴焦劳者即得清凉，胞胎散滞者结节疏通，炁体平安，形神整具，克期超化，受炼更生。 臣干冒圣威，无任恳祷之至，谨言。 五帝全形符 青帝护魂符卯文，红杏九声 咒曰 太华木司，九炁元君。 闭固神炁，青色周溢。 色自初胎，息经千息。 青色俱充，内自凝结。 急急如上帝勑。 右符东方青炁九道入口，运肝炁相合，自左目嘘出，弹诀，存木官降药，拯疗众魂。 白帝侍魄符酉文，磨真七声 咒曰 金华金生，七炁老君。 西方庚辛，太微玄真。 内应六府，化为肺神。 见於无上，游於丹田。 先护我命，用之必仙。 急急如上帝勑。 右存西方白炁七道入口，肺经白炁相交，自鼻呬出，弹诀，金官持针疗魂。 赤帝养炁符午文，袜腊三声 咒曰 衡霍火官，三炁元君。 南方丙丁，赤龙君停。 阴神避位，阳官下迎。 思之必至，用之必灵。 急急如上帝勑。 右存南方赤炁三道入口，运心炁相交，呵出，弹诀，火官灼艾，拯疗众魂。 黑帝通血符子文，墨黑五道 咒曰 恒山水帝，五炁元君。 乾坤妙用，阴阳降升。 周运昆仑，炁返周天。 超凡入圣，莫非炁神。 出入玄牝，往来变形。 五藏欲见，黑色通灵。 金木间隔，阴阳混成，急急如上帝勑。 右存北方黑炁五道入口，运肾炁相交，吹出，弹诀，水官煮汤，拯疗亡魂。 黄帝中主万神无越符 玉诀，灵宝十二声。 咒曰 一炁天君，嵩山土帝。 中央戊己，内藏元炁。 黄色力坚，运之可治。 丹阳莫辞，朱书共仪。 得达四肢，黄云大起。 急急如上帝勑。 右符存中央黄炁十二道入口，运脾炁相交，呼出，弹诀，土官和剂，拯疗亡魂。 各方中金童玉女，拥辅五帝，握三涂五苦诀。 念后咒七遍。 金城孕秀，玉洞凝神。 真气内养，以成真人。 今日受炼，上登朱陵。 魂魄受炼，与日同明。 急急如上帝勑。 五帝全形升度符 聚魂复形全体咒 兴生卯，独隶辰，可韩己。 兴生转下辰，独隶迁卯，可韩明寅，功都成，切角正。 聚魂对魂摄寅至己出。 灌溉飞魂魄，今复见全形。 急急如上帝勑。 太一返真符中文祖炁 咒曰 一生万化，运行不息。 玄机自然，纪度潜历。 虚景合明，妙宗湛寂。 有无二致，咸契中极。 急急如律令。 引五炁入符，存五炁归一作用。 玄元始炁咒 玄元始炁，二孕有三元。 胚胎肇始，二景回旋。 阴阳蕴秀，凝结胞元。 形容世壤，积业无边。 五宫六府，结塞三田。 百关九窍，累滓成愆。 形消炁散，魂击九泉。 随魂受疾，求脱何缘。 天医尚药，拯疗痾缠。 首断为续，筋断为联。

For those who died with unclear symptoms, summon the Attendant of Diagnostic Restoration to treat them.
For those who died in childbirth or miscarriage, summon the Jade Immortal Holy Mother to treat them.
For those who died of fright, palpitations, or cholera, summon the Youths of Soul-Calming and Spirit-Stabilizing to treat them.
For those who died from consuming poisoned medicine or food, summon the Perfected of Life-Extension and Life-Liberation to treat them.
For those who died of cold damage or seasonal qi, summon the Divine Generals of Sweat-Induction to treat them.
For those who died with incomplete heads, summon the Attendant of Head-Restoration to treat them.
For those who died with incomplete bodies, summon the Attendant of Form-Gathering to treat them.
For those who died with missing limbs, summon the Attendant of Soul-Returning to treat them.
For those who died with lost primordial qi, summon the Attendant of Form-Completion and Qi-Gathering to treat them.
For all other conditions too numerous to mention, summon the ranked immortals and perfected to examine the symptoms and administer treatment.

Thus shall severed heads be rejoined, severed sinews be reconnected, broken bones be mended, shattered bodies be made whole, watery distension be dispelled, hangings be loosened, mud and sand be cleared, leprous worms be shed, pus and blood be purified, fetuses be delivered, birth injuries be healed, enmities be resolved, disputes be reconciled, the blind regain sight, the deaf regain hearing, the mute speak, the lame walk, the contracted stretch, sorrow and distress be instantly dispelled, thirst and exhaustion be quenched with coolness, scattered or obstructed wombs be unknotted and freed. May their qi and bodies be at peace, their forms and spirits complete, and may they swiftly transcend and be refined, reborn anew.

Your servant, with utmost reverence and trepidation before your sacred might, offers this earnest prayer.

**Five Emperors’ Complete Form Talisman**

*Green Emperor’s Soul-Protecting Talisman* (卯 script, nine chants of "red apricot")
**Incantation:**
Supreme Flower Wood Controller,
Nine Qi Primordial Sovereign.
Seal and secure the spirit-qi,
Green hue pervades all around.
From the first breath of the embryo,
Through a thousand cycles of breath.
Green hue fills all within,
Naturally congealing inside.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor decrees.

The talisman’s nine green qi streams enter the mouth; circulate liver qi to harmonize, exhale through the left eye, flick the mudra, and visualize the Wood Official descending medicine to heal the multitude of souls.

*White Emperor’s Spirit-Guarding Talisman* (酉 script, seven chants of "grinding truth")
**Incantation:**
Golden Flower, Gold’s Birth,
Seven Qi Venerable Sovereign.
Western Metal, Geng and Xin,
Supreme Mystery’s Dark Perfection.
Internally corresponding to the six palaces,
Transforming into the lung spirit.
Manifesting in the supreme,
Roaming the cinnabar field.
First protect my life,
Use it and you shall attain immortality.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor decrees.

Store seven white qi streams from the West in the mouth; lung meridian’s white qi intermingles, exhale through the nose, flick the mudra, and visualize the Metal Official wielding the needle to heal the souls.

*Red Emperor’s Qi-Nurturing Talisman* (午 script, three chants of "sandalwood")
**Incantation:**
Heng and Huo Fire Officials,
Three Qi Primordial Sovereign.
Southern Fire, Bing and Ding,
Red Dragon Lord abides.
Yin spirits yield their place,
Yang officials descend to welcome.
Focus your thought and it shall arrive,
Use it and it shall be efficacious.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor decrees.

Store three red qi streams from the South in the mouth; circulate heart qi to harmonize, exhale with a *he* sound, flick the mudra, and visualize the Fire Official applying moxa to heal the multitude of souls.

*Black Emperor’s Blood-Unblocking Talisman* (子 script, five black streams)
**Incantation:**
Heng Mountain’s Water Emperor,
Five Qi Primordial Sovereign.
Mysterious workings of Heaven and Earth,
Yin and yang ascend and descend.
Circulating through Kunlun,
Qi returns to the celestial cycle.
Transcending the mundane to enter sageliness,
None but qi and spirit.
Entering and exiting the mysterious female,
Transforming through coming and going.
The five viscera desire to appear,
Black hue communicates with the numinous.
Metal and wood alternate,
Yin and yang blend into oneness.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor decrees.

Store five black qi streams from the North in the mouth; circulate kidney qi to harmonize, exhale with a *chui* sound, flick the mudra, and visualize the Water Official brewing decoctions to heal the departed souls.

*Yellow Emperor’s Central Controller of Myriad Spirits Talisman* (Jade mudra, twelve chants of "spiritual treasure")
**Incantation:**
One Qi Heavenly Sovereign,
Song Mountain’s Earth Emperor.
Central Earth, Wu and Ji,
Internally storing primordial qi.
Yellow hue’s strength is firm,
Circulate it and it can heal.
Cinnabar yang does not refuse,
Vermilion script shares the ritual.
Reaching the four limbs,
Great yellow clouds arise.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor decrees.

Store twelve yellow qi streams from the Center in the mouth; circulate spleen qi to harmonize, exhale with a *hu* sound, flick the mudra, and visualize the Earth Official compounding remedies to heal the departed souls.

From each direction, golden youths and jade maidens attend the Five Emperors, grasping the Three Paths and Five Sufferings mudras.

Recite the following incantation seven times:
Golden city nurtures elegance,
Jade cavern congeals spirit.
True qi nurtures within,
To become a perfected person.
Today receive refinement,
Ascend to Vermilion Numinous Terrace.
Soul and spirit receive refinement,
Shining with the sun’s brilliance.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor decrees.

**Five Emperors’ Complete Form Ascension Talisman**
**Gathering Souls and Restoring Form Complete Body Incantation**
Rise at *mao*, alone at *chen*, *ke han ji*.
Rise and turn downward at *chen*, alone ascend to *mao*, *ke han ming yin*, *gong du cheng*, *qie jiao zheng*.
Gather soul, face soul, capture from *yin* to *ji* and emerge.
Irrigate and fly soul and spirit,
Now restore and see the complete form.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor decrees.

**Great One’s Return to True Talisman** (Central script, ancestral qi)
**Incantation:**
One gives birth to myriad transformations,
Circulating without cease.
Mysterious mechanism natural,
Silently passing through the celestial reckoning.
Empty scene merges with brightness,
Subtle origin profound and still.
Existence and non-existence twofold,
All accord with the central ultimate.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands.

Guide the five qi into the talisman, visualize the five qi merging into one for activation.

**Primordial Qi Incantation**
Primordial primordial qi,
Two gestate to form the Three Origins.
Embryo and womb begin,
Two luminaries revolve.
Yin and yang nurture elegance,
Congealing the primordial womb.
Form and appearance worldly dust,
Accumulated karma boundless.
Five palaces and six viscera,
Obstructing the three fields.
Hundred joints and nine orifices,
Accumulated impurities become transgressions.
Form dissipates, qi scatters,
Soul struck in the nine springs.
Following the soul to receive illness,
How can liberation be sought?
Heavenly physicians and superior medicines,
Heal and treat afflictions.
Severed heads rejoined,
Severed sinews reconnected.

fficials of the Five Offices unite in purpose and wholehearted effort to restore nature and completeness.
If there are those afflicted with contractures, paralysis, or lameness, summon the Divine Generals of Acupuncture and Moxibustion to treat them.
If there are those with sores, abscesses, or purulent blood diseases, summon the Envoys of External Medicine to treat them.
If there are those who died mute or with terminal illnesses, summon the Heavenly Physicians of Revivification to treat them."

chunks.original_text: 虫癞为剥，水腹为宽。 胎留为下，孕育发生。 拳挛伸缩，喑哑能言。 手足不具，俱得完全。 盲聋相听，颠狂复完。 老者返壮，执对和冤。 饥馑充实，沉痾悉蠲。 风劳冻绝，咸得医痊。 魄户闭关，魂门炼仙，与道合真。 灵宝聚形返真符 聚形 咒曰 红杏持到卯，墨黑庚同子。 磨真计力酉，袜臈聚成午。 灵宝万物中，消利六合。 正一成法，知一可具。 取驿令下摄。 六合诀，逐方炁吹弹。 通流五炁落灭恶根咒 红杏持左，瘫挛者伸。 震。 墨黑尚上，耳目聪明。 坎。 磨真佑右，缓废者平。 兑。 腊袜下下，跛愈起行。 离。 灵宝冲中，身强体轻。 中。 青帝护魂，肝木长荣。 卯。 赤帝养炁，心火光亨。 午。 白帝侍魄，肺金生成。 酉。 黑帝通血，肾水清停。 子。 黄帝中主，脾土安宁。 中。 梵炁弥罗，自然成真。 中指中，午炁。 回尸起死，白骨成人。 子至亥，天门炁。 济度垂死，绝而得生。 坎至离火炁。 九和十合，变化上清。 急急如律令。 向来所召灵官功曹，天医圣众。 奉为亡灵，全形复体，一一如法。 莫不体乾坤造化之功，运阴阳和合之数，密行匹配，靡有乖违。 尚虑亡人相貌虽全，形神未净，更为汝等，念玉清神霄太一含阴育阳神咒。 咒见科范门 洒净，引魂赴室。 人间不洁世物膻腥，伏此妙音，悉令清净。 臣谨重诚，上启神农皇帝，天医圣贤，列幕高真，承行官吏，仰蒙拯济，皆得生全，无任瞻依，谨当奉送。 如寻常斋醮，止用前三幕拯疗符法。 如普度大斋，必须用后敷化门符法。 灵宝玉鉴卷之三十四竟 灵宝玉鉴卷之三十五

Leprosy shall be flayed, bloated bellies shall shrink. Retained fetuses shall descend, gestation shall commence. Contracted limbs shall stretch, the mute shall speak. Missing hands and feet shall be made whole. The blind and deaf shall perceive each other, the mad shall be restored. The aged shall regain youth, grievances shall be reconciled. Famine shall be sated, chronic ailments shall vanish. Wind-consumption and frostbite shall be cured, all shall be healed.

The gate of the *po* shall close, the portal of the *hun* shall refine the immortal—uniting with the Dao to attain truth.

**Talisman of the Numinous Treasure for Gathering Form and Returning to Truth**
*Gathering Form*

**Incantation**
Red apricot arrives at *mao*,
Ink-black *geng* joins *zi*.
Grind true strength at *you*,
Socks and wax gather at *wu*.
Within the Numinous Treasure of all things,
Dissolve and benefit the Six Harmonies.
The Orthodox Unity achieves the law,
Knowing the One suffices all.
Summon the post-horses to descend and seize.

**Six Harmonies Formula**: Blow and flick the qi in each direction.

**Incantation for Flowing Through the Five Qi and Eradicating Evil Roots**
Red apricot to the left—paralysis shall stretch. *Zhen*.
Ink-black above—ears and eyes shall be keen. *Kan*.
Grind true to the right—withered limbs shall be steady. *Dui*.
Wax socks below—lameness shall rise and walk. *Li*.
Numinous Treasure surges within—body strong, form light. *Center*.
Azure Emperor guards the *hun*—liver wood flourishes. *Mao*.
Vermilion Emperor nurtures qi—heart fire radiates. *Wu*.
White Emperor attends the *po*—lung metal thrives. *You*.
Black Emperor purifies blood—kidney water flows clear. *Zi*.
Yellow Emperor rules the center—spleen earth rests in peace. *Center*.
Brahmā qi pervades the cosmos—naturally attaining truth.
Middle finger to center—*wu* qi.
Revive the corpse, raise the dead—white bones become flesh.
*Zi* to *hai*—qi of the Celestial Gate.
Save the dying, restore the perished—severed life renewed.
*Kan* to *li*—fire qi.
Nine harmonies, ten unions—transform into Supreme Clarity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands.

The previously summoned spirit officials, functionaries, and celestial physicians—on behalf of the departed soul, restore form and reconstitute the body, each according to the method. None shall fail to embody the creative power of Heaven and Earth, enact the harmony of yin and yang, and secretly align their pairing without deviation.

Yet fearing the departed’s appearance, though whole, remains impure in form and spirit, we now recite for you the **Jade Clarity Divine Empyrean Great Unity Yin-Nurturing Yang Spirit Incantation** (see the *Kefan* section). Sprinkle and purify, guide the soul to the chamber. The filth of the mundane world—foul and rank—shall be cleansed by this wondrous sound.

With utmost sincerity, I reverently invoke the Divine Farmer Emperor, the Celestial Physicians, the sages of the healing arts, the exalted perfected of the high curtains, and the attending officials. Through your aid, all shall be preserved in life, and I, unworthy, shall gaze upon you in devotion. I now respectfully send you forth.

For ordinary fasts and offerings, the preceding three talismanic healing methods suffice. For grand universal deliverance rites, the later *Fuhua* talismanic methods must be employed.

*Lingbao Yujian*, Scroll Thirty-Four—concluded.

chunks.original_text: 敷化解释门 普度大斋用 追负财欠命冤结不解幽魂符 咒曰 灵宝垂慈，追度幽魂。 解除冤结，削罪北冥。 真符和释，超入朱陵。 急急如律令。 追仇雠执对幽魂符 咒曰 阴灵阴灵，执对寒庭。 宿世冤雠，负冤幽冥。 累劫无化，伸告难平。 真符超济，和释上生。 急急如律令。 追衔冤负债累劫相缠幽魂符 咒曰 灵宝真符，降付幽都，解释缠对，消却黑书。 帝勑到处，狱吏听符，急急如律令。 追被系牢狱死魂符 咒曰 灵符普告，升济幽冥。 诸狱囚魂，各释消冰。 冤随善念，业报分轻。 慈尊救苦，悉消雪扃。 急急如律令。 追僧道师尼亡魂符 咒曰 灵宝委文，迁拔慈魂。 下降幽户，上度仪神。 解除宿业，削退魔群。 慈魂升度｀炼质朱陵。 神皈太阳，道德自生。 急急如律令。 追奴婢横亡符 咒曰 玉清宝笈文，追度横亡魂。 开度长夜府，升济九幽沉。 真符罢执对，和顺出幽冥。 急急如律令。 召五岳吏兵追咒咀亡魂符 咒曰 五极灵章，下至酆。 五岳神吏，追取亡魂。 解释和顺，递相为良。 咒咀消荡，同升天堂。 岳庭将吏，承符寻访。 急急如律令。 和释咒咀上升符 咒曰 玉清降符命，颁付九幽行。 拔救执滞魄，济度咒咀魂。 承符各和顺，为友结为朋。 消除负衔语，升济入天门。 急急如律令。 追犯王法死魂符 咒曰 灵宝真符，颁降幽冥。 犯法滞魄，执对寒庭。 衔冤负债，解释无门。 准今符命，释对超生。 同为善友，炼质朱陵。 急急如律令。 追盗贼杀害身亡符 咒曰 灵符降下，遍告冥途。 穿窬夜魄，被害之徒。 冤冤报对，劫劫相呼。 准今符命，超度南都。 形体完全，快乐无为。 急急如律令。 追飘沉大悔幽魂符 咒曰 元始降符命，大法济飘沉。 升度长夜符，开度受生魂。 急急如律令。 追虎狼虫蛇所害亡魂符 咒曰 灵宝符命，开度幽阴。 虎狼丧魄，来诣家庭。 宿缘罢对，积债消轻。 准今符命，升度朱陵。 急急如律令。 追末学道浅亡魂符 咒曰 玉清宝箓，降付幽关。 地狱摧毁，铁城开宣。 末学亡者，使令神全。 准今符命，再及人天。 修心不退，道备升天。 急急如律令。 追被庙神摄丧符 咒曰 灵宝符命，急降庙庭。 搜寻横丧，来诣家庭。 庙神藏匿，束送酆城。 检此律令，灭亡其形。 放出魂魄，炼质朱陵。 魂神变炼，受化更生。 急急如律令 追因水火丧亡符 咒曰 灵宾真符，下拔冥途。 水火焚溺，魂魄昭苏。 形神罢苦，浄魄还故。 准今符命，速离幽途。 炼质朱府，上生南都。 急急如律令。 追为商仕路身亡符 咒曰 太上宝箓，玉篆灵章。 起度官贾，拔出地厢。 狱户罢对，关锁开张。 炼神受炼，升度太阳。 急急如律令。 追冻馁流离亡魂符 咒曰 玉清真符，颁绛三途。 冻饥滞魄，散荡枵虚。 赐之灵篆，超出冥途。 各生饱腹，骨肉昭苏。 炼质朱府，升上南都。 急急如律令。 追诸军阵斗亡符 咒曰 太白运行，太一运兵。 下临分野，照彼诸军。 对敌身没、魂魄幽迷。 真符降下，罢对削威。 和为师友，升度太微。 急急如律令。 度婴童在幼身亡未解脱符 咒曰 灵宝大慈尊，升度幼亡魂。 超度三界难，托仙贵人身。 解释前缘债，变炼化成真急急如上帝律令。 解释自缢魂符 咒曰 滞魄灵灵，上应天庭。 冤缢自害，身没幽幽溟。 准此符命，和释超升。 急急如律令。 度杀伤死魂符 咒曰 帝君有命，解释前非。
