chunks.original_text: 东井灌黄华，石景水母晶。 浣魄净阴质，荡形成玉婴。 表里莹通彻，内外光华清。 灵元神不迈，正炁合仙真。 金童散紫烟，玉女麾琼英。 五芽分五炁，三素耀三云。 郁仪缠结璘，饮之复完形。 本化返生景，炼形朝玉京。 和与道合真。 玉液炼形符玉诀 咒曰 玉液炼形，金马驿程。 上下水火，森罗净霐。 元范恢漠，幽寂度人。 受炼无穷，为道至真。 三光降合，五炁会神。 太上符命，六丁潜灵。 紫虚郁秀，行符玉京。 急急如律令。 咽液一口，入玉堂宫，存体生玉光，照明内外。 洞阳丹炼飞神八景之道 每日六阳时，入室端坐，叩齿三通，闭息静坐，存下丹田火如弹丸，左右各九转，升绛宫，渐升十二重楼，登玉房泥丸宫，化为一天尊，左手执日，手执月，号大洞帝一。 咒曰 魂神澄正，万炁长存。 不经苦恼，身有光明。 三界侍卫，五帝司迎。 万神朝礼，名书上天。 功满德就，飞升上清。 右咒三遍，咽液三过，良久项生图象，光映十方。 祝曰： 无上玄元，太上道君。 当召臣身三炁正神，太乙司命，桃康合延，无英公子，白元神尊神，臣今内炼真元，光映九天，豁荡阳精，洞映九门，即使死魂受炼，返胎更生，形神俱妙，与道合真。 引火炁九口咽之，测神光自见，洞照幽冥。 右前工夫存用，平日圆熟。 临炼度时，以青碧纸，阔四寸五分，高五寸五分，用雄黄朱砂调匀，篆后符一道。 至水炼内沉於水池中，至火炼后，将此符於水中移过，火沼中烧。 众念龙汉荡荡咒，高功洒水用。 黄炁阳晶符 太阳炁诀，吸紫黄炁书符。 密咒曰 阳藏阴生，二炁交周。 天地混合，三五应符。 服御黄华，灵降我躯。 长享景炁，与神同符。 沐浴九玄，骖驾飞浮。 急急如元始上帝勑。 平坐，定息，行回紫抱黄之道，如天地未分之前。 用时鼻引清炁，合泥丸青炁，次下合黄庭金色，次入下丹田。 聚白炁，混三色，为神丹。 透尾闾，过夹脊，升泥丸，自顶门迸出，金光道炁，遍满太虚。 中有元始天尊，在空玄之中，日月星辰，洞明天地。 右符作用，引左肾炁过肺，自右目出，合天中太阴白光十芒，照耀洞明，吸入符，写朒字於西边月上，引笔下天字上，化作流汨池，内写□字，本咒。 引右肾炁过肝，自左目出，合天中太阳紫光九芒，照耀洞明，吸入符，写晅字於东边日上，引笔下天字上，一化为流火底，内写□字，本咒。 引心炁混黄，归下丹田，过尾闾穴，透上泥丸宫，自顶门出，合天中北斗柄前星红光紫炁，一团照耀洞明，吸入符，写炓字於日月之中，念本咒、金光咒，一遍。 存三十二天十方天尊，监度众真，俱乘金光，列侍元始。 盖我之本来真性，即是法身。 中间书 ，取五方炁五帝讳盖之。 次书唵吽咤哩，以勑字盖之。 先念无上玄元太上道君咒。 在前 随意祝事，摄亡姓名於内，运笔，想天男天女形神俱妙。 次念： 以神合炁，以炁炼身。 五脏六腑，真炁自生。 吾今炼汝，返胎育婴。 急急如律令。 郁仪结璘，水火合形。 阴阳孕结，速睹光明。 存主水大将军，引魂入池受炼，即左天字中，曳笔过於此，中念 北方之君咒。 在前水炼符后 右吸月华光炁於水中，如瑠璃映出婴儿。 数念 龙汉荡荡咒，其魂渐渐莹洁。 高功再祝，将吏引魂火炼，存主火大将军。
chunks.translated_text:
「Eternal Refining and Rebirth Talisman (续)»

**East Well Irrigating the Yellow Flower, Stone Vision and Water Mother’s Essence,**
Wash the **pò** (spirits) to purify the Yin essence,
Agitate the form to become the Jade Infant.
Surface and core radiantly transparent,
Inner and outer luminous and clear.
The **língyuán** (numinous essence) and spirit do not stray,
The **zhèngqì** (true *qi*) merges with the **xiānzhēn** (immortal verity).
The **Jīntóng** (Golden Boy) scatters purple mist,
The **Yùnǚ** (Jade Girl) waves with crystal blossoms.
Five **yá** (buds) divide into Five **qì**,
Three **sù** (substances) radiate in Three **yún** (clouds).
The **yùyí** (jade liquid) binds and refines the **lún** (wheel),
Drink it to restore the complete form.
Returning to the original **huà** (transformation) and rebirth’s vision,
Refining the form to face the **Yùjīng** (Jade Capital).
Harmonizing with the **Dao** (Way) and true verity.

**Jade Liquid Refining the Form Talisman (玉诀)**
**Incantation:**
Jade Liquid Refining the Form,
Golden Horse Relay Path.
Above and below, Water and Fire,
Forest of Spirits cleansed by the **qì** of the **Xī** (洗, ablution).
The **yuánfàn** (primordial range) vast and boundless,
The **yōuyì** (profound seclusion) tranquil, guiding mortals.
Enduring refining without limit,
For the **Dao** (Way)—the utmost truth.
Three Lights descend and merge,
Five **qì** converge to form the spirit.
The **Tàishàng Fúmìng** (Supreme Talisman Command),
Six **Dīng** (六丁, six divine attendants) conceal the numinous.
The **Zǐxū** (紫虚, purple void) exudes luster,
The talisman moves toward the **Yùjīng** (Jade Capital).
*Jíjí rúlǜlìng.*

**Recitation:**
Swallow the saliva once,
Enter the **Yùtáng Gōng** (玉堂宫, Jade Hall Palace),
Preserve the body to generate the Jade Light,
Illuminating the inner and outer.

**The Dao of Refining the Elixir and Ascending the Eight Sceneries (飞神)**
During the six **Yáng** (阳, Yang) hours each day,
Enter the chamber and sit upright,
Knock teeth three times,
Close breath and sit still,
Preserve the **Dāntián** (丹田, elixir field) fire like a pellet,
Nine revolutions on each side,
Ascend to the **Jiànggōng** (绛宫, Vermilion Palace),
Gradually ascending twelve-layered towers,
Reaching the **Yùfáng Níhuáng Gōng** (玉房泥丸宫, Jade Chamber Palace of the Mud Pellet),
Transforming into the **Yītiān Zūn** (一天尊, One-Heaven Venerable),
Left hand grasping the Sun, right hand holding the Moon,
Proclaiming the **Dà Dòng Dì Yī** (大洞帝一, Great Cavern Sovereign One).
**Incantation:**
The **húnshén** (soul-spirit) clears and rectifies,
Ten thousand **qì** eternally preserved.
No suffering or torment endured,
The body radiant with light.
The Three Realms attend in guard,
The Five Emperors oversee the welcome.
Ten thousand spirits pay homage,
Their names inscribed in Heaven.
When virtue is complete and power attained,
Ascend to the **Shàngqīng** (上清, Upper Purity).
Recite this incantation three times,
Swallow the saliva three passes,
After a while, the image of the **túxiàng** (图象, divine diagram) emerges at the nape,
Its light shines across the ten directions.
Invoke:
The **Wúshàng Xuányuán** (无上玄元, Peerless Primordial),
The **Tàishàng Dàojūn** (太上道君, Supreme Way Sovereign).
Now summon my body’s Three **qì** and true spirit,
The **Tàiyǐ Sīmìng** (太乙司命, Grand Ethereal Overseer of Fate),
**Táokāng Héyán** (桃康合延, Peach and Immortality united),
**Wúyīng Gōngzǐ** (无英公子, Peerless Noble Son),
**Bái Yuánshén Zūn** (白元神尊, White Primordial Spirit Venerable),
I now refine the **zhēnyuán** (真元, true essence) within,
Its light illuminating the Nine Heavens,
Dispelling the **Yángjīng** (阳精, yang essence),
Piercing the Nine Gates,
Thus the departed soul receives refining,
Returns to the womb and is reborn,
Form and spirit both perfected,
Harmonizing with the **Dao** (Way) and true verity.
Draw the fire-*qi* through nine mouths to swallow,
The spirit’s light appears measured,
Piercingly illuminating the **Yōumíng** (幽冥, dark realm).
This preceding practice is preserved and applied,
Daily perfected in tranquility.
At the time of refining and guiding,
Use **qīngbì** (青碧, verdant-blue) paper,
Four inches and five *fēn* (分) wide,
Five inches and five *fēn* high,
Mix **xiónghuáng** (雄黄, realgar) and **zhūshā** (朱砂, cinnabar) evenly,
Inscribe the **hòufú** (后符, posterior talisman) with one stroke.

For **Water Refining**, immerse it in the water pool,
For **Fire Refining**, burn it in the fire cauldron.
All recite the **Lónghàn Dàngdàng** (龙汉荡荡) incantation,
The High Master sprinkles water for its efficacy.

**Yellow Qi and Yang Essence Talisman (符)**
**Golden Horse Relay Dao (诀)**
Absorb the **Zǐhuáng qì** (紫黄炁, purple-yellow *qi*) and inscribe the talisman.
**Secret Incantation:**
Yang conceals, Yin generates,
The Two **qì** intermingle cyclically.
Heaven and Earth blend in unity,
The Three and Five correspond to the talisman.
Wearing and governing the Yellow Flower,
The numinous descends into my body.
Long enjoying the **Jǐng qì** (景炁, luminous *qi*),
My spirit harmonizes with the talisman.
Bathing in the Nine **Xuán** (玄, profound),
Driven by the **Jīng** (驾, chariot) to ascend.
*Jíjí rúlǜlìng.*

Sitting upright, steadying breath,
Practice the **Zǐbào Huáng** (紫抱黄, purple-embrace-yellow) Dao,
As before Heaven and Earth were divided.
When used, draw the **Qīng qì** (清炁, pure *qi*) through the nose,
Merge with the **Dàntián** (丹田, elixir field) **Qīng qì** (青炁, blue *qi*),
Next descend to the **Huángtíng** (黄庭, Yellow Hall) **Jīn sè** (金色, golden hue),
Then enter the **Dàntián** (下丹田, lower elixir field).
Gather the **Bái qì** (白炁, white *qi*),
Blend the Three Colors,
Forming the **shén dān** (神丹, spirit elixir).
Piercing the **Wěilǘ** (尾闾, tail sluice),
Passing the **Jiājǐ** (夹脊, spinal gap),
Ascending the **Dàntián** (泥丸, mud pellet),
Emerging from the **Dǐngmén** (顶门, crown gate),
The **Jīnguāng Dàodé** (金光道炁, golden luminous *qi*) fills the **Tàixū** (太虚, Great Void).
Within is the **Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn** (元始天尊, Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable),
Residing in the **Kōngxuān** (空玄, empty profundity),
The Sun, Moon, stars, and constellations,
Piercingly illuminating Heaven and Earth.

This talisman’s use:
Draw the **qì** from the left **shèn** (肾, kidney) through the **fèi** (肺, lungs),
Emerging from the right eye,
Merging with the **Tàiyīn** (太阴, Great Yin) **Bái guāng** (白光, white light) of the **Shì** (十芒, ten rays),
Illuminating and piercingly clear,
Draw it in and inscribe the talisman,
Write the **□** (朒, *omission*) character on the western Moon,
Draw the pen downward to the **tiān** (天, Heaven) character above,
Transforming into a **Liúmìchí** (流汨池, flowing pool),
Within write the **□** (□, *omission*) character,
Recite the original incantation.

Draw the **qì** from the right **shèn** (肾, kidney) through the **gān** (肝, liver),
Emerging from the left eye,
Merging with the **Tàiyáng** (太阳, Great Sun) **Zǐ guāng** (紫光, purple light) of the **Jiǔ kuàng** (九芒, nine rays),
Illuminating and piercingly clear,
Draw it in and inscribe the talisman,
Write the **□** (晅, *omission*) character on the eastern Sun,
Draw the pen downward to the **tiān** (天, Heaven) character above,
Transforming into a **Liúhuǒdǐ** (流火底, flowing fire base),
Within write the **□** (□, *omission*) character,
Recite the original incantation.

Draw the **qì** from the **xīn** (心, heart) to blend with Yellow,
Returning to the **Dàntián** (下丹田, lower elixir field),
Passing the **Wěilǘ** (尾闾穴, tail sluice orifice),
Piercing the **Shàngníhuáng Gōng** (上泥丸宫, upper mud pellet palace),
Emerging from the **Dǐngmén** (顶门, crown gate),
Merging with the **Tàiyīn** (天中, Heaven’s center) **Běidǒu Bǐng** (北斗柄前星, stars before the Dipper’s handle) **Hóng guāng** (红光, red light) and **Zǐ qì** (紫炁, purple *qi*),
A radiant cluster illuminating and piercingly clear,
Draw it in and inscribe the talisman,
Write the **□** (炓, *omission*) character between the Sun and Moon,
Recite the original incantation and **Jīnguāng** (金光, Golden Light) incantation,
One pass.

Preserve the **Sānshíèr Tiān** (三十二天, Thirty-Two Heavens) and the **Shífāng Tiānzūn** (十方天尊, Ten-Directional Heavenly Venerables),
Guiding and attending the myriad **zhēn** (真, true ones),
All riding the **Jīnguāng** (金光, Golden Light),
Assembling to serve the **Yuánshǐ** (元始, Primordial Beginning).
My original true nature is indeed the **Fǎshēn** (法身, Dharma Body).
Between, inscribe **□** (□, *omission*).
Take the **Wǔfāng qì** (五方炁, five-directional *qi*) and the **Wǔdì huì** (五帝讳, taboo names of the Five Emperors) to inscribe over it.
Next inscribe **Om Man Padme Hum** (唵吽咤哩),
Using the **Chì** (勑, command) character to cover it.
First recite the **Wúshàng Xuányuán Tàishàng Dàojūn** (无上玄元太上道君) incantation.

Before this,
At will, invoke matters,
Gather the departed’s name within,
Wield the pen,
Imagine the divine male and female of Heaven—form and spirit both perfected.
Next recite:
With spirit merging into *qi*,
With *qi* refining the body.
The Five **Zàng** (脏, viscera) and Six **Fǔ** (腑, bowels),
True *qi* spontaneously generated.
I now refine you,
Returning to the womb and nurturing the infant.
*Jíjí rúlǜlìng.*

The **Yùyí** (郁仪) binds and refines,
Water and Fire merge the form.
Yin and Yang conceive and bind,
Swiftly behold the radiant light.
Preserve the **Shuǐ Dàjiāngjūn** (主水大将军, Commander of Water),
Draw the soul into the pool for refining,
In the left **Tiānzì** (天字, Heaven character),
Drag the pen across it,
Within recite the **Běifāng Zhījūn** (北方之君, Sovereign of the Northern Quarter) incantation.

After this,
Draw the **Yuèhuá guāng qì** (月华光炁, Moon’s Radiance and Luminous *qi*) from the water,
Like **liúlí** (瑠璃, crystal) reflecting the infant.
Repeatedly recite the **Lónghàn Dàngdàng** incantation,
The soul gradually becomes radiant and pure.
The High Master invokes again,
Summoning the **Yīngshì** (将吏, officers) to refine the soul’s fire,
Preserve the **Huǒ Dàjiāngjūn** (主火大将军, Commander of Fire).

chunks.translated_text:
「引魂入火沼受炼，即引右天罡字中，曳笔过於此，中念 **南方之君**咒。 在火炼符后 左手寅文，火炁引吹於火中，魂神澄正。
　　念 **龙汉荡荡**咒。 存众魂冉冉长大，具足形相，天衣飞坠。 众魂皆得服着。

　　次舌柱上腭，化为法桥，引魂随笔上升，至右天罡字涂上。
　　念： **元始符命**，时刻升迁。 亡魂受度，立便生天。

　　及三天讳四字，存金光中有朱陵火府，众魂皆升其中，咸得超生。

　　**灵宝玉鉴**卷之四十：**召主火大将军内炼符午文南炁**。
　　高功再入火炼科。 知磬举**玉眸炼质天尊**，谨召主火大将军赵仲明，速至坛所，合炁炼魂。
　　右神红袍金介，冑绿仙带，自南方乘云而至。

　　师吸炁归中，化作金**罡**字，以**阳斗诀**发此字於火沼中，光明洞焕，如天边晓日之状，受炼众魂，俱入日中，**玉眸炼质**。
　　咒曰：
　　**阳晶阴耀**，洞焕五行。
　　随符降炁，冶炼阴魂。
　　**知磬举玉眸炼质天尊**。

　　高功鸣召主火大将军，立降真火，冶炼亡魂。
　　**立降真火符** 右符寅加卯，卯交寅，风火交，午文，出南炁三息，存日中丹华金光，化为流火神庭，冶炼亡魂。
　　众和**玉眸炼质天尊**。
　　**宣主火咒**：
　　南方主火神，驾景掷火铃。
　　奔飞耀南枢，交炁媾生津。
　　炎晶流金光，冶炼阴死魂。
　　复归**元始炁**，再返天地根。
　　流金以减奸，邪秽悉然焚。
　　洞观无碍法，自得保真身。
　　**玉符召主将**，急急速来临。
　　**太玄妙炁**，主掌炎烟。
　　造化玄炉，**真魂陶埏**。
　　主火成胎，景象自然。
　　变炼阴户，准令上天。
　　急急如律令。

　　入火沼正炼，移婶於火沼边。
　　**火炼正符午文南炁** 咒曰：
　　**南阎洞浮**，流火之庭。
　　**玉眸诜诜**，流火之膏。
　　刀利禅猷，婆尼灵童。
　　流火之质，**玉眸真容**。
　　升入福堂，洞阳之宫。

　　**太阳火炼符午文离炁** 咒曰：
　　南方之君，**赤炁**之精。
　　荧惑使者，**丙丁将军**。
　　朱雀炎神，赫赫**阳晶**。
　　五行造化，万类发生。
　　天帝有勑，**光彻幽冥**。
　　急急如**太阳帝君**律令。

　　**火炼血尸符午文南炁** 咒曰：
　　**玉眸炼质**，拔度幽冥。
　　玉文一下，**炁魂飞升**。
　　**玉眸炼质符** 咒曰：

　　**太一炼质**，九步八魁。
　　行罡七转，**内外合成**。
　　三台子午，**绛宫受真**。
　　符炼万灵，**赤火降心**。
　　辟除恶毒，往来俱荣。
　　北都曲府，**离合上清**。
　　大洞自然，**风火无停**。
　　**日光炼神符太阳炁诀** 右符存合**童阳君**，日光紫色，叩齿二十四通。
　　咒曰：
　　**阳晶**已通，飞光已新。
　　皇芝流溢，**荫注内缠**。
　　仰餐流晶，**芳华未臻**。
　　宫宅开张，**荡洗嚣尘**。
　　体映玉光，**面发金真**。
　　云飞禹步，**上造日册**。
　　急急如**太阳帝君**律令勑。

　　**火九炼返生符** 九道 一符午文**日光** 咒曰：」

chunks.original_text: 真王元命，勑下九天。 火炼神魂，天一含生。 太阳洞照，体合自然。 急急如律令。 二符未文日光 咒曰 九天真景，元府炼魂。 火降帝勑，出离幽阴。 三炁合德，五纬回灵。 生尸铸魄，永劫无倾。 三符申文日光 咒曰 司命圣真，帝君受灵。 三皇有道，炼魄炼魂。 上生南斗，落死北陵。 真光焕发，面礼玉晨。 急急如律令。 四符酉文日光 咒曰 四象咸会，九阳生成。 太玄流光，日曜易形。 空乘太霞，受炼生神。 急急如律令。 五符戌文日光 咒曰 南宫流晶，真火变灵。 五行毕备，万象通明。 魂魄合炼，神化玉琼。 飘飘太霞，升入无形。 六符亥文日光 咒曰 皇天真命，九度元明。 上道玄育，阳和太灵。 六炁互发，速炼死魂。 神飞玄景，与道合并。 急急如律令。 七符子文日光 咒曰 取天地大化，七炁兆成。 三光返质，幽滞咸升，光达无垠。 急急如律令。 八符丑文日光 咒曰 灵宝符命，普化幽冥。 八景交映，反体轻清。 魂魄受炼，阴阳混凝。 解结散滞，十转回灵。 九符寅文日光 咒曰 九州统化，万象滋荣。 受炼太阳，魂净魄宁。 以道为体，与日同明。 高奔泥丸，升入帝庭。 急急如律令。 知磬举玉眸炼质天尊。 次举偈云： 南上朱陵府，丹天流火庭。 玉眸炼形质，魂魄即返生。 和玉眸炼质天尊。 火炼合同符 右符左手，自午顺巡至寅。 盖火炼九符，自午旺处，历未申至寅长生处，九位合同炼魂 咒曰 天帝命章，阳光日行。 璇玑运转，八极齐临。 合同大炼，玉眸上生。 急急如好生大帝律令力 火炼变仙符 午文，南炁。 存太肠流聂灌炼亡魂内合。 咒曰 火池炎精，炼质成真。 五脏经络，返生其身。 径升三天，面礼玉晨。 金液炼形符祖炁玉诀 右符咽液一口，过肺流金之乡，意纳中宫灌炼。 咒曰 金液炼形，与道合真。 开明三景，是为天根。 无幽无极，无始无终。 元皇九丑，灵魔绛宫。 紫炁飞天，身乘六龙。 水上火下，流入三宫。 神归阳明，大道自通。 急急如律令。 天罡玉字本咒诀 咒曰 罡星正炁，缠筋贯骨。 上透泥丸，开阳崷崒。 右符左手飞斗一座，杓指前光芒闪烁，即吸炁咽下元宫，过尾闾，上升迸顶门出，合炁书符，随斗所转，陶铸阴阳，万化莫能外此。 炼度时焚於聚炁炉中。 上清九斗阳芒火铃炎精真符太阳诀 先书南方朱陵帝君次书符於上。 咒曰 炎精二神，化身流火。 炼体变形，乘烟飞扬。 混合九炁，洞入火乡。 诛绝妖精，杀减不祥。 闻我火铃，魔鬼消亡。 按五合度，保命延昌。 上帝有勑，返形太阳。 急急如上帝勑。 祖道玄真隐咒 祖道玄真，垣赫正神。 郁仪炼质，荧惑操形。 赤明和阳，理禁威灵。 耀明宗飘，帝重光明。 戊己之英，中央镇星。 排荡邪炁，破灭淫精。 海逢之沸，木逢之烬。 火逢之空，金逢之镕。 长离之主，统摄飞行。 迷尼奴那，唵唵吽吽。 东海青童，总括张罗。 迷尼奴那，唵唵吽吽。 急急如律令。 右符先存中炁，上透泥丸。 次书符，引太阳炁吹布丹砂笔现，精思上宫赤炁，中有赤帝，吐绛光三道，入兆顶中，灌神府洞明如日，三台盖头。 存日中炎精二神，长三寸。 丹衣，赤金冠，以两目晴光相合，作火光二道，吸引入符。 焚符时，念前隐咒。 存两眉之间直入三寸，分为二路，左有绛台青房，右有黄阙紫户。 左神名正心，右神名平静，状如婴儿，从泥丸透出，渐长，丹衣，赤金冠，各执流金火铃，洞焕流火，冶炼亡魂。
chunks.translated_text:
The True Sovereign’s Primordial Command descends from the Nine Heavens.
Refine the spirit-soul with fire, as Heaven’s One contains life.
The Sun’s radiance pierces the void—its form aligns with Nature’s Way.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Second Talisman (Unwritten Daylight)**
*Incantation:*
Nine-Heaven’s true radiance, the Primordial Palace refines the soul.
Fire descends by Imperial Command—free from the shadowed depths.

---
**Third Talisman (Unwritten Daylight)**
*Incantation:*
The Sacred Sovereign of Destiny, the Imperial Lord receives essence.
The Three Sovereigns held the Dao—refining soul and refining spirit.
Born anew in the Southern Dipper, dying in the Northern Mound.
True light blazes forth—bow to the Jade Dawn.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Fourth Talisman (Unwritten Daylight, Acid Hour)**
*Incantation:*
The Four Symbols converge, Nine Yangs generate.
The Mysterious Dao flows with light—Sun’s form shifts anew.
Riding the void’s crimson haze, receive refinement to birth the spirit.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Fifth Talisman (Unwritten Daylight, Dog Hour)**
*Incantation:*
The Southern Palace flows with crystal—true fire transmutes essence.
The Five Phases complete, ten thousand forms illuminated.
Soul and spirit refined, divine transformation in jade.
Wafting on crimson haze, ascending the formless.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Sixth Talisman (Unwritten Daylight, Hare Hour)**
*Incantation:*
The Sovereign’s true command, Nine Degrees of Primordial Clarity.
The High Dao nurtures mystically—Yang Harmony’s supreme essence.
Six *qi* intermingle, swiftly refining the dead soul.
The spirit soars through the void’s radiance, merging with the Dao.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Seventh Talisman (Unwritten Daylight, Rat Hour)**
*Incantation:*
Seizing Heaven and Earth’s Great Transformation, the Seven *qi* manifest.
The Three Lights return to substance—all stagnation ascends, light unbound.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Eighth Talisman (Unwritten Daylight, Ox Hour)**
*Incantation:*
The Sacred Treasure’s Command universalizes the shadowed depths.
Eight Scenes intermingle—returning the body to lightness and purity.
Soul and spirit receive refinement—yin and yang fused.
Unbinding knots, dissolving stagnation, ten revolutions restore essence.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Ninth Talisman (Unwritten Daylight, Tiger Hour)**
*Incantation:*
The Nine Regions harmonize transformation—ten thousand forms flourish.
Refined by the Sun’s essence, soul purified, spirit at peace.
Taking the Dao as substance, aligned with the Sun’s luminosity.
Ascending the muddy pellet, entering the Imperial Court.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
Know the *Qing* (bell) to raise the Jade-Eyed Refining-Substance Celestial Worthy.
Next, recite the gatha:
*Southward to the Vermilion Peak Palace, the Crimson Heaven’s fiery courtyard.*
*The Jade-Eyed refines form and substance—soul and spirit reborn.*

---
**Fire-Refinement Unified Talisman**
Hold the talisman in the left hand, proceeding from *wu* (noon) clockwise to *yin* (tiger).
For the Nine Fire-Refinement Talismans begin at *wu* (fire’s peak), passing through *wei* (dog), *shen* (monkey), to *yin* (tiger, life’s renewal)—nine positions unified to refine the soul.
*Incantation:*
The Celestial Emperor’s decree—sunlight’s daily march.
The *xuanji* (rotary sphere) turns, the Eight Extremes converge.
Unified Great Refinement—the Jade-Eyed ascends.
*Urgent, as the Benevolent-Generating Great Emperor’s Mandate compels.*

---
**Fire-Refinement Transcendence Talisman**
*Wu* (noon) hour, Southern *qi*.
Store the talisman in the Great Intestine, refining the departed soul within.
*Incantation:*
The fiery pool’s essence—substance refined to truth.
The Five Viscera’s channels—life restored to the body.
Directly ascending the Three Heavens, bowing to the Jade Dawn.

---
**Golden Elixir Refining-Form Talisman (Ancestral *Qi* Jade Secret)**
Hold the talisman, swallow one mouthful of saliva, passing through the Lung’s Golden Passage, directing intent to the Middle Palace for refinement.
*Incantation:*
Golden elixir refines form—uniting with the Dao’s truth.
Opening the Three Radiances, this is Heaven’s Root.
Without depth, without extremity, without beginning, without end.
The Primordial Sovereign’s Nine Oxen—spirit-magic of the Crimson Palace.
Purple *qi* ascends to Heaven, the body rides the Six Dragons.
Water above, fire below—flowing into the Three Palaces.
The spirit returns to Yang Clarity—the Great Dao opens.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
**Heavenly Ganges Jade-Character Root Incantation**
*Incantation:*
The Ganges’ *qi* aligns—binding sinews, penetrating bone.
Piercing the muddy pellet, opening the Yang’s rugged peaks.
Hold the talisman in the left hand, summoning the Dipper’s constellation.
Point the ladle’s handle forward, its light flashing—draw *qi* down the throat into the Inner Palace, past the Tailbone, ascending to burst from the Crown, merging *qi* with the talisman’s inscription.
As the Dipper revolves, mold yin and yang—no transformation escapes this.
Burn during refinement in the *qi*-gathering furnace.

---
**Upper Clarity’s Nine-Dipper Yang-Beam Fire-Bell Flaming-Essence True Talisman (Sun Secret)**
First inscribe the Southern Vermilion Peak Emperor, then the talisman above.
*Incantation:*
The two Flaming-Essence deities—bodies transmuted into fire.
Refining form, riding smoke to soar.
Merging with the Nine *qi*, penetrating the fire realm.
Slaying demonic spirits, annihilating omens.
Hearing my fire-bell, demons vanish.
By the Five Degrees’ harmony, life preserved, longevity extended.
The Celestial Sovereign commands—return to the Sun’s form.
*Urgent, as the Celestial Sovereign’s Mandate.*

---
**Ancestral Dao’s Mysterious True Hidden Incantation**
The Ancestral Dao’s Mysterious Truth—mighty and upright spirit.
Yùyí refines substance, Mars governs form.
The Crimson Bright unites with Yang—logic restrains, power commands.
Illuminating the宗 (*zōng*), drifting on the radiance, the Emperor’s weighty light.
The *wuji* (five-and-six) brilliance—Central Star’s dominion.
Dispersing malevolent *qi*, shattering lustful essences.
The Sea’s boiling, the Wood’s incineration,
Fire’s emptiness, Metal’s fusion.
The Long-Li’s master—commanding flight.
*Mīnínūnā*, *ōṃ āḥuṃ*.
The Eastern Sea’s Green Youth—summoning the net.
*Mīnínūnā*, *ōṃ āḥuṃ*.
*Urgent, as the Mandate decrees.*

---
Store the talisman first in the Central *qi*, piercing the muddy pellet.
Next, inscribe the talisman, drawing the Sun’s *qi* to manifest with a cinnabar brush.
Focus on the Middle Palace’s crimson *qi*—within, the Red Emperor, exhaling three crimson beams into the forehead’s acupuncture point.
Irrigate the Godly Palace’s cavity, bright as day—covering the Three Platforms.
Store the Sun’s two Flaming-Essence deities, three inches tall.
Crimson robes, golden crowns—eyes merging as sunlight, forming two fire beams, drawn into the talisman.
Burn the talisman while reciting the preceding hidden incantation.
Store between the brows, penetrating three inches deep, splitting into two paths:
Left holds the Crimson Platform’s Green Chamber, right the Yellow Gate’s Purple Door.

The right deity’s name: *Píngjìng* (Serene Stillness).

chunks.original_text: 太上梵炁符玉诀祖炁 师执旛行交炼法，咒曰： 天一生水，亥入子地二生火。 已入午水火交，炼，子午至子自然成真。 玉文内应 凡三遍作用，念咒第三遍。 接后咒： 真中有神，长生大君。 无英公子，白元尊神。 太一司命，桃康合延。 执符把箓，保命生根。 上游上清，出入华房。 八冥之内，细微之中。 下镇人身，泥丸绛宫，中理五炁，混合百神。 十转回灵，万炁齐仙。 焚旛，换变仙旛。 见旛盖门。 师舌拄上腭，自中运祖炁下丹田，过尾闾，上透泥丸，化成元始上帝。 内诵中篇一遍，心肾二炁相交，水池火沼，炼化形神清净，俱入洞阳流火之中，焚炼有生以来有为之身，悉为灰烬，存性。 次存灰烬中，微有一缕真炁，如露珠。 即是太极以前一点灵明，中和之性。 密咒曰： 大行梵炁，周回十方。 中有度人不死之神，中有南极长生之君，中有度世司马大神，中有好生韩君丈人，中有南上司命司录。 延寿益算，度厄尊神。 回骸起死，无量度人。 咒曰次搯诀 天一地六，水德为精。 坎离诀炁地二天七，火出为神。 离坎诀炁天三地八，返魂育婴。 震兑诀炁，月精。 地四天九，再生魄灵。 兑震炁，月华。 天五地十，五行生成。 中寅，黄中炁。 天一地六，水德为精。 子地二天七，火出为神。 午天三地八，木德为魂。 卯地四天九，金为魄灵。 酉中黄正炁，五生十成。 中 天地造化，自然成形。 水火既济，五行合并。 死魂受炼，仙化成人。 天一地二，水火既济。 天三地四，精神交会。 金木交炁，魂魄随至。 天五地十，土旺四季。 五行毕备，受炼更生。 阳升阴坠，各从其类。 南昌度魂，注生录事。 九天监生，万神复位。 急急如灵宝度人律令。 默咒 元始符命，受炼更生。 日月交感，阴阳生成。 禀金之英，膺木之灵。 以水为精，以火为神。 以土为体，返胎育婴。 万炁混康，五脏分明。 与道合德，与神契真。 火急迁度，受炼更生。 急急如灵宝度人律令。 师曰：炼至此矣，当灭水火有形之相，返其清净自然之质。 庶得更生再造，聚炁回灵。 次第而行，不失於次序矣。 灵宝玉鉴卷之四十竟 灵宝玉鉴卷之四十一

The Most High Daoist *Fanqi* Talisman-Jewel Method: Ancestral Qi Master’s Ritual of the Wandering Banner and Exchange-Refinement

**Incantation:**
Heaven One begets Water—*hai* enters *zi*, Earth Two begets Fire.
*Yǐ* enters *wǔ*—Water and Fire exchange, refine.
From *zi* to *wǔ* and back to *zi*, naturally perfecting the True.

The Talisman’s inner resonance—threefold in its operation.
Recite the incantation for the third time.

**Subsequent Incantation:**
Within the True lies the God—Long-Life Great Lord.
Without the Noble Prince—White Primordial Venerable God.
Taiyi the Life-Director, Peach-Kang the Longevity-Bearer.
Wielding the Talisman, clutching the Registers—preserve life, root the essence.
Ascend the Upper Flow, enter the Pure Abode, traverse the Flowered Chamber.
Within the Eight Obscurities, in the minutest depths.
Descend to govern the mortal form—Muddy Pellet’s Crimson Palace,
harmonizing the Five Qi, blending the Hundred Deities.
Ten revolutions restore the Soul—ten thousand Qi become Immortals.

Burn the Banner, transform into the Immortal Banner.
See the Banner cover the Gate.

The Master, tongue propped against the upper palate,
draws the Ancestral Qi from the center down to the Lower Dan,
passing the Tail Gate, ascending to pierce the Muddy Pellet,
transmuting into the Primordial Sovereign Emperor.

Recite inwardly the Middle Section once—
the Heart and Kidney Qi intermingle,
Water Pool and Fire Marsh refine,
purifying form and spirit, both entering the Cavernous Yang’s flowing fire,
burning away the embodied self from birth onward—
all reduced to ash, preserving only the Essence.

Next, within the ash, a faint thread of True Qi remains,
like a dew droplet—
the One Extremity before the Great Polarity,
the harmonious Nature.

**Secret Incantation:**
Great Movement of *Fanqi*, encircling the Ten Directions.
Within lies the God who rescues mortals from death,
the Southern Extremity Lord of Long Life,
the Great God who guides the World,
the Benevolent Lord Han the Elder,
the Southern Registrar of Life and Death.
Extending Longevity, augmenting fate,
rescuing from calamity, the Venerable God.
Reviving the Corpse, raising the Dead—
infinite rescue of mortals.

**Incantation of the *Zhuò* Method:**
Heaven One, Earth Six—Water Virtue as Essence.
*Kǎn-Lí* Qi Decisive: Earth Two, Heaven Seven—Fire emerges as God.
*Lí-Kǎn* Qi Decisive: Heaven Three, Earth Eight—Return the Soul, Nurture the Infant.
*Zhèn-Duì* Qi Decisive—Moon Essence.
Earth Four, Heaven Nine—Rebirth of Soul and Spirit.
*Duì-Zhèn* Qi—Moon’s Luster.
Heaven Five, Earth Ten—Five Phases complete their generation.
*Yín* Central—Yellow Central Qi.
Heaven One, Earth Six—Water Virtue as Essence.
Earth Two, Heaven Seven—Fire emerges as God.
*Wǔ* Heaven Three, Earth Eight—Wood Virtue as Soul.
*Mǎo* Earth Four, Heaven Nine—Metal as Spirit and Soul.
*Yǒu* Central—Yellow Rectified Qi, five generations complete.
Central—Heaven and Earth’s Transformation, naturally forming.
Water and Fire in harmony, Five Phases united.
The departed soul undergoes refinement, immortalized as a human.
Heaven One, Earth Two—Water and Fire in harmony.
Heaven Three, Earth Four—Spirit and Qi converge.
Metal and Wood Qi exchange—Soul and Spirit follow.
Heaven Five, Earth Ten—Earth thrives in the Four Seasons.
Five Phases fully present—refinement brings rebirth.
Yang ascends, Yin descends, each returns to its kind.
Southern Registrar guides the Soul, records birth.
Nine Heavens oversee life—ten thousand deities resume their stations.
*Urgent as the Soul-Treasury’s Rescue Edict.*

**Silent Incantation:**
Primordial Sovereign’s Talisman-Command—refinement brings rebirth.
Sun and Moon in resonance, Yin and Yang generate.
Endowed with Metal’s brilliance, bearing Wood’s spirit.
Water as Essence, Fire as God.
Earth as the Body—return to the womb, nurture the infant.
Ten thousand Qi harmoniously settled, Five Viscera distinct.
Aligned with the Dao’s virtue, in accord with the God’s Truth.
Swiftly transmuted—refinement brings rebirth.
*Urgent as the Soul-Treasury’s Rescue Edict.*

The Master says:
Refine thus—extinguish the formed aspects of Water and Fire,
returning to their pristine, natural purity.
Thus may rebirth and renewal occur, gathering Qi to restore the Soul.
Proceed in sequence, without losing the order.

*Completion of the Fourth Forty-First Volume of the Soul-Treasury Jade Mirror.*

chunks.original_text: 炼度更生门 太阴混元化形炼法 师曰：混元合炁，聚而成灵。 三元九炁，周分十二。 在天则十二宫分野，在人则十二经络脏腑，以应夫一身六阴六阳之形数也。 及其身谢之后，魂魄汨丧，形气未完，须假十二大将军，摄炁聚灵，炼生真景，全形复性，洞彻阳光，不堕幽阴，径登仙域矣。 召混元一十二炁大将军符 子文北炁 谨召混元一炁六元运阳化阴大将军杨元虎，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生肾，生精炁，使精炁以通真。 午文南炁 谨召混元七变混景大将军丁忠，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生心，生神生荣生志，使神志以安宁。 震文东炁 谨召混元三炁八徊合元大将军丁迁善，飞空变化，摄召生炁、奉为亡魂化生肝，生魂生筋生血，使筋血以流行。 酉文西炁 谨召混元四炁九光会灵大将军陈志元，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生肺，生魄生卫生皮毛，使皮毛以合真。 申文中炁 谨召混元五炁十合阴阳大将军王先之，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生脾，生肌肉生意，使四肢以固宁。 寅文东北炁 谨召混元六炁十一变灵大将军张固，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生膀胱，生水胞，俾水胞以媾精。 巽文东南炁 谨召混元七炁十二运化大将军李渊，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生小肠，生水道，使水道以通真。 坤文西南炁 谨召混元八炁十三阳光大将军申孚，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生胆，生津生汗，使津汗以生成。 文西北炁 谨召混元九炁十四运度大将军周自然，飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂化生大肠，生谷道，使谷道以成形。 中文中天炁 谨召混元十炁十五成阴变阳大将军章修，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生胃，生水源，使胃管以生津。 巳文东南炁 谨召混元十一炁十六三景混成大将军王卓立，飞空变化摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生三焦，生三宫，使三景以达灵。 八卦炁诀 谨召混元十二炁十七阴阳合灵大将军郑明，飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂化生胞络。 总祝咒 九天梵炁，为之结形。 中有大帝，慈悲惠生。 甚妙灵符，魂魄返都。 千变万化，自有入无。 身心湛寂，俱契玄珠。 万劫难遇，开关幽途。 受此阴炼，魂登太虚。 急急如上帝律令。 混元十二经络阴符 入女返质符内 化生肾符子文，北炁，玄色 化生心符午文，南炁，赤色 化生肝符卯文，东炁，青色 化生肺符酉文，西炁，白色 化生脾符中文，中炁，黄色 化生膀胱符寅文，东北炁，黑色 化生小肠符戌文，西北炁，玄色 化生胆符巳文，巽炁，绿色 化生大肠符酉文，西炁，白色 化生胃符中文，中炁，苍色 化生三焦符巳文，东南炁，青赤色 化生胞络符八卦炁诀 混元十二经络阳符 入男返质符内 化生肾符子文，肝炁 祝咒 一炁之化，神以通灵。 千神左卫，神炁混心。 以炁之聚，神之最灵。 混合六神，以生肾经。 身自运水，大道生明。 亡魂受炼，返故复生。 急急如玉清上帝勑。 唵三慕哆之。 化生心符午文，心炁 祝咒 万火为主，急木魔王。 一之而定，勑下无当。 赤宫之帝，聚炁为王。 散乱无动，百神归降。 千神守护，一体定康，亡灵受炼，上升玉堂。 急急如玉清上帝勑。 唵嗏轮西那尼。 化生肝符卯文，肝炁 祝咒 水官之德，脉炁如泉。

**Refinement, Transmutation, and Rebirth Gate**
**Method of Primordial Sovereign’s Talisman-Command for Transforming the Form of Great Yin**

The Master says:
*Mix the Primordial Qi, gather it to form the Soul.*
*Three Primordial Elements, Nine Qi—divided into twelve.*
*In Heaven, they manifest as the twelve celestial mansions and their star fields;*
*In Man, they correspond to the twelve meridians and the organs and bowels,*
*thus aligning with the Dao’s virtue and the God’s Truth in the form and number of the six Yin and six Yang of one body.*

When the body decays and the spirit and soul are lost,
yet the form and Qi remain incomplete,
one must summon the **Twelve Great Generals of Transmutation**,
to gather Qi and restore the Soul,
refining the True Landscape to perfect form and nature,
completing the body and returning to original essence,
piercing the radiance of Yang,
and not falling into the darkness of Yin,
but ascending directly to the Immortal Realm.

**Edict for Summoning the Primordial Sovereign’s Twelve Qi Generals**

*In the North, the Black Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Sixth Qi—General Yang Yuanhu of the Eleven Primordial Movements**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Kidneys**,
to produce **Essence-Qi**,
and let the Essence-Qi flow to restore the True.

*In the South, the Red Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Seventh Qi—General Ding Zhong of the Seven Transformations and True Landscape**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Heart**,
to produce **Spirit**, **Nourishment**, and **Will**,
and let the **Spirit and Will** dwell in perfect tranquility.

*In the East, the Blue Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Third Qi—General Ding Qianshan of the Eight Circulations and Primordial Unity**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Liver**,
to produce **Soul**, **Sinews**, and **Blood**,
and let the **Sinews and Blood** flow harmoniously.

*In the West, the White Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Fourth Qi—General Chen Zhiyuan of the Nine Radiant Light and Soul’s Gathering**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Lungs**,
to produce **Corporeal Soul**, **Defensive Qi**, and **Hair and Fur**,
and let the **Hair and Fur** align with the True.

*In the Center, the Yellow Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Fifth Qi—General Wang Xianzhi of the Ten Yang-Yin Unifications**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Spleen**,
to produce **Flesh and Muscle**, and **Intent**,
and let the **Four Limbs** stand firm in tranquility.

*In the Northeast, the Black Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Sixth Qi—General Zhang Gu of the Eleven Transformations and Soul’s Unity**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Bladder**,
to produce **Water Cyst**,
and let the **Water Cyst** receive the **Essence**.

*In the Southeast, the Blue Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Seventh Qi—General Li Yuan of the Twelve Transformations**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Small Intestine**,
to produce **Waterways**,
and let the **Waterways** flow to restore the True.

*In the Southwest, the Green Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Eighth Qi—General Shen Fu of the Thirteen Radiant Yang**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Gallbladder**,
to produce **Saliva** and **Sweat**,
and let the **Saliva and Sweat** form naturally.

*In the Northwest, the Black Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Ninth Qi—General Zhou Ziran of the Fourteen Transformations**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Large Intestine**,
to produce **Grainways**,
and let the **Grainways** form the body.

*In the Midheaven, the Center Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Tenth Qi—General Zhang Xiu of the Fifteen Yin-to-Yang Transformations**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Stomach**,
to produce **Water Source**,
and let the **Stomach’s Tube** generate **Saliva**.

*In the Southeast, the Blue Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Eleventh Qi—General Wang Zhuoli of the Sixteen Three Landscapes and Transformations**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Triple Burner**,
to produce **Three Palaces**,
and let the **Three Landscapes** reach the Soul.

*In the Eight Trigrams, the Soul’s Decisive Talisman:*
I solemnly summon the **Primordial Sovereign’s Twelfth Qi—General Zheng Ming of the Seventeen Yin-Yang Unifications and Soul’s Unity**,
who flies through the void and transmutes,
to gather and summon the life-giving Qi.
*I entrust it to the lost soul,*
to transform and generate the **Uterus and Meridians**.

**General Incantation**
*Primordial Qi of the Nine Heavens,*
*to form the body’s structure.*
*Within dwells the Great Sovereign,*
*merciful and benevolent to life.*
*This wondrous talisman,*
*restores the soul and spirit to their origin.*
*Ten thousand transformations,*
*entering without and returning within.*
*Body and mind in profound stillness,*
*both attuned to the Mysterious Pearl.*
*Encountered in a thousand eons,*
*unlocking the path to the void.*
*Through this Yin refinement,*
*The soul ascends to the Great Emptiness.*
*Urgent as the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Edict.*

**Primordial Sovereign’s Twelve Meridian Yin Talismans**
*For the Return-to-Origin Talisman (Female):*
- **Kidney Transformation Talisman:** Black Talisman, North Qi, dark hue.
- **Heart Transformation Talisman:** Red Talisman, South Qi, crimson hue.
- **Liver Transformation Talisman:** Blue Talisman, East Qi, greenish hue.
- **Lung Transformation Talisman:** White Talisman, West Qi, pure hue.
- **Spleen Transformation Talisman:** Yellow Talisman, Center Qi, golden hue.
- **Bladder Transformation Talisman:** Black Talisman, Northeast Qi, jet hue.
- **Small Intestine Transformation Talisman:** Dark Talisman, Northwest Qi, dark hue.
- **Gallbladder Transformation Talisman:** Green Talisman, Southeast Qi, verdant hue.
- **Large Intestine Transformation Talisman:** White Talisman, West Qi, bright hue.
- **Stomach Transformation Talisman:** Center Talisman, Center Qi, dusky hue.
- **Triple Burner Transformation Talisman:** Blue-Red Talisman, Southeast Qi, greenish-red hue.
- **Uterus and Meridians Transformation Talisman:** Eight Trigrams Qi Decisive Talisman.

**Primordial Sovereign’s Twelve Meridian Yang Talismans**
*For the Return-to-Origin Talisman (Male):*
- **Kidney Transformation Talisman:** Black Talisman, Liver Qi.

**Incantation for the Kidney Talisman**
*By the transformation of one Qi,*
*The Spirit flows to awaken the Soul.*
*The thousand Spirits guard the left,*
*Qi and Spirit merge in the Heart.*
*By the Qi’s gathering,*
*The Spirit attains its utmost purity.*
*Merged with the Six Spirits,*
*To generate the Kidney Meridian.*
*The body itself circulates Water,*
*The Great Way produces radiance.*
*The lost soul receives refinement,*
*And returns to its original life.*
*Urgent as the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Edict.*
*Om Mani Padme Hum.*

**Incantation for the Heart Talisman**
*Ten thousand Fires as the master,*
*Urgent to subdue the Wood Demon King.*
*One and it is settled,*
*Commanded below—no resistance.*
*The Crimson Palace Sovereign,*
*Gathers Qi as the King.*
*Scattered and chaotic—no movement,*
*The hundred Spirits submit and descend.*
*The thousand Spirits guard and protect,*
*The body unified in tranquility,*
*The lost soul refined,*
*Ascending to the Jade Hall.*
*Urgent as the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Edict.*
*Om Ah Ra Ka Da Ni.*

**Incantation for the Liver Talisman**

chunks.original_text: 三官朝拱，太一守房。 六府俱会，徧体流光。 黄演之炁，胃管生津。 安神镇宅，一体生明。 魂神归伏，神真纳灵。 开通胃管，大道混成。 急急如玉清上帝勑。 啼嚧吽叱哩哆。 生三焦符巳文，三焦炁 祝咒 三焦列布，五神共归。 赤天有命，升降无为。 淡白之炁，北神无藏。 咽液生津，往来温昌。 重楼通景，百节顺张。 亡魂受炼，俱得更生。 急急如玉清上帝勑。 啼嘘件呼璃咤。 化生胞络符辰文，胞络炁 祝咒 帝君勑下，飞摄大魔。 神精炁聚，急炼阳和。 黄白之炁，胞络成形。 五行所运，一体光明。 神宁魄静，灵炁聚英。 亡劫受炼，与道合并。 急急如玉清上帝勑。 唵呼聚吽离叱。 右十二符，运一炁梵语书成小样，入返质符内用。 默咒曰 唵琴尼勑地喃嚧。 知磬举回形转化天尊。 高功入科。 回骸起死符玉诀，光炁万丈，一炁成符 神霄十入大洞玉符 生胞符 子文，存天中黄雾之炁，化生胞元，红地白书。 谨召神霄生胞元常君，字秋夫。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生胞，骨奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 次存宝珠一颗，飞入胞元，结成胎，中有青衣将军二人。 真王有命，炼化重泉。 胞元宣通，与道自然。 死根断绝，下镇灵渊。 真炁化生，与天齐年。 生胎符 午文，天中玉华之炁，白地朱书。 谨召神霄生胎含生君，字寅和。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂化生胎，吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存真炁如月透明，中有一真人，执芙蓉。 五帝宣符，炼化胎元。 洞阳妙炁，永镇灵仙。 混一变化，紫户升仙。 生结符 寅文，天中瑶光之炁，黄地丹书。 谨召神霄生结九华君，字彦遐。 从官符吏。 飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂化生结。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存胞胎脉络缠结，中有绣衣将军一人。 玉清元化，冥应十天。 保度阴户，去结解缠。 灵光下注，映焕无边。 生节符 卯文，天中玉光之炁，黄地白书。 谨召神霄生节香浩君，字空猷。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂化生节。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存白衣将军一人，化生其中。 灵宝妙炁，融节通真。 三十二天，演化无垠。 体洞玉光，内固真精。 炼化自然，与天齐年。 生肾符 子文，北方黑霄之炁，白地黑书。 谨召神霄生肾大渊君，字求都。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂化生肾，生耳生膀胱。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存胞胎中化生两肾，津水盈溢，中有黑龙黑龟，上有一婴儿。 大明万宝，炼化生身。 死魂受化，肾神太渊。 合命对生，求都万全。 育粹凝精，上步玄天。 生目符 卯酉文，日月光炁，白地青书。 谨召神霄生左目通光君，字玄真。 生右目神婴君，字阴精。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂化生两目。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存胞胎中日月焕明，中有朱衣童子，素衣少女，各一人。 真王有命，日月无停。 帝君宣化，炼生万神。 光澄六合，交映合明。 混生自然，上升玉庭。 生心符 午文，天中绛霞之炁。 谨召神霄生心玄珠君，字玄玄。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂生心，生荣生志。 生小肠，生水道。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存童子三人，披朱衣，跨赤龙。 虚明应体，大象具灵。 应感无方，示见杳冥。

**Incantation for the Triple Officials Talisman (三官符)**
*The Three Officials bow in reverence, the Supreme Unity guards the hall.*
*The Six Palaces gather as one, radiant *qi* flows through the entire body.*
*The *qi* of the Yellow Court: the stomach generates vital essence.*
*Calming the spirit, settling the residence—one body, one radiance.*
*Soul and spirit submit, divine essence receives life.*

**Incantation for the Triple Burner Talisman (三焦符)**
*As the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Edict.*
*Om Tui He He Chi Li Do.*

**Incantation for the Triple Burner *Qi* (三焦炁)**
*The Triple Burner spreads across, the Five Spirits unite in return.*
*The Red Heaven holds decree: ascent and descent without action.*
*The pale-white *qi*, the Northern Spirit, concealed.*
*Saliva generates essence, flowing warm and vital.*
*The Double Layer opens its passage, all joints expand in harmony.*
*The lost soul refined, all attain rebirth.*
*As the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Edict.*
*Om Tu Xu Jian Hu Li Za.*

**Incantation for the Uterine Vessels Talisman (胞络符)**
*As the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Edict.*
*Om Hu Ju Hun Li.*

**Incantation for the Uterine Vessels *Qi* (胞络炁)**
*The Sovereign’s command: swiftly summon the Great Demon.*
*Divine essence and *qi* converge, urgently refining the Yang harmony.*
*The yellow-white *qi* forms the uterine vessels.*
*The Five Phases move as one, radiant in unity.*
*Spirit serene, soul tranquil—divine *qi* gathers its brilliance.*
*The lost *qi* refined, merging with the Dao.*
*As the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Edict.*

**The Twelve Talismans, Running One *Qi* (十二符, 运一炁)**

*To be inscribed within the Return-to-Substance Talisman.*

*Know the Chimes to rise and transform the form—Heaven’s Revered One.*
*The High Functionary enters the ritual.*
*Return-to-Substance Talisman of the Jade Purity Sovereign’s Secret Essence,*
*Radiant *qi* ten thousand *zhang*—one *qi* forms the talisman.*
*The Great Void’s Ten Entries Talisman of the Jade Purity,*
*Generates the Uterine Vessels Talisman,*
*Child text, preserving the *qi* of the Yellow Mist in Heaven’s Center,*
*Transforming to generate the Primordial Uterus—red ground, white script.*

*Autumnal Husband, of the Officials and Talisman Scribes.*
*Flying through the void, transforming in motion,*
*Swiftly summoning the generating *qi*.*
*Offered to the lost soul to generate the uterus,*
*The bones obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,*
*Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.*

**Next, preserve a single Pearl of Precious Treasure,*
*Flying into the Primordial Uterus,*
*Forming the embryo—within, two Generals in Green Robes.*
*The True King decrees: refining the Dark Abyss.*
*The Primordial Uterus opens naturally, merging with the Dao.*
*The root of death severed, settled in the Spirit Spring.*
*True *qi* refined, enduring as Heaven’s years.*

**Embryo-Generating Talisman (生胎符)**
*Horse text, the *qi* of the Jade Flower in Heaven’s Center—*
*White ground, cinnabar script.*
*Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Embryo-Containing Sovereign,*
*Leaping Husband, of the Officials and Talisman Scribes.*
*Flying through the void, transforming in motion,*
*Swiftly summoning the generating *qi*.*
*Offered to the lost soul to generate the embryo,*
*I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,*
*Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.*
*Preserve the true *qi*, clear as the moon’s transparency,*
*Within, one True Person holding the Lotus.*
*The Five Emperors decree the talisman: refining the Embryonic Essence.*
*The Mysterious Yang’s Marvelous *Qi*, eternally settled in the Spirit Immortal.*
*Merging as one, transforming naturally—*
*Ascending through the Purple Gate to Immortality.*
*The Birth-Knot Talisman (生结符),*
*Dragon text, the *qi* of the Jade Light in Heaven’s Center—*
*Yellow ground, vermilion script.*
*Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Birth-Knot Sovereign,*
*Playful Expanse, of the Officials and Talisman Scribes.*
*Flying through the void, transforming in motion,*
*Swiftly summoning the generating *qi*,*
*Offered to the lost soul to generate the Birth-Knot.*
*I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,*
*Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.*
*Preserve the uterine vessels, embryo passages, and tangled meridians,*
*Within, one General in Embroidered Robes.*
*The Jade Purity’s Original Transformation,*
*Responding to the Ten Dark Heavens.*
*Protecting and guiding the Yin Gate,*
*Removing knots and tangles.*
*The Spirit Light descends, illuminating boundlessly.*

*Tiger text, the *qi* of the Jade Light in Heaven’s Center—*
*Yellow ground, white script.*
*Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Birth-Joint Sovereign,*
*Playful Expanse, of the Officials and Talisman Scribes.*
*Flying through the void, transforming in motion,*
*Swiftly summoning the generating *qi*,*
*Offered to the lost soul to generate the Birth-Joint.*
*I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,*
*Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.*
*Preserve one General in White Robes, transforming within.*
*The Spirit Treasure’s Marvelous *Qi*, refining and opening the Birth-Joint to Truth.*
*The Thirty-Two Heavens transform boundlessly.*
*The Body penetrates the Jade Light, inner essence securely preserved.*
*Refining naturally, enduring as Heaven’s years.*

**Kidney-Generating Talisman (生肾符)**
*Rat text, the *qi* of the Black Void in the North—*
*White ground, black script.*
*Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Kidney-Generating Sovereign,*
*Abyssal Seeker, of the Officials and Talisman Scribes.*
*Flying through the void, transforming in motion,*
*Swiftly summoning the generating *qi*,*

*Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.*

*Essence overflowing—within, a Black Dragon and Black Tortoise,*
*Above, one infant.*
*The Great Brightness’s Treasures refine and generate the body.*
*The lost soul receives transformation,*
*The Kidney Spirit’s Great Abyss.*
*Life and death paired, Abyssal Seeker’s completeness.*
*Nurturing the pure essence, ascending to the Mysterious Heaven.*

**Eye-Generating Talisman (生目符)**
*Tiger-Horse text, the radiant *qi* of the sun and moon—*
*White ground, indigo script.*
*Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Left Eye’s Radiance,*
*Dark Truth, and the Sovereign of the Right Eye’s Spirit Infant,*

*Swiftly summoning the generating *qi*,*

*I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,*
*Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.*
*Preserve three boys, clad in crimson robes,*
*Riding red dragons.*
*Empty clarity responds to the body,*

*Revealing the boundless mysteries.*

chunks.original_text: 神光自生，真渊朗澄。 洞景长生，天君泰亨。 生舌符 寅文，天中绛云之炁，黄地朱书。 谨召神霄生舌腾阳君，字正生。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁，奉为亡魂化生舌。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存华池净泓内，生金莲一朵，莲上金光真人。 玉清灵景，普化真光。 舌神腾阳，万宝普宣。 养神通命，上生金莲。 紫炁有根，浚发灵源。 生肝符 卯文，天中青霞之光。 谨召神霄生肝青帝君，字孟光。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生肝，生魂生胆生智。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存青玉宫中有九人，前一人乘苍龙。 玉清玉符，化生自然。 魂藏肝腑，上生九天。 升度炼真，亿劫无边。 公子执符，天地合仙。 生肺符 酉文，天中黄云之炁，黑地白书。 谨召神霄生肺皓洞君，字季成。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生肺，生魂生鼻，生大肠，生皮毛。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存素衣玉女七人，前一人骑白虎。 玉天无翳，兑象孕明。 华盖七莲，真人素成。 白元受符，下覆黄宁。 金景洞化，仰餐流晶。 生脾符 申文，天中玉光之炁，白地黄书。 谨召神霄生脾紫庭君，字延年。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生脾，生胃生意，生肌肉，生四肢，生津，生谷道。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存黄元老母白首黄衣，立金光中。 高上玉文，化生紫庭。 表里洞彻，黄中固真。 玉符宣召，混合百神。 炼化空景，度魂玉景。 生脑符 申文，上天宝光之炁，白地赤书。 谨召神霄生脑泥丸赤文混洞君，字嘘嘘。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，生脑。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存泥丸玉房中，光明洞照，中有三人，玉貌天衣。 空梵聚真，万神会灵。 洞焕晨景。 八窗启明。 混合周流，策虚紫庭。 达性空朗，飞神上京。 生阴符 子文，天中黑云之炁，黑地朱书。 谨召神霄生阴续命君，字伯强。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生阴。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存水波中莹然，下有一人，玄衣绯裳。 渊渊湛玉，分配阴阳。 玄光映月，静景凝霜。 洞化有神，厥字伯强。 亡灵蒙度，上生天堂。 生命符 子文，天中月光之炁，白地青书。 谨召神霄生命正中君，字长生。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生命。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存胞胎润泽，秀孕转动，中有朱衣真官一人，执笔簿。 高上帝命，玉符生成。 天景良赋，受命长生。 保固天根，回阴起阳。 太乙守元，玉梵生光。 生血符 寅文，天中赤云之炁，青地朱书。 谨召神霄生血中幽君，字良弼。 从官符史，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生血，生毫毛。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存火云中，有赤衣一人将军。 真王玉文，化景生尸。 黑帝通血，流行四肢。 历功日久，变赤凝脂。 炼质南官，登升太微。 生精符 子文，天中黄白云炁，青地朱书。 谨召神霄生精元除君，字祝祝。 从官符吏，飞空变化，摄召生炁。 奉为亡魂，化生精，生汗。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 存玉殿中金鼎白光，中有素衣将军一人立中。 玉清洞阳，生化元除。 内外充溢，表里洞虚。 永劫长存，安镇帝君。 神升朗达，荣固天符。 生炁符

**Divine Light Self-Generated, True Abyss Clear and Bright.**
**Cavernous Vision Everlasting, Celestial Sovereign in Grand Harmony.**

**Heart-Tongue Talisman (生舌符)**
*Tiger text, the *qi* of the Crimson Cloud in Heaven’s Center,*
*Yellow ground, crimson script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Ascending Yang of the Tongue, *zì* Zhengshēng.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth the tongue.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored within the Pure Pool’s Crystal Depths,
A golden lotus blooms—one flower—upon which stands the Golden Light True Person.
The Jade Purity’s Sacred Vision universally transforms true light.
The Tongue Spirit ascends with Yang—ten thousand treasures universally proclaimed.
Nurturing the spirit, extending life—
Ascending the golden lotus.
Purple *qi* rooted, dredging the numinous source.

**Liver-Generating Talisman (生肝符)**
*Dragon text, the light of the Azure Cloud in Heaven’s Center.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Liver, the Green Emperor, *zì* Mèngguāng.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth the liver,
To birth the soul, the gallbladder, and wisdom.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored within the Jade Palace are nine figures—
The foremost rides a Azure Dragon.
The Jade Purity’s Jade Talisman naturally transforms.
The soul dwells in the liver’s recesses,
Ascending to the Nine Heavens.
Refining and ascending to true essence—
Limitless kalpas unbound.
The noble youth holds the talisman—
Heaven and Earth unite in transcendence.

**Lung-Generating Talisman (生肺符)**
*Rooster text, the *qi* of the Yellow Cloud in Heaven’s Center,*
*Black ground, white script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Bright Cavern of the Lung, *zì* Jìchéng.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth the lung,
To birth the soul, the nose, the large intestine, and the skin and hair.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored are seven jade-clad maidens in white robes—
The foremost rides a White Tiger.
The Jade Heaven is unobstructed,
The *fu* organ’s image conceives clarity.
Seven lotuses bloom in splendor—
The True Person is complete in purity.
The White Essence receives the talisman,
Descending to cover Yellow Tranquility.
Golden visions transform—
Feasting upward on flowing crystals.

**Spleen-Generating Talisman (生脾符)**
*Monkey text, the *qi* of Heaven’s Jade Light,*
*White ground, yellow script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Purple Court of the Spleen, *zì* Yányuán.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth the spleen,
To birth the stomach, the will, the muscles and flesh, the four limbs, the saliva, and the digestive tract.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored is the Yellow Elder Mother, white-haired, in yellow robes,
Standing within the Golden Light.
The lofty Jade Script transforms,
Generating the Purple Court.
Exterior and interior revealed—
The Yellow Center secures the True.
The Jade Talisman proclaims—
Mingling with the hundred spirits.
Refining the void’s visions,
Conducting the soul through the Jade Landscape.

**Brain-Generating Talisman (生脑符)**
*Monkey text, the *qi* of Heaven’s Precious Light,*
*White ground, red script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Mudball Brain, the Crimson-Texted Mixed Cavern, *zì* Xūxū.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to birth the brain.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored within the Mudball’s Jade Chamber—
Radiant clarity illuminates,
Within are three figures, jade-faced, in celestial robes.
The void’s dharma gathers true essence—
Ten thousand spirits converge in numinous response.
The cavern shines with morning brilliance.
Eight windows open to clarity.
Mingling and flowing throughout—
Purpling the void of the Purple Court.
Attaining the nature’s emptiness—
The flying spirit ascends to the Celestial Capital.

**Yin-Generating Talisman (生阴符)**
*Rat text, the *qi* of the Black Cloud in Heaven’s Center,*
*Black ground, crimson script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Continuing Yin, *zì* Bóqiáng.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth the Yin.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored within the luminous water—
Beneath is one figure, in dark robes and crimson skirts.
The abyss shines like jade—
Distributing Yin and Yang.
The dark light mirrors the moon,
The still vision congeals like frost.
The cavern transforms with spirit—
His *zì* is Bóqiáng.
The lost soul is guided—
Ascending to the Celestial Hall.

**Life-Generating Talisman (生命符)**
*Rat text, the *qi* of Heaven’s Moonlight,*
*White ground, blue script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Central Life Sovereign, *zì* Chángshēng.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth life.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored within the embryo’s luster—
Luminous and pregnant, shifting—
Within is one True Official in crimson robes, holding a ledger and brush.
The Highest Emperor’s command—
The Jade Talisman generates.
Heaven’s vision is bountiful—
Receiving the command of eternal life.
Preserving the Heavenly Root—
Returning Yin, arousing Yang.
The Great Unity guards the Essence—
The Jade Dharma generates light.

**Blood-Generating Talisman (生血符)**
*Tiger text, the *qi* of the Red Cloud in Heaven’s Center,*
*Green ground, crimson script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Blood’s Hidden Depths, *zì* Liángbì.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth the blood,
To birth the hair and fur.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored within the fire clouds—
One figure in red robes, a general.
The True King’s Jade Script—
Transforming visions generate the corpse.
The Black Emperor communicates the blood—
Flowing through the four limbs.
Through enduring merit—
It transforms into congealed crimson.
Refining the essence in the Southern Palace—
Ascending to the Supreme Clarity.

**Essence-Generating Talisman (生精符)**
*Rat text, the *qi* of Heaven’s Yellow-White Cloud,*
*Green ground, crimson script.*
Dutifully summoning the Jade Purity’s Sovereign of the Essence’s Removal, *zì* Zhùzhù.
With Officials and Talisman Scribes in attendance, flying through the void, transforming in motion,
Summoning the generating *qi*, offered to the lost soul to transform and birth the essence,
To birth the sweat.
I obey the Jade Purity’s Edict,
Swiftly descending the Primordial *Qi* to completion.
Stored within the Jade Hall’s golden cauldron, white-lighted—
Within stands one general in white robes.
The Jade Purity’s Cavernous Yang—
Generating and transforming the Essence’s Removal.
Inner and outer filled—
Exterior and interior revealed in emptiness.
Eternally enduring through kalpas—
Secure and settled, the Imperial Sovereign.
The spirit ascends, bright and boundless—
Virtue solidifies the Heavenly Talisman.

**Qi-Generating Talisman (生炁符)**

chunks.original_text: 炼度更生门 阴尸九炼生神玉符 师曰：此符乃高上空洞混沌九天元父道君，降而结为云篆。 付九天金箓无量寿生神尊君行之，以炼阴尸也。 此符九炁齐并，日月合明，百骸流火，更无阴滓，自然仙化成人矣。 此符用黄素朱书，粘於表前，上奏九天。 故得九天称庆，太一执符，帝君品命，主录勒籍，司命定算，五帝监生。 郁单无量天符 子文，掐九霄诀，取九霄正气。 书符祝 三才肇分，九曜顺行。 心王虚寂，阳满阴盈。 神光下映，救苦幽阴。 自然合道，日月同明。 右符存帝真胞命元元一黄演之炁，苍色下入胞元，使胞元宣通。 帝讳　。 上上禅善无量寿天符丑文 书符咒 道本澄廓，运化阴阳。 合真悟道，了心无心。 右符存洞冥紫户之炁，下入胎元，使胎结解根。 帝讳　。 梵监须延天符寅文 书符咒 等观应化，灵宝玄光。 照彻诸天，三十二帝。 兴隆教化，救度存亡。 丹禁灵符，尽获更生。 右符存长灵明仙之炁青色，下缠三魂，使魂门炼仙以达灵。 帝讳　。 寂然兜术天符卯文 书符咒 灵符火炼，百骸自飞。 炁变明阳，神造玄微。 九天化度，天地皆归。 右符存魄命无砀尸冥演由之炁绿色，下经七魄，使魄尸开关，天王降仙以安宁。 帝讳　。 波罗尼密不骄乐天符辰文 书符咒 三炁勃烟，日中真精。 魄返魂超，天清地宁。 右符存五仙中灵之炁黄色，下缠五脏，使脏腑清凉。 帝讳　。 洞玄化应声天符巳文
chunks.translated_text:
**Refining and Transcending the Gate of Rebirth**
*The Nine Refining of the Corpse to Generate Spirit with the Jade Talisman*

The Master says: This talisman is from the Highest Void of the Ninth Heaven—*Dao* of the Primordial Father, descending to form cloud-like seals. Bestowed upon the *Nine-Heaven Golden Talisman* of the Boundless-Life Spirit-Generating Lord, to be practiced in refining the corpse.

This talisman unites the Nine *Qi*, harmonizes the brilliance of sun and moon, ignites the hundred bones with fiery essence, and cleanses all residual *yin*—naturally achieving the transformation of a *xian* in human form. The talisman is written in red upon yellow silk and affixed to the corpse’s forehead, then invoked to the Ninth Heaven. Thus, one earns the Ninth Heaven’s praise, the *Taiyi*’s command with the talisman, the Lord’s decree of rank, and the registration of life and fate by the Five Emperors overseeing birth.

**Boundless-Life Talisman of the Idle Single**
*Child’s Text*
With the *Nine Exalted Precepts* invoked, taking the pure *qi* of the Ninth Expanse. The incantation reads:
*"The Three Powers manifest their division,
The Nine Luminaries proceed in order.
The Heart-King in void tranquility,
*Yang* full, *yin* replete.
Spirit-light descends to illumine,
Rescuing suffering in the shadowed depths.
Naturally attuned to the Dao,
Sun and moon shine as one."*

This talisman stores the *Dao*’s primordial *qi* of the Yellow Performance, descending in blue essence into the embryonic foundation, making the embryonic *qi* flow freely. The Lord’s name: **☯☯☯** (Imperial Seal omitted).

**Supreme Talisman of the Highest Ascetic’s Boundless-Life**
*Child’s Text*
The incantation reads:
*"The Dao’s essence is clear and vast,
Its transformations harmonize *yin* and *yang*.
Uniting the True, awakening the Way,
Enlightened—yet no mind remains."*

This talisman stores the *qi* of the Purple Gate in the Profound Darkness, descending into the embryonic foundation to dissolve the bonds of the fetus. The Lord’s name: **☯☯☯** (Imperial Seal omitted).

**Dharma-Oversight Must-Extend Talisman**
*Leopard’s Text*
The incantation reads:
*"Equal vision in response to transformation,
The Spirit-Treasury’s mysterious light.
Piercing all heavens, the Thirty-Two Lords.
Teachings flourish, rescuing life and death.
The Crimson Prohibition’s talisman,
All rebirths fully attained."*

This talisman stores the *qi* of the Azure-Luminous Immortal in green, descending to entwine the Three Souls, refining the soul’s gate to reach immortality. The Lord’s name: **☯☯☯** (Imperial Seal omitted).

**Tranquil Talisman of the Encompassing Tortoise**
*Rabbit’s Text*
The incantation reads:
*"The talisman’s fire refines the corpse,
The hundred bones ascend of their own accord.
The *qi* transforms into radiant *yang*,
The spirit crafts the profound and subtle.
The Ninth Heaven’s transformation and transcendence,
All under Heaven returns to harmony."*

This talisman stores the *qi* of the *P'o*-Fate without the *Wu*’s corpse in the Shadowed Darkness, descending through the Seven *P'o*, making the *P'o*-corpse open its gate, the Heavenly King descending as an immortal to bring peace. The Lord’s name: **☯☯☯** (Imperial Seal omitted).

**Brahman’s Secret Talisman of Non-Arrogance**
*Dragon’s Text*
The incantation reads:
*"The Three *Qi* surge in mist,
The True Essence at midday.
The *P'o* returns, the soul ascends,
Heaven clears, Earth finds rest.
The talisman of the Five Immortals’ Central Spirit,
Descending to cool the five viscera."*

This talisman stores the *qi* of the Five Immortals’ Central Spirit in yellow, descending to bind the five organs, making the viscera serene and cool. The Lord’s name: **☯☯☯** (Imperial Seal omitted).

**Cavernous Response Talisman of the Mysterious Transformation**
*Snake’s Text*

Year [Cycle] [Month] [Day] [Hour], the petition is respectfully submitted below.
With due reverence, the [legal] status of [my] humble servant, [surname] [given name], humbly petitions for [the departed’s] passage.

By the **Sacred Mysteries of the Celestial Soul’s Daoist Auxiliary—Secret Sound within the Inner Seal, the Jade Pendant of Illuminating Clarity, and the Supreme Symbol of the Profound Assembly**, may the **Primordial Unity of the Boundless Void** merge its *qi* with the Daoist Auxiliary.

Let the divine schemes unfold the Sacred Transformations,
Concealed yet ever-potent, beyond cold and heat’s sway.
Riding the celestial cycles, the pure branches take form,
With a sweep of the sleeve, the light plumes are fanned away.

The Celestial Hall resounds with wondrous harmonies,
Ascending to the lofty abode of the High Gods.
The Rounded Wheel reflects without pause,
Where the True Immortals rank in sacred order.

The highest celestial paths stretch boundless,
Piercing the Profound Origin’s depths, vast and profound.
Emerald leaves shade the jade-green mists,
Casting cool shadows o’er the limpid shallows.

Wandering in delight among the Five Spirits,
Endless visions call to the radiant companions.
The Five Obstacles dissolve by Dao’s logic,
Pure joy wells from the heart’s unburdened core.

The luminous soul returns to its primal root,
Soaring ceaselessly through the void’s embrace.
With seven chants, the sealed gates open wide,
Dissolving stagnation—no divine might required.

Flowing passage springs from the inner self,
Lifting high the reverent salute.

Respectfully submitted:
By the **Imperial True Soul-Palace’s Command**, the *qi* of the Ninefold Essence of the Highest Daoist’s Mystic Satchel,
For the departed [Name], ensnared by its Seven Orifices,
May the apertures awaken to clarity,
Stars and constellations brighten to guide the way.
As decreed, so it is proclaimed—
Wind and fire bear swift transmission.

chunks.original_text: 年岁次　月　日　时告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　告行。 高虚清明天魂精秘音内讳玉佩开明上符 清明重霄上，合期庆云际。 玉章散冲心，孤景要灵会。 焕落景霞布，神衿靡不迈。 玉条流逸响，从容虚妙话。 灵音振空洞，九玄离幽裔。 感爽无凝滞，去留如解带。 明识生神章，高游无终败。 玄景曜云衢，迹超神方外。 应感无方圆，聊以运四大。 研心稽首诵，众圣共称快。 右谨上请 帝真华府命元真灵化凝之炁九重。 奉为亡过某，缠其八景，使三部八景，整具形神。 幽夜开光以防身。 一如告命， 风火驿传。 年岁次　月　日时告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　告行。 无想无结无爱天魂精秘音内讳玉佩开明上符 无结固无情，玄玄虚中澄。 轮化无方序，数来亦叵乘。 谁云无色平，峨峨多立陵。 冥心纵一往，高期清神征。 良遇非年岁，劫数安可称。 浮爽缘故条，返胎自有恒。 灵感洞太虚，飞步霄上冰。 津趣鼓万流，潜凝真神登。 无爱故无忧，高观稽首升。 右谨上请 帝真神府命元自然玄照之炁九重。 奉为亡过某，缠其身。 使三关五脏，六腑九宫，金楼玉室，十二重门，紫户玉合，三万六千关节，根源本始，一时生神，令神布炁满，声尚神具。 三界举名，五帝友别，诸天下临以得其生。 一如 告命，风火驿传。 年岁次　月　日　时告下。 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　告下。 九炁生神符 九道并神霄文祖炁，九章函上用。 混元生胞符并用青纸朱书 勑咒 真王大帝，勑下九天。 火炼胞神，天一含生。 太光俱照，滞魄易形。 急急如九天帝君勑。 炼胎成形符 勑咒 九天真宰，元符炼胎。 火降帝勑，鬼群出离。 天真皇人，速降威灵。 生尸生影，触向利贞。 魂门炼仙符 勑咒 司马圣真，帝命光灵。 上皇有命，炼魄炼魂。 度死度生，北都落名。 三炁始分，阳炁生津。 魄户闭关符 勑咒 九天大玄，帝都运旋。 阳明炼魄，尸濯成形。 四炁阴布，炼度神庭。 保命生根符 勑咒 南阎浮土，流火大神。 玉辉尊星，八威洞明。 魂魄保命，死返成真。 五炁普化，自得长生。 灵炁守坚符 勑咒 皇天真帝，九度九明。 上覆玄育，阳和大通。 炼魄度魂，与道合真。 六炁普化，灵炁生根。 元炁自分符 勑咒 九天符命，普炼魂魄。 阴尸上度，超脱北扃。 七炁元化，幽滞咸升。 华景聚一符 勑咒 灵宝符命，普摄魂灵。 天真化道，救济无边。 酆都开释，六道咸臻。 八炁普炼，魂魄返生。 急急如律令。 岳结体全符 勑咒 九玄统摄，八威吐精。 元灵降炁，并度罪魂。 北都咸赦，滞爽无停。 急急如九天好生帝君勑。 总勑符咒 日景耀罗，绮合玄阿。 流火洋洋，万津滹波。 空林郁青，金翅婆娑。 八炼朱丹，芝房栝和。 金阙四张，皇人之家。 云辉吐精，仰啜飞华。 左攀玄上，右策命魔。 身登高台，游盻绿罗。 八景翼霄，紫琼丹霞。 炁闻玉真，命齐灵柯。 长晏九玄，路无倾嗟。 九炼生化玉真宝符 八生自然灵空飞符 第一天章祝之，九符并祖炁玉文 至真虚生混成灵仙符 第二天章祝之 三炁龙胎玉宝神水化生自然符 第三天章祝之 道真虚无九微鸣水素元符 第四天章祝之 九灵玄生天水飞空玄精玉符 第五天章祝之 玉宝洞微左契理命保真玉符 第六天章祝之 灵明三洞古契神化通真玉符 第七天章祝之 上玄三炁化生自然玉符

**First Invocation:**

In the year of [Year], month of [Month], day of [Day], hour of [Hour], respectfully proclaimed below.
With the prescribed Daoist rites, the humble servant [Name] now presents the petition.

*"High Void, Clear Brightness—Heavenly Essence of the Pure Secret Sound,"*
The sacred name concealed within the Jade Pendant,
A radiant talisman for the departed [Name].
Ascend to the lofty realm of the Ninefold Heavens,
Gather at the festive clouds of appointed fate.
The Jade Edict scatters through the heart’s void,
A lone radiance, summoning the spirit’s assembly.
Illuminating mists of celestial splendor descend,
No sacred form remains untranscended.
The Jade Staff’s flowing, ethereal resonance,
Graceful words of boundless mystery.
The spirit’s voice pierces the void’s depths,
Ninefold darkness departs its hidden realm.
With clarity, the soul moves unobstructed,
Coming and going like a loosened sash.
Divine insight arises from the spirit’s edict,
Lofty wanderings know no final end.
Celestial visions gleam upon the cosmic paths,
Traces surpass the limits of mortal ways.
Response knows no bounds—
Temporarily harmonizing the Four Great Elements.
Devotedly bowing, chanting in reverence,
All the saints unite in joyous praise.

Respectfully submitted:
By the **Imperial True Essence-Palace’s Command**, the *qi* of the Ninefold Essence of the Highest Daoist’s Mystic Satchel,
For the departed [Name], ensnared by its Eight Scenes,
May the Three Divisions of the Eight Scenes
Awaken fully, body and spirit in unity.
Illuminating the dark night to safeguard the form.
As decreed, so it is proclaimed—
Wind and fire bear swift transmission.

---

**Second Invocation:**

In the year of [Year], month of [Month], day of [Day], hour of [Hour], respectfully proclaimed below.
With the prescribed Daoist rites, the humble servant [Name] now presents the petition.

*"Heavenly Essence of the Pure Secret Sound, Beyond Thought, Beyond Knots, Beyond Affection,"*
No binding, no fixation, no attachment—
In the profound void, the depths are clear.
The transformations proceed without fixed order,
Countless cycles, none to be grasped.
Who claims the formless is flat?
Lofty peaks rise, many layered like tombs.
The hidden heart, though wandering once,
Seeks the lofty realm of divine clarity.
A fortunate meeting transcends mere years,
Karmic fate—how can it be named?
The floating spirit, by ancient decree,
Returns to its primal form, steadfast and true.
Divine inspiration pierces the Great Void,
Ascending steps upon the lofty ice of the Heavens.
The flowing delight stirs the ten thousand streams,
The latent essence coalesces—true spirit ascends.
Without affection, there is no sorrow,
Lofty observation, bowing in reverence.

Respectfully submitted:
By the **Imperial True Spirit-Palace’s Command**, the *qi* of the Ninefold Essence of the Natural Illumination,
For the departed [Name], ensnared by its body,
May the Three Passages and Five Viscera,
Six Organs and Nine Palaces,
Golden Pillars and Jade Chambers,
Twelvefold Gates, Purple Doors and Jade Seals,
Thirty-six thousand joints and passages,
Roots and origins from the beginning,
Awaken simultaneously in divine form,
That the spirit may fill with *qi*, its voice resonating with divine presence.
All Three Realms proclaim its name,
The Five Emperors bid it farewell,
The multitude of heavens descend to witness its rebirth.
As decreed, so it is proclaimed—
Wind and fire bear swift transmission.

---

**Third Invocation:**

In the year of [Year], month of [Month], day of [Day], hour of [Hour], respectfully proclaimed below.
With the prescribed Daoist rites, the humble servant [Name] now presents the petition.

**Jade Pendant of the Ninefold *Qi* for Spirit’s Birth**
Ninefold Paths converge with the Heavenly Essence’s ancestral *qi*,
Ninefold Chapters enfold the highest use.
**Mixed Primordial Birth of the Fetus Talisman** (written on blue paper with vermilion ink)
*Incantation:*
True King, Great Emperor, command below the Nine Heavens.
Fire refines the fetus and spirit,
Heaven’s One embraces life.
The Great Light shines together,
Stagnant souls transform their form.
Swiftly, as the Nine Heavenly Emperors command.

**Refinement of the Fetal Form Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Nine Heavenly True Overseers,
The Original Talisman refines the fetus.
Fire descends by imperial command,
The ghostly host departs in exile.
The True Heavenly Sovereign,
Swiftly descends with mighty spirit.
Living corpses, living shadows,
Turn toward what is auspicious and true.

**Refinement of the Spirit’s Gate into the Daoist Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Saintly Marshal of the Imperial Command,
By the Emperor’s decree, the spirit is refined.
Ascending to the lofty command,
Refining the soul, refining the spirit.
Guiding death, guiding life,
Falling into the Northern Capital’s register.
The Three *Qi*s begin to separate,
Yang *qi* generates the essence.
**Closing the Soul’s Gate Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Nine Heavenly Great Mysteries,
The Imperial Capital’s revolving motion.
Yang Illumination refines the soul,
The corpse is cleansed, its form complete.
The Fourfold *Qi*s spread in darkness,
Refinement guides the spirit’s court.
**Preserving Life’s Root Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Southern Yán’s Floating Earth,
The Great Fire God.
Jade Radiance honors the stars,
Eightfold Might pierces the mysteries.
Soul and spirit preserved in life,
Death returns to its true form.
The Fivefold *Qi*s universally transform,
Attaining eternal life by itself.
**Guarding the Spirit’s *Qi* with Firmness Talisman**
*Incantation:*
True Heavenly Emperor,
Ninefold Refining, Ninefold Illumination.
Above, the Mysterious Nurturing,
Below, the Great Harmony’s boundless flow.
Refining the soul, guiding the spirit,
Uniting with the Dao’s true essence.
Sixfold *Qi*s universally transform,
The spirit’s *qi* generates roots.

**Dividing the Original *Qi* Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Nine Heavenly Talismans command,
Universally refining soul and spirit.
The dark corpse ascends in refinement,
Surpassing the Northern Barrier.
Sevenfold *Qi*s universally transform,
All latent stagnations ascend.
**Gathering the Radiant Scenes into One Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Sacred Talisman’s Command,
Universally gathering the spirit’s essence.
The True Spirit transforms into the Dao,
Rescuing without bound.
The Northern Capital releases its hold,
The Six Paths all attain their end.
Eightfold Refining, the *qi* returns to life.
Swiftly, as the law decrees.

**Uniting the Body’s Structure Talisman**
*Incantation:*
Ninefold Mysteries govern the whole,
Eightfold Might releases its essence.
The Original Spirit descends with *qi*,
Together refining the guilty souls.
The Northern Capital universally pardons,
No stagnant spirit remains.
Swiftly, as the Benevolent Nine Heavenly Sovereign commands.

**Total Command Talisman**
*Incantation:*
The sun’s radiance gleams upon the net,
The adorned union of the Mysterious Realm.
The flowing fire spreads vast,
The ten thousand streams surge like Hūpō.
The empty forests are lush with green,
The golden wings of the phoenix sway.
Eightfold Refining with vermilion elixir,
The room of jade sprouts with harmony.
The golden gates stand fourfold,
The Imperial Sovereign’s abode.
Clouds radiant, releasing essence,
Gazing upward, drinking the flying elixir.
Left, ascending to the Mysterious Heights,
Right, urging the command spirit.
Standing upon the lofty platform,
Wandering in the green robes of the Heavens.
Eight Scenes spread beneath the Heavens,
Purple jade and vermilion clouds.
The *qi* hears the Jade True,
The command aligns with the Sacred Staff.
Long lingering in the Ninefold Mysteries,
No path leads to lamentation.

**Ninefold Refining, Life-Generating Jade True Talisman**
**First Day’s Chapter and Invocation**, the Ninefold Talismans unite with the ancestral *qi* and Jade Text.
**Ultimate True Void, Mixed Primordial Spirit’s Birth into the Daoist Talisman**
**Second Day’s Chapter and Invocation**
**Threefold *Qi* Dragon Fetus, Jade Treasure Spirit’s Water Transformation into Natural Life Talisman**
**Third Day’s Chapter and Invocation**

**Fourth Day’s Chapter and Invocation**
**Ninefold Spirit’s Primordial Water, Flying Void’s Mysterious Essence Jade Talisman**
**Fifth Day’s Chapter and Invocation**
**Jade Treasure Piercing the Mysteries, Left Contracting with the Dao’s Command to Preserve the True Talisman**
**Sixth Day’s Chapter and Invocation**
**Spirit’s Illumination, Threefold Piercing of the Ancient Contract’s Divine Transformation into the True Talisman**
**Seventh Day’s Chapter and Invocation**

chunks.original_text: 第八天章祝之 五元化身二景精微飞空玉符 第九天章祝之 玉济神霄九阳真符 一阳混溟王车瑝之炁真符子文北炁 咒曰 一阳生形，幽壑开明。 四象合体，分配五行。 二阳泛华紫微之炁真符丑文艮炁 咒曰 二阳毓质，会合五神。 灵帝含辉，玉女侍形。 三阳天娄凤车之炁真符寅文震炁 咒曰 三阳受仙，受福东华。 金门离合，披阐四和。 四阳中女辟邪之炁真符卯文巽炁 咒曰 四阳苍台，赤帝丹灵。 保生虹映，敕拔命神。 五阳太皇微延之炁真符辰文南炁 咒曰 五阳玉华，太皇重宁。 公子执符，太一会灵。 金童鼓呜，凤啸龙吟。 六阳化真白灏之炁真符巳文坤炁 咒曰 六阳炼真，造化玄元。 白炁灌溉，死户生根。 七阳绛实紫光之炁真符午文北炁 咒曰 七阳运布，平会百川。 身度始青，返胎朱庭。 八阳天真命仙之炁真符未文北炁 咒曰 八阳烁爏，形合精延。 内外莹洁，身外身内。 九阳太皇寂玄之炁真符五指甲文阳炁 咒曰 九阳九炁，云腾雨凝。 结秀黄华，冠带流金。 青云玄玄，离合上清。 灵宝玉鉴卷四十二竟 灵宝玉鉴卷之四十三炼度更生门

chunks.original_text: 五芽炼符 青帝护魂符 书符咒 五行之主，九炁司方。 青阳造化，赫赫生精。 飞云结篆，风马高驯。 灵烟荡瑞，育化阳春。 木宫大惠，镇护肝魂。 谨召肝为青官，无英制魔君，木精岁星之炁，纳化身中以生肝，三魂处之。 木神九人，神吏九千众，速降真炁，营卫皮肤，主其毛发。 诵青帝歌曰 东望重拜手，苍帝玉皇君。 灵风鼓橐钥，育物布元春。 云龙辔严驾，玉卫拥琼轮。 枯萌泛沾及，大惠无不均。 万仙歌以道，委曲戒天人。 心根自固体，拱跽戴供仁。 白帝侍魄符 书符咒 白炁混沌，三炁之神。 吐清入玄，洞达我身。 阴魂反阳，晁咎蜉蝣。 七尸澡炼，万神侍迎。 金炁散辉，全我清灵。 谨召肺为素宫，白元营魄君，少阴金精太白之炁，纳化身中以生肺，七魄处之。 金神七人，从吏七千众，治其身，营卫筋骨，主其牙齿。 诵白帝歌曰 六甲抱金阙，七政守灵坛。 流铃掷火化，威剑巨龙蟠。 邈彼素灵真，明宪孰敢干。 束制妖鬼魔，凛落霄风寒。 冷气既已息，万天俄而安。 真俦荷大芘，抵颡相歌欢。 赤帝养炁符 书符咒 五炁运度，泉脉贯通。 日运玄珠，光透华峰。 三宫升降，往来无穷。 赫赫阳晶，万物发生。 紫房混合，九魂炼纯。 披朱始丹，萧仞劫台。 谨召心为绛宫，太一司命君，太阳火精，荧惑之炁，纳化身中以生左心，左有玉童，右有玉女处之。 火神三人，从吏三千众，主治其中。 营卫官府，主其魂魄。

**Azure Emperor’s Soul-Guarding Talisman**

Cloud-dragons harnessed in solemn procession,

Great benevolence knows no exclusion.

White *Qi* in primordial chaos, spirit of the Three *Qi*.

Seven corpses purified in alchemical baths,

Six *Jia* embrace the golden gate,

True companions bear great blessings—

chunks.original_text: 万天拱中晨，控驾玉化根。 翘机贯亿历，洞朗辟四门。 大有混皇真，纠制星宿魂。 非帝道不运，有方赖之存。 威忿即霜秋，和豫为阳春。 生成握元纪，仰荷戴无垠。 右五帝符焚讫，念大梵隐语一遍，取五方炁吹之。 吹取玄元始三炁吹之。 次九天真炁定体。 次明亡者宿命因缘，即当爱其形，保其神，贵其炁，固其根，终无死坏而得神仙，骨肉同飞，上登三清。 是与三炁，会得九炁，齐并也。 五府全形章 先搯左手卯文，云都功成，东炁一吹弹。 次搯辰文，云兴生转，西炁吹弹。 次搯三涂诀，云可韩明，南方炁吹弹。 独隶迁，北炁吹弹。 对魂聚魂，公都聚魂摄，中央炁吹弹，焚玉讳。 毕，即吹鬼门炁，却东南炁，吹亡魂，即剔诀。 次再轮诀，默念。 五帝真形作用炁诀 搯辰文，云红杏，存吹东方青炁九道在口，运自己肝炁九道入口、运肝炁交，连诀吹弹。 搯坎文，云墨黑，存吸北方黑炁五道在口，运自己肾炁五道入口相交，连诀吹弹。 搯兑文，云摩真，存吸西方白炁七道在口，运自己肺炁七道入口相交，连诀吹弹。 搯离文，云袜腊，存吸南方赤炁三道在口，运自己心炁三道入口相交，运诀吹弹。 搯中指中，云灵宝，存吸中黄炁十三道在口，运自己脾炁十二道入口相交，连诀吹弹。 五道混合符 祖炁，五方诀，归中。 咒曰 太乙司命，桃康合延。 执符把箓，保命生根。 上游上清，出入华房。 八冥之内，细微之中。 下镇人身，泥丸绛宫。 中理五炁，混合百神。 急急如玉清上帝勑。 炼身返质符 女形面

chunks.original_text: 女人背 入阴符于内 男形背 男形面 左目日魂咒，右目月魄咒， 见前，入阳符于内。 右男符入十二经络阳符，女符入十二经络阴符，存用合炁，聚魂於内，焚于聚炁炉中。 勑咒 六甲六乙，炼汝我肝经，生汝威力，保养魂灵。 六丙六丁，炼汝我心经，生汝神炁，保命长生。 六庚六辛，炼汝我肺经，大肠小肠，万炁潜冥。 六壬六癸，炼汝我肾经，精华盈溢，骨髓安宁。 六戊六己，炼汝我脾胃，骨轻肉清，长生久视。 急急如律令。 甲乙丙丁，却秽生神。 戊己庚辛，正炁聚形。 壬癸生精，复汝真形。 元始符命，上升朱陵。 急急如律令。 天地冥灵，天地同生。 五行所运，甲乙丙丁。 乾坤坎离，八卦凝神。 炼胎返初，戊己庚辛。 壬癸甲庚，变易元身。 六甲六天，符应萌明。 六乙双确，六丙八焚。 六丁七晃，戊己中呈。 六庚三茁，六辛四升。 六壬九炁，六癸一成。 真王受命，聚体成人。 全身九诀，水火双扃。 天阳地阴，五炁成真。 道炁一变，疾见真形。 吾奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 子丑寅卯辰巳午未申酉戌亥神。 甲乙丙丁戊己庚辛壬癸神。 十二真炁成，十数全炁结。 变化五行降，速达玉清阙。 或奉玉清勑，速降元炁成。 炼身咒 上元一真，守固泥丸。 中元一真，安神绛宫。 下元一真，守卫命门。 三元齐景，保命长存。 招灵致真，坐降自然。 变形炼髓，骨化成仙。 毛羽飞腾，翱翔帝庭。 正炼咒 亡魂首相，具体全人。 是男是女，骸变通神。 流火丹宫，朱陵炼身。 玉眸南水，黄华荡形。 我身上告，十万神兵。 飞腾玉府，升入帝庭。 又咒 天地造化，结炁为人。 左眼为日，右眼为月。 耳鼻喉舌，音声上彻。 脾肝胆神，常居五穴。 五行分主，保卫形躯。 甲乙丙丁，戊己庚辛。 壬癸神将，速卫速守。 急急如律令。 九炼符 火炼丹界天尊 流水之精炼而为胞符 咒曰 炎炎之精，变而为英。 受炼亡魂，升入无英。 九幽拔罪天尊 昭火之精炼而为胎符 咒曰 九幽开度，破灭三尸。 神魂受炼，登升太微。 十方救苦天尊 乘木之精炼而为魂符 咒曰 十方之炁，聚而为灵。 亡魂受炼，舍妄皈真。 逍遥快乐天尊 柔金之精炼而为魄符 咒曰

chunks.original_text: 今月　日逮斋主某，祗建无上盟真玉匮黄箓普度大斋几昼夜。 依按玄科，作诸功德。 乞为开度某魂，超升仙界。 以今冶炼亡魂，所有披黄受道宝诰，谨为告下者。 元始开连，太玄肇灵。 虚极无象，一炁流形。 化生二景，五纬凝精。 混合自然，恒除结婴。 总真布景，焕赫九清。 炎持廓奕，七纪齐并。 析师卢浩，丹天耀晶。 朱光炼度，赤蔼散明。 三华郁秀，辉映帝辰，一如灵宝无量度人告命。 年岁次　月　日告下。 ， 具　法　位　臣　姓　某　奉行。 右符五尺黄纸朱书，束封，焚於聚炁炉中。 知磬举金阙化身天尊。 众宣大咒 飞玄紫炁凝灵根，纲维玉虚总万神。 空中郁勃浩自然，上有楞层十二传。 玉楼嵯峨耀景云，流精紫阙带金轩。 琼堂璋铄绕八骞，中有青金九灵仙。 丹黄真母号精延，飞青羽晨婴冠。 手持玉节握灵旛，五色命魔对帝尊。 把持符籍当生门，咀日嚼月吸醴泉。 离罗吐辉炼五魂，内充外溢绛府欣。 金光焕焕形正圆，从青入玄色纯纯。 唯有开明晓此言，日五月十精北元。 刻见华盖领仙君，紫炁左回与斗运。 历度四七入金门，正是丹皇校万仙。 有明此诀加精勤，披形密思每令分。 妙景感会得要文，三年当守保长存。 九年乘空蹑景云，凤衣轻翔升龙山。 俯仰九灵谒玉晨，得为灵宝大真人。 仙化成人符 双手玉诀，祖炁。 宣三十天大券，别具於给符受箓门再入科。 高功行升度之法，内诵玉经，告长生简。 道众喧咒 死魂受炼，仙化成人。 生身受度，劫劫长存。 随劫轮转，与天齐年。 永度三涂，五苦八难。 超凌三界，逍遥上清。 举逍遥快乐天尊。 玉清生化保度天门宝符 玉诀，祖炁 咒曰 元始玉文，保度亡魂。 上升朱府，径上天门。 魔王敬礼，万圣护迎。 玉清元命，逍遥上清。 急急如元始速度律令。 生天度命法桥符 右符引青黄白三炁，於送亡时焚於桥前。 咒曰 天尊大威灵，八方开光道。 引领七亡魂，升度此法桥。 右存二目交接，紫光丹霞，上应天尊宝珠之光，下接亡魂，上升天境。 师掐三五提魂诀发去。 次凝神太漠，非色非空，若有若无，了无所着，自然冥惠洞清，大量玄玄也。 次送亡，焚燎，回向。 炼度坛式 灵宝玉鉴卷之四十三竟
